31 
32 void PnormComponent::Init(int32 input_dim, int32 output_dim) {
33  input_dim_ = input_dim;
34  output_dim_ = output_dim;
35  KALDI_ASSERT(input_dim_ > 0 && output_dim_ > 0 &&
36  input_dim_ % output_dim_ == 0);
37 }
38 
39 void PnormComponent::InitFromConfig(ConfigLine *cfl) {
40  int32 input_dim = 0;
41  int32 output_dim = 0;
42  bool ok = cfl->GetValue("output-dim", &output_dim) &&
43  cfl->GetValue("input-dim", &input_dim);
44  if (!ok || cfl->HasUnusedValues() || output_dim <= 0)
45  KALDI_ERR << "Invalid initializer for layer of type "
46  << Type() << ": \"" << cfl->WholeLine() << "\"";
47  Init(input_dim, output_dim);
48 }
49 
50 
51 void PnormComponent::Propagate(const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
52  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in,
53  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *out) const {
54  BaseFloat p = 2.0;
55  out->GroupPnorm(in, p); // TODO: when done, replace with Group2Norm function.
56 }
57 
58 void PnormComponent::Backprop(const std::string &debug_info,
59  const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
60  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in_value,
61  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_value,
62  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv,
63  Component *to_update,
64  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *in_deriv) const {
65  if (!in_deriv) return;
66  BaseFloat p = 2.0;
67  // TODO: use Group2NormDeriv when done.
68  in_deriv->GroupPnormDeriv(in_value, out_value, p);
69  in_deriv->MulRowsGroupMat(out_deriv);
70 }
71 
72 void PnormComponent::Read(std::istream &is, bool binary) {
73  ExpectOneOrTwoTokens(is, binary, "<PnormComponent>", "<InputDim>");
74  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &input_dim_);
75  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<OutputDim>");
76  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &output_dim_);
77  ExpectToken(is, binary, "</PnormComponent>");
78 }
79 
80 void PnormComponent::Write(std::ostream &os, bool binary) const {
81  WriteToken(os, binary, "<PnormComponent>");
82  WriteToken(os, binary, "<InputDim>");
83  WriteBasicType(os, binary, input_dim_);
84  WriteToken(os, binary, "<OutputDim>");
85  WriteBasicType(os, binary, output_dim_);
86  WriteToken(os, binary, "</PnormComponent>");
87 }

90 void SumReduceComponent::Init(int32 input_dim, int32 output_dim) {
91  input_dim_ = input_dim;
92  output_dim_ = output_dim;
93  KALDI_ASSERT(input_dim_ > 0 && output_dim_ > 0 &&
94  input_dim_ % output_dim_ == 0);
95 }
96 
97 void SumReduceComponent::InitFromConfig(ConfigLine *cfl) {
98  int32 input_dim = 0;
99  int32 output_dim = 0;
100  bool ok = cfl->GetValue("output-dim", &output_dim) &&
101  cfl->GetValue("input-dim", &input_dim);
102  if (!ok || cfl->HasUnusedValues() || output_dim <= 0)
103  KALDI_ERR << "Invalid initializer for layer of type "
104  << Type() << ": \"" << cfl->WholeLine() << "\"";
105  Init(input_dim, output_dim);
106 }
107 
108 
109 void SumReduceComponent::Propagate(const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
110  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in,
111  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *out) const {
112  KALDI_ASSERT(out->NumRows() == in.NumRows() && in.NumCols() == input_dim_
113  && out->NumCols() == output_dim_);
114  int32 num_blocks = input_dim_ / output_dim_;
115  for (int32 i = 0; i < num_blocks; i++) {
116  CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> in_block(in, 0, in.NumRows(),
117  i * output_dim_, output_dim_);
118  if (i == 0)
119  out->CopyFromMat(in_block);
120  else
121  out->AddMat(1.0, in_block);
122  }
123 }
124 
125 void SumReduceComponent::Backprop(const std::string &debug_info,
126  const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
127  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &, // in_value
128  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &, // out_value
129  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv,
130  Component *, // to_update
131  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *in_deriv) const {
132  if (!in_deriv) return;
133  KALDI_ASSERT(out_deriv.NumRows() == in_deriv->NumRows() &&
134  in_deriv->NumCols() == input_dim_ &&
135  out_deriv.NumCols() == output_dim_);
136  int32 num_blocks = input_dim_ / output_dim_;
137  for (int32 i = 0; i < num_blocks; i++) {
138  CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> in_deriv_block(*in_deriv, 0, in_deriv->NumRows(),
139  i * output_dim_, output_dim_);
140  in_deriv_block.CopyFromMat(out_deriv);
141  }
142 }
143 
144 void SumReduceComponent::Read(std::istream &is, bool binary) {
145  ExpectOneOrTwoTokens(is, binary, "<SumReduceComponent>", "<InputDim>");
146  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &input_dim_);
147  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<OutputDim>");
148  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &output_dim_);
149  ExpectToken(is, binary, "</SumReduceComponent>");
150 }
151 
152 void SumReduceComponent::Write(std::ostream &os, bool binary) const {
153  WriteToken(os, binary, "<SumReduceComponent>");
154  WriteToken(os, binary, "<InputDim>");
155  WriteBasicType(os, binary, input_dim_);
156  WriteToken(os, binary, "<OutputDim>");
157  WriteBasicType(os, binary, output_dim_);
158  WriteToken(os, binary, "</SumReduceComponent>");
159 }

162 void ElementwiseProductComponent::Init(int32 input_dim, int32 output_dim) {
163  input_dim_ = input_dim;
164  output_dim_ = output_dim;
165  KALDI_ASSERT(input_dim_ > 0 && output_dim_ >= 0);
166  KALDI_ASSERT(input_dim_ > output_dim_);
167  KALDI_ASSERT(input_dim_ % output_dim_ == 0);
168 }
169 
170 void ElementwiseProductComponent::InitFromConfig(ConfigLine *cfl) {
171  int32 input_dim = 0;
172  int32 output_dim = 0;
173  bool ok = cfl->GetValue("output-dim", &output_dim) &&
174  cfl->GetValue("input-dim", &input_dim);
175  if (!ok || cfl->HasUnusedValues() || output_dim <= 0)
176  KALDI_ERR << "Invalid initializer for layer of type "
177  << Type() << ": \"" << cfl->WholeLine() << "\"";
178  Init(input_dim, output_dim);
179 }
180 
181 void ElementwiseProductComponent::Propagate(
182  const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
183  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in,
184  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *out) const {
185  KALDI_ASSERT(in.NumCols() == input_dim_);
186  int32 num_inputs = input_dim_ / output_dim_;
187  for (int32 i = 0; i < num_inputs; i++) {
188  CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> current_in(in, 0, in.NumRows(),
189  i * output_dim_, output_dim_);
190  if (i == 0) {
191  out->CopyFromMat(current_in);
192  } else {
193  out->MulElements(current_in);
194  }
195  }
196 }
197 
198 void ElementwiseProductComponent::Backprop(const std::string &debug_info,
199  const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
200  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in_value,
201  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_value,
202  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv,
203  Component *to_update,
204  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *in_deriv) const {
205  if (!in_deriv) return;
206  int32 num_inputs = input_dim_ / output_dim_;
207  for (int32 i = 0; i < num_inputs; i++) {
208  CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> current_in_deriv(*in_deriv, 0, in_deriv->NumRows(),
209  i * output_dim_,
210  output_dim_);
211  current_in_deriv.CopyFromMat(out_deriv);
212  for (int32 j = 0; j < num_inputs; j++) {
213  if (i == j)
214  continue;
215  CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> in_value_partition(in_value, 0,
216  in_value.NumRows(),
217  j * output_dim_,
218  output_dim_);
219  current_in_deriv.MulElements(in_value_partition);
220  }
221  }
222 }
223 
224 void ElementwiseProductComponent::Read(std::istream &is, bool binary) {
225  ExpectOneOrTwoTokens(is, binary, "<ElementwiseProductComponent>",
226  "<InputDim>");
227  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &input_dim_);
228  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<OutputDim>");
229  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &output_dim_);
230  ExpectToken(is, binary, "</ElementwiseProductComponent>");
231 }
232 
233 void ElementwiseProductComponent::Write(std::ostream &os, bool binary) const {
234  WriteToken(os, binary, "<ElementwiseProductComponent>");
235  WriteToken(os, binary, "<InputDim>");
236  WriteBasicType(os, binary, input_dim_);
237  WriteToken(os, binary, "<OutputDim>");
238  WriteBasicType(os, binary, output_dim_);
239  WriteToken(os, binary, "</ElementwiseProductComponent>");
240 }
241 
242 const BaseFloat NormalizeComponent::kNormFloor = pow(2.0, -66);
243 // This component modifies the vector of activations by scaling it so that the
244 // root-mean-square equals 1.0. It's important that its square root
245 // be exactly representable in float.
246 void NormalizeComponent::Init(int32 dim, BaseFloat target_rms) {
247  KALDI_ASSERT(dim > 0);
248  KALDI_ASSERT(target_rms > 0);
249  dim_ = dim;
250  count_ = 0.0;
251  target_rms_ = target_rms;
252 }
253 
254 void NormalizeComponent::InitFromConfig(ConfigLine *cfl) {
255  int32 dim = 0;
256  BaseFloat target_rms = 1.0;
257  bool ok = cfl->GetValue("dim", &dim);
258  cfl->GetValue("target-rms", &target_rms);
259  if (!ok || cfl->HasUnusedValues() || dim <= 0 || target_rms <= 0.0)
260  KALDI_ERR << "Invalid initializer for layer of type "
261  << Type() << ": \"" << cfl->WholeLine() << "\"";
262  Init(dim, target_rms);
263 }
264 void NormalizeComponent::Read(std::istream &is, bool binary) {
265  std::ostringstream ostr_beg, ostr_end;
266  ostr_beg << "<" << Type() << ">";
267  ostr_end << "</" << Type() << ">";
268  ExpectOneOrTwoTokens(is, binary, ostr_beg.str(), "<Dim>");
269  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &dim_); // Read dimension.
270  std::string tok; // TODO: remove back-compatibility code.
271  ReadToken(is, binary, &tok);
272 
273  // read target_rms_ if it is available.
274  if (tok == "<TargetRms>") {
275  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &target_rms_);
276  ReadToken(is, binary, &tok);
277  }
278  // The new format is more readable as we write values that are normalized by
279  // the count.
280  KALDI_ASSERT(tok == "<ValueAvg>");
281  value_sum_.Read(is, binary);
282  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<DerivAvg>");
283  deriv_sum_.Read(is, binary);
284  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<Count>");
285  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &count_);
286  value_sum_.Scale(count_);
287  deriv_sum_.Scale(count_);
288  ExpectToken(is, binary, ostr_end.str());
289 }
290 
291 void NormalizeComponent::Write(std::ostream &os, bool binary) const {
292  std::ostringstream ostr_beg, ostr_end;
293  ostr_beg << "<" << Type() << ">";
294  ostr_end << "</" << Type() << ">";
295  WriteToken(os, binary, ostr_beg.str());
296  WriteToken(os, binary, "<Dim>");
297  WriteBasicType(os, binary, dim_);
298  WriteToken(os, binary, "<TargetRms>");
299  WriteBasicType(os, binary, target_rms_);
300  // Write the values and derivatives in a count-normalized way, for
301  // greater readability in text form.
302  WriteToken(os, binary, "<ValueAvg>");
303  Vector<BaseFloat> temp(value_sum_);
304  if (count_ != 0.0) temp.Scale(1.0 / count_);
305  temp.Write(os, binary);
306  WriteToken(os, binary, "<DerivAvg>");
307 
308  temp.Resize(deriv_sum_.Dim(), kUndefined);
309  temp.CopyFromVec(deriv_sum_);
310  if (count_ != 0.0) temp.Scale(1.0 / count_);
311  temp.Write(os, binary);
312  WriteToken(os, binary, "<Count>");
313  WriteBasicType(os, binary, count_);
314  WriteToken(os, binary, ostr_end.str());
315 }
316 
317 std::string NormalizeComponent::Info() const {
318  std::ostringstream stream;
319  stream << NonlinearComponent::Info();
320  stream << ", target-rms=" << target_rms_;
321  return stream.str();
322 }
323 
324 // The output y_i = scale * x_i,
325 // and we want to RMS value of the y_i to equal target_rms,
326 // so y^t y = D * target_rms^2 (if y is one row of the input).
327 // we need to have scale = 1.0 / sqrt(x^t x / (D * target_rms^2)).
328 // there is also flooring involved, to avoid division-by-zero
329 // problems. It's important for the backprop, that the floor's
330 // square root is exactly representable as float.
331 void NormalizeComponent::Propagate(const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
332  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in,
333  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *out) const {
334  CuVector<BaseFloat> in_norm(in.NumRows());
335  BaseFloat d_scaled = (in.NumCols() * target_rms_ * target_rms_);
336  in_norm.AddDiagMat2(1.0 / d_scaled,
337  in, kNoTrans, 0.0);
338  in_norm.ApplyFloor(kNormFloor);
339  in_norm.ApplyPow(-0.5);
340  out->CopyFromMat(in);
341  out->MulRowsVec(in_norm);
342 }
343 
344 /*
345  A note on the derivative of NormalizeComponent...
346  let both row_in and row_out be vectors of dimension D.
347  Let p = row_in^T row_in / (D * target_rms^2), and let
348  f = 1.0 / sqrt(max(kNormFloor, p)), and we compute row_out as:
349  row_out = f row_in.
350  Suppose we have a quantity deriv_out which is the derivative
351  of the objective function w.r.t. row_out. We want to compute
352  deriv_in which is the derivative of the objective function w.r.t.
353  row_in. Let the objective function be F. One term is obvious: we have
354  deriv_in = f deriv_out + ....
355  next we have to take into account the derivative that gets back-propagated
356  through f. Obviously, dF/df = deriv_out^T row_in.
357  And df/dp = (p <= kNormFloor ? 0.0 : -0.5 p^{-1.5}) = (f == 1.0 / sqrt(kNormFloor) ? 0.0 : -0.5 f^3),
358  and dp/d(row_in) = 2/(D * target_rms^2) row_in. [it's vector_valued].
359  So this term in dF/d(row_in) equals:
360  dF/df df/dp dp/d(row_in) = 2/(D * target_rms^2) (f == 1.0 / sqrt(kNormFloor) ? 0.0 : -0.5 f^3) (deriv_out^T row_in) row_in
361  So
362  deriv_in = f deriv_out + (f == 1.0 ? 0.0 : -f^3 / (D * target_rms^2) ) (deriv_out^T row_in) row_in
363 
364 */
365 void NormalizeComponent::Backprop(const std::string &debug_info,
366  const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
367  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in_value,
368  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &, // out_value
369  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv,
370  Component *to_update,
371  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *in_deriv) const {
372  if (!in_deriv) return;
373  CuVector<BaseFloat> dot_products(out_deriv.NumRows());
374  dot_products.AddDiagMatMat(1.0, out_deriv, kNoTrans, in_value, kTrans, 0.0);
375  CuVector<BaseFloat> in_norm(in_value.NumRows());
376  // dscaled == D * target_rms^2.
377  BaseFloat d_scaled = (in_value.NumCols() * target_rms_ * target_rms_);
378  in_norm.AddDiagMat2(1.0 / d_scaled,
379  in_value, kNoTrans, 0.0);
380  in_norm.ApplyFloor(kNormFloor);
381  in_norm.ApplyPow(-0.5);
382 
383  if (in_deriv) {
384  if (in_deriv->Data() != out_deriv.Data())
385  in_deriv->AddDiagVecMat(1.0, in_norm, out_deriv, kNoTrans, 0.0);
386  else
387  in_deriv->MulRowsVec(in_norm);
388  }
389  in_norm.ReplaceValue(1.0 / sqrt(kNormFloor), 0.0);
390  in_norm.ApplyPow(3.0);
391  dot_products.MulElements(in_norm);
392  in_deriv->AddDiagVecMat(-1.0 / d_scaled,
393  dot_products, in_value,
394  kNoTrans, 1.0);
395 }
396 
397 void SigmoidComponent::Propagate(const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
398  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in,
399  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *out) const {
400  out->Sigmoid(in);
401 }
402 
403 void SigmoidComponent::Backprop(const std::string &debug_info,
404  const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
405  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &,
406  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_value,
407  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv,
408  Component *,
409  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *in_deriv) const {
410  if (in_deriv != NULL)
411  in_deriv->DiffSigmoid(out_value, out_deriv);
412 }
413 
414 void SigmoidComponent::StoreStats(const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_value) {
415  // derivative of the nonlinearity is out_value * (1.0 - out_value);
416  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> temp_deriv(out_value.NumRows(), out_value.NumCols(),
417  kUndefined);
418  temp_deriv.Set(1.0);
419  temp_deriv.AddMat(-1.0, out_value);
420  temp_deriv.MulElements(out_value);
421  StoreStatsInternal(out_value, &temp_deriv);
422 }
423 
424 
425 
426 void NoOpComponent::Propagate(const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
427  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in,
428  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *out) const {
429  out->CopyFromMat(in);
430 }
431 
432 void NoOpComponent::Backprop(const std::string &debug_info,
433  const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
434  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &,
435  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &,
436  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv,
437  Component *to_update, // may be NULL; may be identical
438  // to "this" or different.
439  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *in_deriv) const {
440  in_deriv->CopyFromMat(out_deriv);
441 }
442 
443 void ClipGradientComponent::Read(std::istream &is, bool binary) {
444  // might not see the "<NaturalGradientAffineComponent>" part because
445  // of how ReadNew() works.
446  ExpectOneOrTwoTokens(is, binary, "<ClipGradientComponent>",
447  "<Dim>");
448  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &dim_);
449  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<ClippingThreshold>");
450  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &clipping_threshold_);
451  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<NormBasedClipping>");
452  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &norm_based_clipping_);
453  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<NumElementsClipped>");
454  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &num_clipped_);
455  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<NumElementsProcessed>");
456  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &count_);
457  ExpectToken(is, binary, "</ClipGradientComponent>");
458 }
459 
460 void ClipGradientComponent::Write(std::ostream &os, bool binary) const {
461  WriteToken(os, binary, "<ClipGradientComponent>");
462  WriteToken(os, binary, "<Dim>");
463  WriteBasicType(os, binary, dim_);
464  WriteToken(os, binary, "<ClippingThreshold>");
465  WriteBasicType(os, binary, clipping_threshold_);
466  WriteToken(os, binary, "<NormBasedClipping>");
467  WriteBasicType(os, binary, norm_based_clipping_);
468  WriteToken(os, binary, "<NumElementsClipped>");
469  WriteBasicType(os, binary, num_clipped_);
470  WriteToken(os, binary, "<NumElementsProcessed>");
471  WriteBasicType(os, binary, count_);
472  WriteToken(os, binary, "</ClipGradientComponent>");
473 }
474 
475 std::string ClipGradientComponent::Info() const {
476  std::ostringstream stream;
477  stream << Type() << ", dim=" << dim_
478  << ", norm-based-clipping="
479  << (norm_based_clipping_ ? "true" : "false")
480  << ", clipping-threshold=" << clipping_threshold_
481  << ", clipped-proportion="
482  << (count_ > 0 ? static_cast<BaseFloat>(num_clipped_)/count_ : 0);
483  return stream.str();
484 }
485 
486 void ClipGradientComponent::Init(int32 dim,
487  BaseFloat clipping_threshold,
488  bool norm_based_clipping,
489  int32 num_clipped,
490  int32 count) {
491  KALDI_ASSERT(clipping_threshold >= 0 && dim > 0);
492  dim_ = dim;
493  norm_based_clipping_ = norm_based_clipping;
494  clipping_threshold_ = clipping_threshold;
495  num_clipped_ = num_clipped;
496  count_ = count;
497 }
498 
499 void ClipGradientComponent::InitFromConfig(ConfigLine *cfl) {
500  int32 dim = 0;
501  bool ok = cfl->GetValue("dim", &dim);
502  bool norm_based_clipping = false;
503  BaseFloat clipping_threshold = 15.0;
504  cfl->GetValue("clipping-threshold", &clipping_threshold);
505  cfl->GetValue("norm-based-clipping", &norm_based_clipping);
506  if (!ok || cfl->HasUnusedValues() ||
507  clipping_threshold < 0 || dim <= 0)
508  KALDI_ERR << "Invalid initializer for layer of type "
509  << Type() << ": \"" << cfl->WholeLine() << "\"";
510  Init(dim, clipping_threshold, norm_based_clipping, 0, 0);
511 }
512 
513 void ClipGradientComponent::Propagate(
514  const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
515  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in,
516  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *out) const {
517  out->CopyFromMat(in);
518 }
519 
520 
521 void ClipGradientComponent::Backprop(const std::string &debug_info,
522  const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
523  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &,
524  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &,
525  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv,
526  Component *to_update_in, // may be NULL; may be identical
527  // to "this" or different.
528  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *in_deriv) const {
529  // the following statement will do nothing if in_deriv and out_deriv have same
530  // memory.
531  in_deriv->CopyFromMat(out_deriv);
532 
533  ClipGradientComponent *to_update =
534  dynamic_cast<ClipGradientComponent*>(to_update_in);
535  KALDI_ASSERT(to_update != NULL);
536 
537  if (clipping_threshold_ > 0) {
538  if (norm_based_clipping_) {
539  // each row in the derivative matrix, which corresponds to one sample in
540  // the mini-batch, is scaled to have a max-norm of clipping_threshold_
541  CuVector<BaseFloat> clipping_scales(in_deriv->NumRows());
542  clipping_scales.AddDiagMat2(pow(clipping_threshold_, -2), *in_deriv,
543  kNoTrans, 0.0);
544  // now clipping_scales contains the squared (norm of each row divided by
545  // clipping_threshold)
546  int32 num_not_scaled = clipping_scales.ApplyFloor(1.0);
547  // now clipping_scales contains min(1,
548  // squared-(norm/clipping_threshold))
549  if (num_not_scaled != clipping_scales.Dim()) {
550  clipping_scales.ApplyPow(-0.5);
551  // now clipping_scales contains max(1,
552  // clipping_threshold/vector_norm)
553  in_deriv->MulRowsVec(clipping_scales);
554  to_update->num_clipped_ += (clipping_scales.Dim() - num_not_scaled);
555  }
556  to_update->count_ += clipping_scales.Dim();
557  } else {
558  // each element of the derivative matrix, is clipped to be below the
559  // clipping_threshold_
560  in_deriv->ApplyCeiling(clipping_threshold_);
561  in_deriv->ApplyFloor(-1 * clipping_threshold_);
562  }
563  }
564 }
565 
566 void ClipGradientComponent::ZeroStats() {
567  count_ = 0.0;
568  num_clipped_ = 0.0;
569 }
570 
571 void ClipGradientComponent::Scale(BaseFloat scale) {
572  count_ *= scale;
573  num_clipped_ *= scale;
574 }
575 
576 void ClipGradientComponent::Add(BaseFloat alpha, const Component &other_in) {
577  const ClipGradientComponent *other =
578  dynamic_cast<const ClipGradientComponent*>(&other_in);
579  KALDI_ASSERT(other != NULL);
580  count_ += alpha * other->count_;
581  num_clipped_ += alpha * other->num_clipped_;
582 }
583 
584 void TanhComponent::Propagate(const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
585  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in,
586  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *out) const {
587  // Apply tanh function to each element of the output...
588  // the tanh function may be written as -1 + ( 2 / (1 + e^{-2 x})),
589  // which is a scaled and shifted sigmoid.
590  out->Tanh(in);
591 }
592 
593 void TanhComponent::Backprop(const std::string &debug_info,
594  const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
595  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &,
596  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_value,
597  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv,
598  Component *to_update, // may be NULL; may be identical
599  // to "this" or different.
600  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *in_deriv) const {
601  if (in_deriv != NULL)
602  in_deriv->DiffTanh(out_value, out_deriv);
603 }
604 
605 /*
606  Note on the derivative of the tanh function:
607  tanh'(x) = sech^2(x) = -(tanh(x)+1) (tanh(x)-1) = 1 - tanh^2(x)
608 
609  The element by element equation of what we're doing would be:
610  in_deriv = out_deriv * (1.0 - out_value^2).
611  We can accomplish this via calls to the matrix library. */
612 void TanhComponent::StoreStats(const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_value) {
613  // derivative of the onlinearity is out_value * (1.0 - out_value);
614  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> temp_deriv(out_value);
615  temp_deriv.ApplyPow(2.0);
616  temp_deriv.Scale(-1.0);
617  temp_deriv.Add(1.0);
618  StoreStatsInternal(out_value, &temp_deriv);
619 }
620 
621 
622 void RectifiedLinearComponent::Propagate(
623  const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
624  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in,
625  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *out) const {
626  // Apply rectified linear function (x >= 0 ? 1.0 : 0.0)
627  out->CopyFromMat(in);
628  out->ApplyFloor(0.0);
629 }
630 
631 void RectifiedLinearComponent::Backprop(
632  const std::string &debug_info,
633  const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
634  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &, //in_value
635  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_value,
636  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv,
637  Component *to_update,
638  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *in_deriv) const {
639  if (in_deriv != NULL) {
640  in_deriv->CopyFromMat(out_value);
641  in_deriv->ApplyHeaviside();
642  in_deriv->MulElements(out_deriv);
643  }
644 }
645 
646 void RectifiedLinearComponent::StoreStats(
647  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_value) {
648  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> temp_deriv(out_value);
649  temp_deriv.ApplyHeaviside();
650  StoreStatsInternal(out_value, &temp_deriv);
651 }
652 
653 void AffineComponent::Scale(BaseFloat scale) {
654  linear_params_.Scale(scale);
655  bias_params_.Scale(scale);
656 }
657 
658 void AffineComponent::Resize(int32 input_dim, int32 output_dim) {
659  KALDI_ASSERT(input_dim > 0 && output_dim > 0);
660  bias_params_.Resize(output_dim);
661  linear_params_.Resize(output_dim, input_dim);
662 }
663 
664 void AffineComponent::Add(BaseFloat alpha, const Component &other_in) {
665  const AffineComponent *other =
666  dynamic_cast<const AffineComponent*>(&other_in);
667  KALDI_ASSERT(other != NULL);
668  linear_params_.AddMat(alpha, other->linear_params_);
669  bias_params_.AddVec(alpha, other->bias_params_);
670 }
671 
672 AffineComponent::AffineComponent(const AffineComponent &component):
673  UpdatableComponent(component),
674  linear_params_(component.linear_params_),
675  bias_params_(component.bias_params_) { }
676 
677 AffineComponent::AffineComponent(const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &linear_params,
678  const CuVectorBase<BaseFloat> &bias_params,
679  BaseFloat learning_rate):
680  linear_params_(linear_params),
681  bias_params_(bias_params) {
682  SetLearningRate(learning_rate);
683  KALDI_ASSERT(linear_params.NumRows() == bias_params.Dim()&&
684  bias_params.Dim() != 0);
685 }
686 
687 
688 
689 void AffineComponent::SetZero(bool treat_as_gradient) {
690  if (treat_as_gradient) {
691  learning_rate_ = 1.0; // don't call SetLearningRate, that would apply the
692  // learning rate factor.
693  is_gradient_ = true;
694  }
695  linear_params_.SetZero();
696  bias_params_.SetZero();
697 }
698 
699 void AffineComponent::SetParams(const VectorBase<BaseFloat> &bias,
700  const MatrixBase<BaseFloat> &linear) {
701  bias_params_ = bias;
702  linear_params_ = linear;
703  KALDI_ASSERT(bias_params_.Dim() == linear_params_.NumRows());
704 }
705 
706 void AffineComponent::PerturbParams(BaseFloat stddev) {
707  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> temp_linear_params(linear_params_);
708  temp_linear_params.SetRandn();
709  linear_params_.AddMat(stddev, temp_linear_params);
710 
711  CuVector<BaseFloat> temp_bias_params(bias_params_);
712  temp_bias_params.SetRandn();
713  bias_params_.AddVec(stddev, temp_bias_params);
714 }
715 
716 std::string AffineComponent::Info() const {
717  std::ostringstream stream;
718  stream << UpdatableComponent::Info();
719  PrintParameterStats(stream, "linear-params", linear_params_);
720  PrintParameterStats(stream, "bias", bias_params_, true);
721  return stream.str();
722 }
723 
724 Component* AffineComponent::Copy() const {
725  AffineComponent *ans = new AffineComponent(*this);
726  return ans;
727 }
728 
729 BaseFloat AffineComponent::DotProduct(const UpdatableComponent &other_in) const {
730  const AffineComponent *other =
731  dynamic_cast<const AffineComponent*>(&other_in);
732  return TraceMatMat(linear_params_, other->linear_params_, kTrans)
733  + VecVec(bias_params_, other->bias_params_);
734 }
735 
736 void AffineComponent::Init(int32 input_dim, int32 output_dim,
737  BaseFloat param_stddev, BaseFloat bias_stddev) {
738  linear_params_.Resize(output_dim, input_dim);
739  bias_params_.Resize(output_dim);
740  KALDI_ASSERT(output_dim > 0 && input_dim > 0 && param_stddev >= 0.0);
741  linear_params_.SetRandn(); // sets to random normally distributed noise.
742  linear_params_.Scale(param_stddev);
743  bias_params_.SetRandn();
744  bias_params_.Scale(bias_stddev);
745 }
746 
747 void AffineComponent::Init(std::string matrix_filename) {
748  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> mat;
749  ReadKaldiObject(matrix_filename, &mat); // will abort on failure.
750  KALDI_ASSERT(mat.NumCols() >= 2);
751  int32 input_dim = mat.NumCols() - 1, output_dim = mat.NumRows();
752  linear_params_.Resize(output_dim, input_dim);
753  bias_params_.Resize(output_dim);
754  linear_params_.CopyFromMat(mat.Range(0, output_dim, 0, input_dim));
755  bias_params_.CopyColFromMat(mat, input_dim);
756 }
757 
758 void AffineComponent::InitFromConfig(ConfigLine *cfl) {
759  bool ok = true;
760  std::string matrix_filename;
761  int32 input_dim = -1, output_dim = -1;
762  InitLearningRatesFromConfig(cfl);
763  if (cfl->GetValue("matrix", &matrix_filename)) {
764  Init(matrix_filename);
765  if (cfl->GetValue("input-dim", &input_dim))
766  KALDI_ASSERT(input_dim == InputDim() &&
767  "input-dim mismatch vs. matrix.");
768  if (cfl->GetValue("output-dim", &output_dim))
769  KALDI_ASSERT(output_dim == OutputDim() &&
770  "output-dim mismatch vs. matrix.");
771  } else {
772  ok = ok && cfl->GetValue("input-dim", &input_dim);
773  ok = ok && cfl->GetValue("output-dim", &output_dim);
774  BaseFloat param_stddev = 1.0 / std::sqrt(input_dim),
775  bias_stddev = 1.0;
776  cfl->GetValue("param-stddev", &param_stddev);
777  cfl->GetValue("bias-stddev", &bias_stddev);
778  Init(input_dim, output_dim,
779  param_stddev, bias_stddev);
780  }
781  if (cfl->HasUnusedValues())
782  KALDI_ERR << "Could not process these elements in initializer: "
783  << cfl->UnusedValues();
784  if (!ok)
785  KALDI_ERR << "Bad initializer " << cfl->WholeLine();
786 }
787 
788 
789 
790 
791 void AffineComponent::Propagate(const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
792  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in,
793  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *out) const {
794 
795  // No need for asserts as they'll happen within the matrix operations.
796  out->CopyRowsFromVec(bias_params_); // copies bias_params_ to each row
797  // of *out.
798  out->AddMatMat(1.0, in, kNoTrans, linear_params_, kTrans, 1.0);
799 }
800 
801 void AffineComponent::UpdateSimple(const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in_value,
802  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv) {
803  bias_params_.AddRowSumMat(learning_rate_, out_deriv, 1.0);
804  linear_params_.AddMatMat(learning_rate_, out_deriv, kTrans,
805  in_value, kNoTrans, 1.0);
806 }
807 
808 void AffineComponent::Backprop(const std::string &debug_info,
809  const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
810  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in_value,
811  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &, // out_value
812  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv,
813  Component *to_update_in,
814  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *in_deriv) const {
815  AffineComponent *to_update = dynamic_cast<AffineComponent*>(to_update_in);
816 
817  // Propagate the derivative back to the input.
818  // add with coefficient 1.0 since property kBackpropAdds is true.
819  // If we wanted to add with coefficient 0.0 we'd need to zero the
820  // in_deriv, in case of infinities.
821  if (in_deriv)
822  in_deriv->AddMatMat(1.0, out_deriv, kNoTrans, linear_params_, kNoTrans,
823  1.0);
824 
825  if (to_update != NULL) {
826  // Next update the model (must do this 2nd so the derivatives we propagate
827  // are accurate, in case this == to_update_in.)
828  if (to_update->is_gradient_)
829  to_update->UpdateSimple(in_value, out_deriv);
830  else // the call below is to a virtual function that may be re-implemented
831  to_update->Update(debug_info, in_value, out_deriv); // by child classes.
832  }
833 }
834 
835 void AffineComponent::Read(std::istream &is, bool binary) {
836  ReadUpdatableCommon(is, binary); // read opening tag and learning rate.
837  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<LinearParams>");
838  linear_params_.Read(is, binary);
839  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<BiasParams>");
840  bias_params_.Read(is, binary);
841  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<IsGradient>");
842  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &is_gradient_);
843  ExpectToken(is, binary, "</AffineComponent>");
844 }
845 
846 void AffineComponent::Write(std::ostream &os, bool binary) const {
847  WriteUpdatableCommon(os, binary); // Write opening tag and learning rate
848  WriteToken(os, binary, "<LinearParams>");
849  linear_params_.Write(os, binary);
850  WriteToken(os, binary, "<BiasParams>");
851  bias_params_.Write(os, binary);
852  WriteToken(os, binary, "<IsGradient>");
853  WriteBasicType(os, binary, is_gradient_);
854  WriteToken(os, binary, "</AffineComponent>");
855 }
856 
857 int32 AffineComponent::NumParameters() const {
858  return (InputDim() + 1) * OutputDim();
859 }
860 void AffineComponent::Vectorize(VectorBase<BaseFloat> *params) const {
861  KALDI_ASSERT(params->Dim() == this->NumParameters());
862  params->Range(0, InputDim() * OutputDim()).CopyRowsFromMat(linear_params_);
863  params->Range(InputDim() * OutputDim(),
864  OutputDim()).CopyFromVec(bias_params_);
865 }
866 void AffineComponent::UnVectorize(const VectorBase<BaseFloat> &params) {
867  KALDI_ASSERT(params.Dim() == this->NumParameters());
868  linear_params_.CopyRowsFromVec(params.Range(0, InputDim() * OutputDim()));
869  bias_params_.CopyFromVec(params.Range(InputDim() * OutputDim(),
870  OutputDim()));
871 }
872 
873 Component *AffineComponent::CollapseWithNext(
874  const AffineComponent &next_component) const {
875  AffineComponent *ans = dynamic_cast<AffineComponent*>(this->Copy());
876  KALDI_ASSERT(ans != NULL);
877  // Note: it's possible that "ans" is really of a derived type such
878  // as AffineComponentPreconditioned, but this will still work.
879  // the "copy" call will copy things like learning rates, "alpha" value
880  // for preconditioned component, etc.
881  ans->linear_params_.Resize(next_component.OutputDim(), InputDim());
882  ans->bias_params_ = next_component.bias_params_;
883 
884  ans->linear_params_.AddMatMat(1.0, next_component.linear_params_, kNoTrans,
885  this->linear_params_, kNoTrans, 0.0);
886  ans->bias_params_.AddMatVec(1.0, next_component.linear_params_, kNoTrans,
887  this->bias_params_, 1.0);
888  return ans;
889 }
890 
891 Component *AffineComponent::CollapseWithNext(
892  const FixedAffineComponent &next_component) const {
893  // If at least one was non-updatable, make the whole non-updatable.
894  FixedAffineComponent *ans =
895  dynamic_cast<FixedAffineComponent*>(next_component.Copy());
896  KALDI_ASSERT(ans != NULL);
897  ans->linear_params_.Resize(next_component.OutputDim(), InputDim());
898  ans->bias_params_ = next_component.bias_params_;
899 
900  ans->linear_params_.AddMatMat(1.0, next_component.linear_params_, kNoTrans,
901  this->linear_params_, kNoTrans, 0.0);
902  ans->bias_params_.AddMatVec(1.0, next_component.linear_params_, kNoTrans,
903  this->bias_params_, 1.0);
904  return ans;
905 }
906 
907 Component *AffineComponent::CollapseWithNext(
908  const FixedScaleComponent &next_component) const {
909  KALDI_ASSERT(this->OutputDim() == next_component.InputDim());
910  AffineComponent *ans =
911  dynamic_cast<AffineComponent*>(this->Copy());
912  KALDI_ASSERT(ans != NULL);
913  ans->linear_params_.MulRowsVec(next_component.scales_);
914  ans->bias_params_.MulElements(next_component.scales_);
915 
916  return ans;
917 }
918 
919 Component *AffineComponent::CollapseWithPrevious(
920  const FixedAffineComponent &prev_component) const {
921  // If at least one was non-updatable, make the whole non-updatable.
922  FixedAffineComponent *ans =
923  dynamic_cast<FixedAffineComponent*>(prev_component.Copy());
924  KALDI_ASSERT(ans != NULL);
925 
926  ans->linear_params_.Resize(this->OutputDim(), prev_component.InputDim());
927  ans->bias_params_ = this->bias_params_;
928 
929  ans->linear_params_.AddMatMat(1.0, this->linear_params_, kNoTrans,
930  prev_component.linear_params_, kNoTrans, 0.0);
931  ans->bias_params_.AddMatVec(1.0, this->linear_params_, kNoTrans,
932  prev_component.bias_params_, 1.0);
933  return ans;
934 }
935 
936 RepeatedAffineComponent::RepeatedAffineComponent(const RepeatedAffineComponent & component) :
937  UpdatableComponent(component),
938  linear_params_(component.linear_params_),
939  bias_params_(component.bias_params_),
940  num_repeats_(component.num_repeats_) {}
941 
942 
943 void RepeatedAffineComponent::Scale(BaseFloat scale) {
944  linear_params_.Scale(scale);
945  bias_params_.Scale(scale);
946 }
947 
948 void RepeatedAffineComponent::Add(BaseFloat alpha, const Component &other_in) {
949  const RepeatedAffineComponent *other =
950  dynamic_cast<const RepeatedAffineComponent *>(&other_in);
951  KALDI_ASSERT(other != NULL);
952  linear_params_.AddMat(alpha, other->linear_params_);
953  bias_params_.AddVec(alpha, other->bias_params_);
954 }
955 
956 void RepeatedAffineComponent::SetZero(bool treat_as_gradient) {
957  if (treat_as_gradient) {
958  learning_rate_ = 1.0; // don't call SetLearningRate, that would apply the
959  // learning rate factor.
960  is_gradient_ = true;
961  }
962  linear_params_.SetZero();
963  bias_params_.SetZero();
964 }
965 
966 void RepeatedAffineComponent::PerturbParams(BaseFloat stddev){
967  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> temp_linear_params(linear_params_);
968  temp_linear_params.SetRandn();
969  linear_params_.AddMat(stddev, temp_linear_params);
970  CuVector<BaseFloat> temp_bias_params(bias_params_);
971  temp_bias_params.SetRandn();
972  bias_params_.AddVec(stddev, temp_bias_params);
973 }
974 
975 std::string RepeatedAffineComponent::Info() const {
976  std::ostringstream stream;
977  stream << UpdatableComponent::Info()
978  << ", num-repeats=" << num_repeats_;
979  PrintParameterStats(stream, "linear-params", linear_params_);
980  PrintParameterStats(stream, "bias", bias_params_, true);
981  return stream.str();
982 }
983 
984 Component* RepeatedAffineComponent::Copy() const {
985  RepeatedAffineComponent *ans = new RepeatedAffineComponent(*this);
986  return ans;
987 }
988 
989 BaseFloat RepeatedAffineComponent::DotProduct(const UpdatableComponent &other_in) const {
990  const RepeatedAffineComponent *other =
991  dynamic_cast<const RepeatedAffineComponent*>(&other_in);
992  return TraceMatMat(linear_params_, other->linear_params_, kTrans)
993  + VecVec(bias_params_, other->bias_params_);
994 }
995 
996 void RepeatedAffineComponent::Init(int32 input_dim, int32 output_dim, int32 num_repeats,
997  BaseFloat param_stddev, BaseFloat bias_mean,
998  BaseFloat bias_stddev) {
999  KALDI_ASSERT(input_dim % num_repeats == 0 && output_dim % num_repeats == 0);
1000  linear_params_.Resize(output_dim / num_repeats, input_dim / num_repeats);
1001  bias_params_.Resize(output_dim / num_repeats);
1002  num_repeats_ = num_repeats;
1003  KALDI_ASSERT(output_dim > 0 && input_dim > 0 && param_stddev >= 0.0);
1004  linear_params_.SetRandn(); // sets to random normally distributed noise.
1005  linear_params_.Scale(param_stddev);
1006  bias_params_.SetRandn();
1007  bias_params_.Scale(bias_stddev);
1008  bias_params_.Add(bias_mean);
1009  SetNaturalGradientConfigs();
1010 }
1011 
1012 
1013 void RepeatedAffineComponent::InitFromConfig(ConfigLine *cfl) {
1014  bool ok = true;
1015  int32 num_repeats = num_repeats_;
1016  int32 input_dim = -1, output_dim = -1;
1017  InitLearningRatesFromConfig(cfl);
1018  ok = cfl->GetValue("num-repeats", &num_repeats) && ok;
1019  ok = cfl->GetValue("input-dim", &input_dim) && ok;
1020  ok = cfl->GetValue("output-dim", &output_dim) && ok;
1021  KALDI_ASSERT(input_dim % num_repeats == 0 &&
1022  "num-repeats must divide input-dim");
1023  KALDI_ASSERT(output_dim % num_repeats == 0 &&
1024  "num-repeats must divide output-dim");
1025  BaseFloat param_stddev = 1.0 / std::sqrt(input_dim / num_repeats),
1026  bias_mean = 0.0, bias_stddev = 0.0;
1027  cfl->GetValue("param-stddev", &param_stddev);
1028  cfl->GetValue("bias-mean", &bias_mean);
1029  cfl->GetValue("bias-stddev", &bias_stddev);
1030  Init(input_dim, output_dim,
1031  num_repeats, param_stddev, bias_mean, bias_stddev);
1032  if (cfl->HasUnusedValues())
1033  KALDI_ERR << "Could not process these elements in initializer: "
1034  << cfl->UnusedValues();
1035  if (!ok)
1036  KALDI_ERR << "Bad initializer " << cfl->WholeLine();
1037 }
1038 
1039 void RepeatedAffineComponent::Propagate(const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
1040  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in,
1041  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *out) const {
1042 
1043  // No need for asserts as they'll happen within the matrix operations.
1044  int32 block_rows = linear_params_.NumRows();
1045  int32 block_cols = linear_params_.NumCols();
1046 
1047  {
1048  // copy bias_params_ to each row of *out
1049  CuVector<BaseFloat> tmp_repeated_bias(num_repeats_ * bias_params_.Dim(),
1050  kUndefined);
1051  CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> tmp_bias_mat(tmp_repeated_bias.Data(), num_repeats_,
1052  bias_params_.Dim(), bias_params_.Dim());
1053  tmp_bias_mat.CopyRowsFromVec(bias_params_);
1054  out->CopyRowsFromVec(tmp_repeated_bias);
1055  }
1056 
1057  std::vector<CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> *> in_batch, out_batch,
1058  linear_params_batch;
1059  CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>* params_elem =
1060  new CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>(linear_params_.ColRange(0, block_cols));
1061 
1062  //split the in and out mat into blocks.
1063  for (int i = 0; i < num_repeats_; i++) {
1064  in_batch.push_back(new CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>(in.ColRange(
1065  i * block_cols, block_cols)));
1066  out_batch.push_back(new CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>(
1067  out->ColRange(i * block_rows, block_rows)));
1068  linear_params_batch.push_back(params_elem);
1069  }
1070  AddMatMatBatched<BaseFloat>(1.0, out_batch, in_batch, kNoTrans,
1071  linear_params_batch, kTrans, 1.0);
1072  delete params_elem;
1073  DeletePointers(&in_batch);
1074  DeletePointers(&out_batch);
1075 }
1076 
1077 void RepeatedAffineComponent::Backprop(const std::string &debug_info,
1078  const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
1079  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in_value,
1080  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &, // out_value
1081  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv,
1082  Component *to_update_in,
1083  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *in_deriv) const {
1084  RepeatedAffineComponent *to_update = dynamic_cast<RepeatedAffineComponent*>(to_update_in);
1085 
1086  // Propagate the derivative back to the input.
1087  // add with coefficient 1.0 since property kBackpropAdds is true.
1088  // If we wanted to add with coefficient 0.0 we'd need to zero the
1089  // in_deriv, in case of infinities.
1090  if (in_deriv) {
1091  int32 block_rows = linear_params_.NumRows();
1092  int32 block_cols = linear_params_.NumCols();
1093  std::vector<CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> *> in_deriv_batch, out_deriv_batch,
1094  linear_params_batch;
1095  CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>* params_elem =
1096  new CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>(linear_params_.ColRange(0, block_cols));
1097 
1098  //split the out_deriv and the in_deriv mat into blocks.
1099  for (int i = 0; i < num_repeats_; i++) {
1100  in_deriv_batch.push_back(new CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>(in_deriv->ColRange(
1101  i * block_cols, block_cols)));
1102  out_deriv_batch.push_back(new CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>(out_deriv.ColRange(
1103  i * block_rows, block_rows)));
1104  linear_params_batch.push_back(params_elem);
1105  }
1106 
1107  AddMatMatBatched<BaseFloat>(1.0, in_deriv_batch, out_deriv_batch, kNoTrans,
1108  linear_params_batch, kNoTrans, 1.0);
1109  delete params_elem;
1110  DeletePointers(&in_deriv_batch);
1111  DeletePointers(&out_deriv_batch);
1112  }
1113 
1114  // Next update the model (must do this 2nd so the derivatives we propagate are
1115  // accurate, in case this == to_update_in.)
1116  if (to_update != NULL)
1117  to_update->Update(in_value, out_deriv);
1118 }
1119 
1120 void RepeatedAffineComponent::Update(const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in_value,
1121  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv) {
1122  int32 block_rows = linear_params_.NumRows();
1123  int32 block_cols = linear_params_.NumCols();
1124  std::vector<CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> *> in_value_batch,
1125  out_deriv_batch, linear_params_deriv_batch;
1126  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> linear_params_deriv_repeated(
1127  block_rows * num_repeats_, block_cols);
1128 
1129  for (int i = 0; i < num_repeats_; i++) {
1130  in_value_batch.push_back(new CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>(in_value.ColRange(
1131  i * block_cols, block_cols)));
1132  out_deriv_batch.push_back(new CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>(out_deriv.ColRange(
1133  i * block_rows, block_rows)));
1134  linear_params_deriv_batch.push_back(
1135  new CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>(linear_params_deriv_repeated.RowRange(
1136  i * block_rows, block_rows)));
1137  }
1138  AddMatMatBatched<BaseFloat>(learning_rate_,
1139  linear_params_deriv_batch,
1140  out_deriv_batch, kTrans,
1141  in_value_batch, kNoTrans, 0.0);
1142 
1143  { // sum up the repeated blocks of pieces of derivative (from
1144  // linear_params_deriv_repeated) into linear_params_. We do this without
1145  // the use of loops by means of a little fakery, viewing
1146  // linear_params_deriv_repeated as a matrix with a larger stride than it
1147  // really has to sum up its rows. This may generate some spurious
1148  // valgrind/memcheck warnings due to accessing the memory in between rows
1149  // of a matrix that has been allocated using cudaMallocPitch.
1150  // view linear_params_deriv_repeated as a matrix where each row
1151  // corresponds to one repeat.
1152 
1153  // usage of linear_params_deriv_repeated.Stride() instead of
1154  // linear_params_.Stride() is important here. CUDA does not guarantee
1155  // that two matrices of the same number of columns
1156  // (linear_params_deriv_repeated and linear_params_) have the same stride.
1157  // i.e., we cannot reliably do:
1158  // KALDI_ASSERT(linear_params_.Stride() == linear_params_deriv_repeated.Stride())
1159  int32 size_as_vector =
1160  (linear_params_.NumRows() - 1) * linear_params_deriv_repeated.Stride() +
1161  linear_params_.NumCols(),
1162  stride_as_matrix = linear_params_.NumRows() * linear_params_deriv_repeated.Stride();
1163  CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> linear_params_deriv_repeated_as_mat(
1164  linear_params_deriv_repeated.Data(), num_repeats_,
1165  size_as_vector, stride_as_matrix);
1166  // add all remaining rows to the first row, of
1167  // linear_params_deriv_repeated_as_mat
1168  if (num_repeats_ > 1)
1169  linear_params_deriv_repeated_as_mat.Row(0).AddRowSumMat(
1170  1.0, linear_params_deriv_repeated_as_mat.RowRange(1,
1171  num_repeats_ - 1));
1172  linear_params_.AddMat(1.0, linear_params_deriv_repeated.RowRange(
1173  0, linear_params_.NumRows()));
1174  }
1175 
1176  { // deal with the derivative w.r.t. the bias.
1177  CuVector<BaseFloat> repeated_bias_deriv(
1178  num_repeats_ * bias_params_.Dim());
1179  repeated_bias_deriv.AddRowSumMat(1.0, out_deriv, 0.0);
1180  CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> bias_deriv_mat(repeated_bias_deriv.Data(),
1181  num_repeats_, bias_params_.Dim(), // num rows, num cols
1182  bias_params_.Dim()); // stride
1183  bias_params_.AddRowSumMat(learning_rate_,
1184  bias_deriv_mat);
1185  }
1186  DeletePointers(&in_value_batch);
1187  DeletePointers(&out_deriv_batch);
1188  DeletePointers(&linear_params_deriv_batch);
1189 }
1190 
1191 void RepeatedAffineComponent::Read(std::istream &is, bool binary) {
1192  // This Read function also works for NaturalGradientRepeatedAffineComponent.
1193  ReadUpdatableCommon(is, binary); // read opening tag and learning rate.
1194  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<NumRepeats>");
1195  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &num_repeats_);
1196  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<LinearParams>");
1197  linear_params_.Read(is, binary);
1198  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<BiasParams>");
1199  bias_params_.Read(is, binary);
1200  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<IsGradient>");
1201  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &is_gradient_);
1202  ExpectToken(is, binary, std::string("</") + Type() + std::string(">"));
1203  SetNaturalGradientConfigs();
1204 }
1205 
1206 void RepeatedAffineComponent::Write(std::ostream &os, bool binary) const {
1207  // This Write function also works for NaturalGradientRepeatedAffineComponent.
1208  WriteUpdatableCommon(os, binary); // Write opening tag and learning rate
1209  WriteToken(os, binary, "<NumRepeats>");
1210  WriteBasicType(os, binary, num_repeats_);
1211  WriteToken(os, binary, "<LinearParams>");
1212  linear_params_.Write(os, binary);
1213  WriteToken(os, binary, "<BiasParams>");
1214  bias_params_.Write(os, binary);
1215  WriteToken(os, binary, "<IsGradient>");
1216  WriteBasicType(os, binary, is_gradient_);
1217  // write closing token.
1218  WriteToken(os, binary, std::string("</") + Type() + std::string(">"));
1219 }
1220 
1221 int32 RepeatedAffineComponent::NumParameters() const {
1222  // Note: unlike AffineComponent, InputDim() & OutputDim() are not used here and below,
1223  // for they are multipled by num_repeats_.
1224  return linear_params_.NumCols() * linear_params_.NumRows() + bias_params_.Dim();
1225 }
1226 
1227 void RepeatedAffineComponent::Vectorize(VectorBase<BaseFloat> *params) const {
1228  KALDI_ASSERT(params->Dim() == this->NumParameters());
1229  params->Range(0, linear_params_.NumCols() * linear_params_.NumRows()).CopyRowsFromMat(linear_params_);
1230  params->Range(linear_params_.NumCols() * linear_params_.NumRows(),
1231  bias_params_.Dim()).CopyFromVec(bias_params_);
1232 }
1233 
1234 void RepeatedAffineComponent::UnVectorize(const VectorBase<BaseFloat> &params) {
1235  KALDI_ASSERT(params.Dim() == this->NumParameters());
1236  linear_params_.CopyRowsFromVec(params.Range(0, linear_params_.NumCols() * linear_params_.NumRows()));
1237  bias_params_.CopyFromVec(params.Range(linear_params_.NumCols() * linear_params_.NumRows(),
1238  bias_params_.Dim()));
1239 }
1240 
1241 void NaturalGradientRepeatedAffineComponent::SetNaturalGradientConfigs() {
1242  int32 rank_in = 40;
1243  int32 input_dim = linear_params_.NumCols();
1244  if (rank_in > input_dim / 2)
1245  rank_in = input_dim / 2;
1246  if (rank_in < 1)
1247  rank_in = 1;
1248  preconditioner_in_.SetRank(rank_in);
1249  preconditioner_in_.SetUpdatePeriod(4);
1250 }
1251 
1252 NaturalGradientRepeatedAffineComponent::NaturalGradientRepeatedAffineComponent(
1253  const NaturalGradientRepeatedAffineComponent &other):
1254  RepeatedAffineComponent(other),
1255  preconditioner_in_(other.preconditioner_in_) { }
1256 
1257 // virtual
1258 Component* NaturalGradientRepeatedAffineComponent::Copy() const {
1259  return new NaturalGradientRepeatedAffineComponent(*this);
1260 }
1261 
1262 void NaturalGradientRepeatedAffineComponent::Update(
1263  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in_value,
1264  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv) {
1265  int32 block_rows = linear_params_.NumRows();
1266  int32 block_cols = linear_params_.NumCols();
1267  std::vector<CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> *> in_value_batch,
1268  out_deriv_batch, linear_params_deriv_batch;
1269 
1270  // params_deriv_repeated as as linear_params_deriv_repeated below,
1271  // but with an extra column which will come in useful when dealing with
1272  // the biases.
1273  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> params_deriv_repeated(
1274  block_rows * num_repeats_, block_cols + 1);
1275  CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> linear_params_deriv_repeated(
1276  params_deriv_repeated, 0, params_deriv_repeated.NumRows(),
1277  0, block_cols);
1278  // params_deriv will becomes the derivative w.r.t the parameters,
1279  // with the derivative w.r.t. the bias as the last column.
1280  CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> params_deriv(params_deriv_repeated, 0, block_rows,
1281  0, block_cols + 1);
1282 
1283  for (int i = 0; i < num_repeats_; i++) {
1284  in_value_batch.push_back(new CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>(in_value.ColRange(
1285  i * block_cols, block_cols)));
1286  out_deriv_batch.push_back(new CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>(out_deriv.ColRange(
1287  i * block_rows, block_rows)));
1288  linear_params_deriv_batch.push_back(
1289  new CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>(linear_params_deriv_repeated.RowRange(
1290  i * block_rows, block_rows)));
1291  }
1292  AddMatMatBatched<BaseFloat>(1.0,
1293  linear_params_deriv_batch,
1294  out_deriv_batch, kTrans,
1295  in_value_batch, kNoTrans, 0.0);
1296 
1297  { // sum up the repeated blocks of pieces of derivative (from
1298  // linear_params_deriv_repeated) into the first block
1299  // of linear_params_deriv_repeated. We do this without
1300  // the use of loops by means of a little fakery, viewing
1301  // linear_params_deriv_repeated as a matrix with a larger stride than it
1302  // really has to sum up its rows. This may generate some spurious
1303  // valgrind/memcheck warnings due to accessing the memory in between rows
1304  // of a matrix that has been allocated using cudaMallocPitch.
1305  // view linear_params_deriv_repeated as a matrix where each row
1306  // corresponds to one repeat.
1307 
1308  // usage of linear_params_deriv_repeated.Stride() instead of
1309  // linear_params_.Stride() is important here. CUDA does not guarantee
1310  // that two matrices of the same number of columns
1311  // (linear_params_deriv_repeated and linear_params_) have the same stride.
1312  // i.e., we cannot reliably do:
1313  // KALDI_ASSERT(linear_params_.Stride() == linear_params_deriv_repeated.Stride())
1314  int32 size_as_vector =
1315  (linear_params_.NumRows() - 1) * linear_params_deriv_repeated.Stride() +
1316  linear_params_.NumCols(),
1317  stride_as_matrix = linear_params_.NumRows() * linear_params_deriv_repeated.Stride();
1318  CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> linear_params_deriv_repeated_as_mat(
1319  linear_params_deriv_repeated.Data(), num_repeats_,
1320  size_as_vector, stride_as_matrix);
1321  // add all remaining rows to the first row of
1322  // linear_params_deriv_repeated_as_mat [i.e. add all but the 1st block to the 1st block]
1323  if (num_repeats_ > 1)
1324  linear_params_deriv_repeated_as_mat.Row(0).AddRowSumMat(
1325  1.0, linear_params_deriv_repeated_as_mat.RowRange(1,
1326  num_repeats_ - 1));
1327  }
1328 
1329  CuVector<BaseFloat> repeated_bias_deriv(
1330  num_repeats_ * bias_params_.Dim());
1331  { // deal with the derivative w.r.t. the bias.
1332  repeated_bias_deriv.AddRowSumMat(1.0, out_deriv, 0.0);
1333  CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> bias_deriv_mat(repeated_bias_deriv.Data(),
1334  num_repeats_, bias_params_.Dim(), // num rows, num cols
1335  bias_params_.Dim()); // stride
1336  // Add all but the first row of bias_deriv_mat, to the first row.
1337  if (num_repeats_ > 1)
1338  bias_deriv_mat.Row(0).AddRowSumMat(
1339  1.0, bias_deriv_mat.RowRange(1, num_repeats_ - 1));
1340 
1341  // copy the summed bias-derivative to the last column of the matrix
1342  // 'params_deriv'.
1343  params_deriv.CopyColFromVec(bias_deriv_mat.Row(0), block_cols);
1344  }
1345 
1346  BaseFloat scale = 1.0;
1347  if (!is_gradient_) {
1348  // Only apply the preconditioning/natural-gradient if we're not computing
1349  // the exact gradient.
1350  preconditioner_in_.PreconditionDirections(&params_deriv, NULL, &scale);
1351  }
1352  linear_params_.AddMat(learning_rate_ * scale,
1353  params_deriv.ColRange(0, block_cols));
1354  // there is no function to add a column of a matrix to a vector, so use a
1355  // temporary vector [re-using some memory we already allocated.]
1356  CuSubVector<BaseFloat> bias_direction(repeated_bias_deriv.Data(),
1357  bias_params_.Dim());
1358  bias_direction.CopyColFromMat(params_deriv, block_cols);
1359  bias_params_.AddVec(learning_rate_ * scale, bias_direction);
1360 
1361  DeletePointers(&in_value_batch);
1362  DeletePointers(&out_deriv_batch);
1363  DeletePointers(&linear_params_deriv_batch);
1364 }
1365 
1366 BlockAffineComponent::BlockAffineComponent(const BlockAffineComponent &other) :
1367  UpdatableComponent(other),
1368  linear_params_(other.linear_params_),
1369  bias_params_(other.bias_params_),
1370  num_blocks_(other.num_blocks_) {}
1371 
1372 Component* BlockAffineComponent::Copy() const {
1373  BlockAffineComponent *ans = new BlockAffineComponent(*this);
1374  return ans;
1375 }
1376 
1377 std::string BlockAffineComponent::Info() const {
1378  std::ostringstream stream;
1379  stream << UpdatableComponent::Info()
1380  << ", num-blocks=" << num_blocks_;
1381  PrintParameterStats(stream, "linear-params", linear_params_);
1382  PrintParameterStats(stream, "bias", bias_params_, true);
1383  return stream.str();
1384 }
1385 
1386 void BlockAffineComponent::Init(int32 input_dim,
1387  int32 output_dim, int32 num_blocks,
1388  BaseFloat param_stddev, BaseFloat bias_mean,
1389  BaseFloat bias_stddev) {
1390  KALDI_ASSERT(input_dim > 0 && output_dim > 0 && num_blocks >= 1);
1391  KALDI_ASSERT(output_dim % num_blocks == 0 && input_dim % num_blocks == 0);
1392  const int32 num_columns_per_block = input_dim / num_blocks;
1393  linear_params_.Resize(output_dim, num_columns_per_block);
1394  bias_params_.Resize(output_dim);
1395  KALDI_ASSERT(param_stddev >= 0.0 && bias_stddev >= 0.0);
1396  linear_params_.SetRandn();
1397  linear_params_.Scale(param_stddev);
1398  bias_params_.SetRandn();
1399  bias_params_.Scale(bias_stddev);
1400  bias_params_.Add(bias_mean);
1401  num_blocks_ = num_blocks;
1402 }
1403 
1404 void BlockAffineComponent::InitFromConfig(ConfigLine *cfl) {
1405  int32 input_dim = -1, output_dim = -1, num_blocks = -1;
1406  if(!cfl->GetValue("input-dim", &input_dim) ||
1407  !cfl->GetValue("output-dim", &output_dim) ||
1408  !cfl->GetValue("num-blocks", &num_blocks))
1409  KALDI_ERR << "Invalid initializer for layer of type "
1410  << Type() << ": \"" << cfl->WholeLine() << "\"";
1411  InitLearningRatesFromConfig(cfl);
1412  BaseFloat param_stddev = 1.0 / std::sqrt(input_dim / num_blocks),
1413  bias_mean = 0.0, bias_stddev = 1.0;
1414  cfl->GetValue("param-stddev", &param_stddev);
1415  cfl->GetValue("bias-stddev", &bias_stddev);
1416  cfl->GetValue("bias-mean", &bias_mean);
1417 
1418  if (cfl->HasUnusedValues())
1419  KALDI_ERR << "Invalid initializer for layer of type "
1420  << Type() << ": \"" << cfl->WholeLine() << "\"";
1421 
1422  Init(input_dim, output_dim, num_blocks,
1423  param_stddev, bias_mean, bias_stddev);
1424 }
1425 
1426 void BlockAffineComponent::Propagate(const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
1427  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in,
1428  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *out) const {
1429  out->CopyRowsFromVec(bias_params_);
1430  // block_dimension is both the number of columns, and the number of rows,
1431  // of a block.
1432  int32 num_rows_in_block = linear_params_.NumRows() / num_blocks_;
1433  int32 num_cols_in_block = linear_params_.NumCols();
1434  std::vector<CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> *> in_batch, out_batch,
1435  linear_params_batch;
1436  for(int block_counter = 0; block_counter < num_blocks_; block_counter++) {
1437  CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> *in_block =
1438  new CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>(in.ColRange(block_counter * num_cols_in_block,
1439  num_cols_in_block));
1440  in_batch.push_back(in_block);
1441 
1442  CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> *out_block =
1443  new CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>(out->ColRange(block_counter * num_rows_in_block,
1444  num_rows_in_block));
1445  out_batch.push_back(out_block);
1446 
1447  CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> *linear_params_block =
1448  new CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>(linear_params_.RowRange(block_counter * num_rows_in_block,
1449  num_rows_in_block));
1450  linear_params_batch.push_back(linear_params_block);
1451  }
1452  AddMatMatBatched<BaseFloat>(1.0, out_batch, in_batch, kNoTrans,
1453  linear_params_batch, kTrans, 1.0);
1454 
1455  DeletePointers(&in_batch);
1456  DeletePointers(&out_batch);
1457  DeletePointers(&linear_params_batch);
1458 }
1459 
1460 void BlockAffineComponent::Backprop(const std::string &debug_info,
1461  const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
1462  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in_value,
1463  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &, // out_value
1464  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv,
1465  Component *to_update_in,
1466  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *in_deriv) const {
1467  BlockAffineComponent *to_update = dynamic_cast<BlockAffineComponent*>(to_update_in);
1468 
1469  const int32 num_rows_in_block = linear_params_.NumRows() / num_blocks_;
1470  const int32 num_cols_in_block = linear_params_.NumCols();
1471 
1472  // Propagate the derivative back to the input.
1473  // add with coefficient 1.0 since property kBackpropAdds is true.
1474  // If we wanted to add with coefficient 0.0 we'd need to zero the
1475  // in_deriv, in case of infinities.
1476  if (in_deriv) {
1477  std::vector<CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> *> in_deriv_batch, out_deriv_batch, linear_params_batch;
1478 
1479  for(int block_counter = 0; block_counter < num_blocks_; block_counter++) {
1480  CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> *in_deriv_block =
1481  new CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>(in_deriv->ColRange(block_counter * num_cols_in_block,
1482  num_cols_in_block));
1483  in_deriv_batch.push_back(in_deriv_block);
1484 
1485  CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> *out_deriv_block =
1486  new CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>(out_deriv.ColRange(block_counter * num_rows_in_block,
1487  num_rows_in_block));
1488  out_deriv_batch.push_back(out_deriv_block);
1489 
1490  CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> *linear_params_block =
1491  new CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>(linear_params_.RowRange(block_counter * num_rows_in_block,
1492  num_rows_in_block));
1493  linear_params_batch.push_back(linear_params_block);
1494  }
1495 
1496  AddMatMatBatched<BaseFloat>(1.0, in_deriv_batch, out_deriv_batch, kNoTrans,
1497  linear_params_batch, kNoTrans, 1.0);
1498 
1499  DeletePointers(&in_deriv_batch);
1500  DeletePointers(&out_deriv_batch);
1501  DeletePointers(&linear_params_batch);
1502  }
1503 
1504  if (to_update != NULL) {
1505 
1506  { // linear params update
1507 
1508  std::vector<CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> *> in_value_batch,
1509  out_deriv_batch, linear_params_batch;
1510 
1511  for (int block_counter = 0; block_counter < num_blocks_; block_counter++) {
1512  CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> *in_value_block =
1513  new CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>(in_value.ColRange(block_counter * num_cols_in_block,
1514  num_cols_in_block));
1515  in_value_batch.push_back(in_value_block);
1516 
1517  CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> *out_deriv_block =
1518  new CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>(out_deriv.ColRange(block_counter * num_rows_in_block,
1519  num_rows_in_block));
1520  out_deriv_batch.push_back(out_deriv_block);
1521 
1522  CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> *linear_params_block =
1523  new CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>(to_update->linear_params_.RowRange(block_counter * num_rows_in_block,
1524  num_rows_in_block));
1525  linear_params_batch.push_back(linear_params_block);
1526  }
1527 
1528  AddMatMatBatched<BaseFloat>(to_update->learning_rate_,
1529  linear_params_batch,
1530  out_deriv_batch, kTrans,
1531  in_value_batch, kNoTrans, 1.0);
1532 
1533  DeletePointers(&in_value_batch);
1534  DeletePointers(&out_deriv_batch);
1535  DeletePointers(&linear_params_batch);
1536  } // end linear params update
1537 
1538  { // bias update
1539  to_update->bias_params_.AddRowSumMat(to_update->learning_rate_,
1540  out_deriv, 1.0);
1541  } // end bias update
1542  }
1543 }
1544 
1545 void BlockAffineComponent::Scale(BaseFloat scale) {
1546  linear_params_.Scale(scale);
1547  bias_params_.Scale(scale);
1548 }
1549 
1550 void BlockAffineComponent::Add(BaseFloat alpha, const Component &other_in) {
1551  const BlockAffineComponent *other =
1552  dynamic_cast<const BlockAffineComponent *>(&other_in);
1553  KALDI_ASSERT(other != NULL);
1554  linear_params_.AddMat(alpha, other->linear_params_);
1555  bias_params_.AddVec(alpha, other->bias_params_);
1556 }
1557 
1558 void BlockAffineComponent::SetZero(bool treat_as_gradient) {
1559  if (treat_as_gradient) {
1560  learning_rate_ = 1.0; // don't call SetLearningRate, that would apply the
1561  // learning rate factor.
1562  is_gradient_ = true;
1563  }
1564  linear_params_.SetZero();
1565  bias_params_.SetZero();
1566 }
1567 
1568 void BlockAffineComponent::PerturbParams(BaseFloat stddev) {
1569  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> temp_linear_params(linear_params_);
1570  temp_linear_params.SetRandn();
1571  linear_params_.AddMat(stddev, temp_linear_params);
1572 
1573  CuVector<BaseFloat> temp_bias_params(bias_params_);
1574  temp_bias_params.SetRandn();
1575  bias_params_.AddVec(stddev, temp_bias_params);
1576 }
1577 
1578 BaseFloat BlockAffineComponent::DotProduct(const UpdatableComponent &other_in) const {
1579  const BlockAffineComponent *other =
1580  dynamic_cast<const BlockAffineComponent*>(&other_in);
1581  return TraceMatMat(linear_params_, other->linear_params_, kTrans) +
1582  VecVec(bias_params_, other->bias_params_);
1583 }
1584 
1585 void BlockAffineComponent::Read(std::istream &is, bool binary) {
1586  ReadUpdatableCommon(is, binary); // read opening tag and learning rate.
1587  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<NumBlocks>");
1588  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &num_blocks_);
1589  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<LinearParams>");
1590  linear_params_.Read(is, binary);
1591  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<BiasParams>");
1592  bias_params_.Read(is, binary);
1593  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<IsGradient>");
1594  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &is_gradient_);
1595  ExpectToken(is, binary, "</BlockAffineComponent>");
1596 }
1597 
1598 void BlockAffineComponent::Write(std::ostream &os, bool binary) const {
1599  WriteUpdatableCommon(os, binary); // Write opening tag and learning rate
1600  WriteToken(os, binary, "<NumBlocks>");
1601  WriteBasicType(os, binary, num_blocks_);
1602  WriteToken(os, binary, "<LinearParams>");
1603  linear_params_.Write(os, binary);
1604  WriteToken(os, binary, "<BiasParams>");
1605  bias_params_.Write(os, binary);
1606  WriteToken(os, binary, "<IsGradient>");
1607  WriteBasicType(os, binary, is_gradient_);
1608  WriteToken(os, binary, "</BlockAffineComponent>");
1609 }
1610 
1611 int32 BlockAffineComponent::NumParameters() const {
1612  return linear_params_.NumCols() * linear_params_.NumRows() + bias_params_.Dim();
1613 }
1614 
1615 void BlockAffineComponent::Vectorize(VectorBase<BaseFloat> *params) const {
1616  KALDI_ASSERT(params->Dim() == this->NumParameters());
1617  int32 num_linear_params = linear_params_.NumCols() * linear_params_.NumRows();
1618  int32 num_bias_params = bias_params_.Dim();
1619  params->Range(0, num_linear_params).CopyRowsFromMat(linear_params_);
1620  params->Range(num_linear_params, num_bias_params).CopyFromVec(bias_params_);
1621 }
1622 
1623 void BlockAffineComponent::UnVectorize(const VectorBase<BaseFloat> &params) {
1624  KALDI_ASSERT(params.Dim() == this->NumParameters());
1625  int32 num_linear_params = linear_params_.NumCols() * linear_params_.NumRows();
1626  int32 num_bias_params = bias_params_.Dim();
1627  linear_params_.CopyRowsFromVec(params.Range(0, num_linear_params));
1628  bias_params_.CopyFromVec(params.Range(num_linear_params, num_bias_params));
1629 }
1630 
1631 void PerElementScaleComponent::Scale(BaseFloat scale) {
1632  scales_.Scale(scale);
1633 }
1634 
1635 void PerElementScaleComponent::Add(BaseFloat alpha,
1636  const Component &other_in) {
1637  const PerElementScaleComponent *other =
1638  dynamic_cast<const PerElementScaleComponent*>(&other_in);
1639  KALDI_ASSERT(other != NULL);
1640  scales_.AddVec(alpha, other->scales_);
1641 }
1642 
1643 PerElementScaleComponent::PerElementScaleComponent(
1644  const PerElementScaleComponent &component):
1645  UpdatableComponent(component),
1646  scales_(component.scales_) { }
1647 
1648 void PerElementScaleComponent::SetZero(bool treat_as_gradient) {
1649  if (treat_as_gradient) {
1650  learning_rate_ = 1.0; // don't call SetLearningRate, that would apply the
1651  // learning rate factor.
1652  is_gradient_ = true;
1653  }
1654  scales_.SetZero();
1655 }
1656 
1657 void PerElementScaleComponent::PerturbParams(BaseFloat stddev) {
1658  CuVector<BaseFloat> temp_scales(scales_.Dim(), kUndefined);
1659  temp_scales.SetRandn();
1660  scales_.AddVec(stddev, temp_scales);
1661 }
1662 
1663 std::string PerElementScaleComponent::Info() const {
1664  std::ostringstream stream;
1665  stream << UpdatableComponent::Info()
1666  << ", scales-min=" << scales_.Min()
1667  << ", scales-max=" << scales_.Max();
1668  PrintParameterStats(stream, "scales", scales_, true);
1669  return stream.str();
1670 }
1671 
1672 Component* PerElementScaleComponent::Copy() const {
1673  PerElementScaleComponent *ans = new PerElementScaleComponent();
1674  ans->learning_rate_ = learning_rate_;
1675  ans->scales_ = scales_;
1676  ans->is_gradient_ = is_gradient_;
1677  return ans;
1678 }
1679 
1680 BaseFloat PerElementScaleComponent::DotProduct(
1681  const UpdatableComponent &other_in) const {
1682  const PerElementScaleComponent *other =
1683  dynamic_cast<const PerElementScaleComponent*>(&other_in);
1684  return VecVec(scales_, other->scales_);
1685 }
1686 
1687 void PerElementScaleComponent::Init(int32 dim,
1688  BaseFloat param_mean,
1689  BaseFloat param_stddev) {
1690  KALDI_ASSERT(dim > 0 && param_stddev >= 0.0);
1691  scales_.Resize(dim);
1692  scales_.SetRandn();
1693  scales_.Scale(param_stddev);
1694  scales_.Add(param_mean);
1695 }
1696 
1697 void PerElementScaleComponent::Init(std::string vector_filename) {
1698  CuVector<BaseFloat> vec;
1699  ReadKaldiObject(vector_filename, &vec); // will abort on failure.
1700  scales_.Resize(vec.Dim());
1701  scales_.CopyFromVec(vec);
1702 }
1703 
1704 void PerElementScaleComponent::InitFromConfig(ConfigLine *cfl) {
1705  std::string vector_filename;
1706  int32 dim = -1;
1707  InitLearningRatesFromConfig(cfl);
1708  if (cfl->GetValue("vector", &vector_filename)) {
1709  Init(vector_filename);
1710  if (cfl->GetValue("dim", &dim))
1711  KALDI_ASSERT(dim == InputDim() &&
1712  "input-dim mismatch vs. vector.");
1713  } else {
1714  if(!cfl->GetValue("dim", &dim))
1715  KALDI_ERR << "'dim' not provided in the config line.";
1716  BaseFloat param_mean = 1.0, param_stddev = 0.0;
1717  cfl->GetValue("param-mean", &param_mean);
1718  cfl->GetValue("param-stddev", &param_stddev);
1719  Init(dim, param_mean, param_stddev);
1720  }
1721  if (cfl->HasUnusedValues())
1722  KALDI_ERR << "Could not process these elements in initializer: "
1723  << cfl->UnusedValues();
1724 }
1725 
1726 void PerElementScaleComponent::Propagate(
1727  const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
1728  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in,
1729  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *out) const {
1730  out->CopyFromMat(in);
1731  out->MulColsVec(scales_);
1732 }
1733 
1734 void PerElementScaleComponent::UpdateSimple(
1735  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in_value,
1736  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv) {
1737  scales_.AddDiagMatMat(learning_rate_, out_deriv, kTrans,
1738  in_value, kNoTrans, 1.0);
1739 }
1740 
1741 void PerElementScaleComponent::Backprop(
1742  const std::string &debug_info,
1743  const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
1744  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in_value,
1745  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &, // out_value
1746  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv,
1747  Component *to_update_in,
1748  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *in_deriv) const {
1749  PerElementScaleComponent *to_update =
1750  dynamic_cast<PerElementScaleComponent*>(to_update_in);
1751 
1752  if (in_deriv) {
1753  // Propagate the derivative back to the input.
1754  in_deriv->CopyFromMat(out_deriv);
1755  in_deriv->MulColsVec(scales_);
1756  }
1757 
1758  if (to_update != NULL) {
1759  // Next update the model (must do this 2nd so the derivatives we propagate
1760  // are accurate, in case this == to_update_in.)
1761  if (to_update->is_gradient_)
1762  to_update->UpdateSimple(in_value, out_deriv);
1763  else // the call below is to a virtual function that may be re-implemented
1764  to_update->Update(debug_info, in_value, out_deriv); // by child classes.
1765  }
1766 }
1767 
1768 void PerElementScaleComponent::Read(std::istream &is, bool binary) {
1769  ReadUpdatableCommon(is, binary); // Read opening tag and learning rate.
1770  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<Params>");
1771  scales_.Read(is, binary);
1772  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<IsGradient>");
1773  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &is_gradient_);
1774  ExpectToken(is, binary, "</PerElementScaleComponent>");
1775 }
1776 
1777 void PerElementScaleComponent::Write(std::ostream &os, bool binary) const {
1778  WriteUpdatableCommon(os, binary); // Write opening tag and learning rate.
1779  WriteToken(os, binary, "<Params>");
1780  scales_.Write(os, binary);
1781  WriteToken(os, binary, "<IsGradient>");
1782  WriteBasicType(os, binary, is_gradient_);
1783  WriteToken(os, binary, "</PerElementScaleComponent>");
1784 }
1785 
1786 int32 PerElementScaleComponent::NumParameters() const {
1787  return InputDim();
1788 }
1789 
1790 void PerElementScaleComponent::Vectorize(VectorBase<BaseFloat> *params) const {
1791  params->CopyFromVec(scales_);
1792 }
1793 
1794 void PerElementScaleComponent::UnVectorize(
1795  const VectorBase<BaseFloat> &params) {
1796  scales_.CopyFromVec(params);
1797 }
1798 
1799 void PerElementOffsetComponent::Scale(BaseFloat scale) {
1800  offsets_.Scale(scale);
1801 }
1802 
1803 
1804 void PerElementOffsetComponent::Add(BaseFloat alpha,
1805  const Component &other_in) {
1806  const PerElementOffsetComponent *other =
1807  dynamic_cast<const PerElementOffsetComponent*>(&other_in);
1808  KALDI_ASSERT(other != NULL);
1809  offsets_.AddVec(alpha, other->offsets_);
1810 }
1811 
1812 PerElementOffsetComponent::PerElementOffsetComponent(
1813  const PerElementOffsetComponent &component):
1814  UpdatableComponent(component),
1815  offsets_(component.offsets_) { }
1816 
1817 void PerElementOffsetComponent::SetZero(bool treat_as_gradient) {
1818  if (treat_as_gradient) {
1819  learning_rate_ = 1.0; // don't call SetLearningRate, that would apply the
1820  // learning rate factor.
1821  is_gradient_ = true;
1822  }
1823  offsets_.SetZero();
1824 }
1825 
1826 void PerElementOffsetComponent::PerturbParams(BaseFloat stddev) {
1827  CuVector<BaseFloat> temp_offsets(offsets_.Dim(), kUndefined);
1828  temp_offsets.SetRandn();
1829  offsets_.AddVec(stddev, temp_offsets);
1830 }
1831 
1832 std::string PerElementOffsetComponent::Info() const {
1833  std::ostringstream stream;
1834  stream << UpdatableComponent::Info()
1835  << ", offsets-min=" << offsets_.Min()
1836  << ", offsets-max=" << offsets_.Max();
1837  PrintParameterStats(stream, "offsets", offsets_, true);
1838  return stream.str();
1839 }
1840 
1841 Component* PerElementOffsetComponent::Copy() const {
1842  PerElementOffsetComponent *ans = new PerElementOffsetComponent();
1843  ans->learning_rate_ = learning_rate_;
1844  ans->offsets_ = offsets_;
1845  ans->is_gradient_ = is_gradient_;
1846  return ans;
1847 }
1848 
1849 BaseFloat PerElementOffsetComponent::DotProduct(
1850  const UpdatableComponent &other_in) const {
1851  const PerElementOffsetComponent *other =
1852  dynamic_cast<const PerElementOffsetComponent*>(&other_in);
1853  return VecVec(offsets_, other->offsets_);
1854 }
1855 
1856 void PerElementOffsetComponent::Init(int32 dim,
1857  BaseFloat param_mean,
1858  BaseFloat param_stddev) {
1859  KALDI_ASSERT(dim > 0 && param_stddev >= 0.0);
1860  offsets_.Resize(dim);
1861  offsets_.SetRandn();
1862  offsets_.Scale(param_stddev);
1863  offsets_.Add(param_mean);
1864 }
1865 
1866 void PerElementOffsetComponent::Init(std::string vector_filename) {
1867  CuVector<BaseFloat> vec;
1868  ReadKaldiObject(vector_filename, &vec); // will abort on failure.
1869  offsets_.Resize(vec.Dim());
1870  offsets_.CopyFromVec(vec);
1871 }
1872 
1873 void PerElementOffsetComponent::InitFromConfig(ConfigLine *cfl) {
1874  std::string vector_filename;
1875  int32 dim = -1;
1876  InitLearningRatesFromConfig(cfl);
1877  if (cfl->GetValue("vector", &vector_filename)) {
1878  Init(vector_filename);
1879  if (cfl->GetValue("dim", &dim))
1880  KALDI_ASSERT(dim == InputDim() &&
1881  "input-dim mismatch vs. vector.");
1882  } else {
1883  if(!cfl->GetValue("dim", &dim))
1884  KALDI_ERR << "'dim' not provided in the config line.";
1885  BaseFloat param_mean = 0.0, param_stddev = 0.0;
1886  cfl->GetValue("param-mean", &param_mean);
1887  cfl->GetValue("param-stddev", &param_stddev);
1888  Init(dim, param_mean, param_stddev);
1889  }
1890  if (cfl->HasUnusedValues())
1891  KALDI_ERR << "Could not process these elements in initializer: "
1892  << cfl->UnusedValues();
1893 }
1894 
1895 void PerElementOffsetComponent::Propagate(
1896  const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
1897  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in,
1898  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *out) const {
1899  out->CopyFromMat(in);
1900  out->AddVecToRows(1.0, offsets_);
1901 }
1902 
1903 void PerElementOffsetComponent::Backprop(
1904  const std::string &debug_info,
1905  const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
1906  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &, // in_value
1907  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &, // out_value
1908  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv,
1909  Component *to_update_in,
1910  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *in_deriv) const {
1911  PerElementOffsetComponent *to_update =
1912  dynamic_cast<PerElementOffsetComponent*>(to_update_in);
1913 
1914  if (in_deriv) {
1915  // Propagate the derivative back to the input.
1916  in_deriv->CopyFromMat(out_deriv);
1917  }
1918 
1919  if (to_update != NULL)
1920  to_update->offsets_.AddRowSumMat(to_update->learning_rate_, out_deriv);
1921 }
1922 
1923 void PerElementOffsetComponent::Read(std::istream &is, bool binary) {
1924  ReadUpdatableCommon(is, binary); // Read opening tag and learning rate
1925  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<Offsets>");
1926  offsets_.Read(is, binary);
1927  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<IsGradient>");
1928  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &is_gradient_);
1929  ExpectToken(is, binary, "</PerElementOffsetComponent>");
1930 }
1931 
1932 void PerElementOffsetComponent::Write(std::ostream &os, bool binary) const {
1933  WriteUpdatableCommon(os, binary); // Write opening tag and learning rate
1934  WriteToken(os, binary, "<Offsets>");
1935  offsets_.Write(os, binary);
1936  WriteToken(os, binary, "<IsGradient>");
1937  WriteBasicType(os, binary, is_gradient_);
1938  WriteToken(os, binary, "</PerElementOffsetComponent>");
1939 }
1940 
1941 int32 PerElementOffsetComponent::NumParameters() const {
1942  return InputDim();
1943 }
1944 
1945 void PerElementOffsetComponent::Vectorize(VectorBase<BaseFloat> *params) const {
1946  params->CopyFromVec(offsets_);
1947 }
1948 
1949 void PerElementOffsetComponent::UnVectorize(
1950  const VectorBase<BaseFloat> &params) {
1951  offsets_.CopyFromVec(params);
1952 }
1953 
1954 
1955 
1956 NaturalGradientAffineComponent::NaturalGradientAffineComponent():
1957  max_change_per_sample_(0.0),
1958  update_count_(0.0), active_scaling_count_(0.0),
1959  max_change_scale_stats_(0.0) { }
1960 
1961 // virtual
1962 void NaturalGradientAffineComponent::Resize(
1963  int32 input_dim, int32 output_dim) {
1964  KALDI_ASSERT(input_dim > 1 && output_dim > 1);
1965  if (rank_in_ >= input_dim) rank_in_ = input_dim - 1;
1966  if (rank_out_ >= output_dim) rank_out_ = output_dim - 1;
1967  bias_params_.Resize(output_dim);
1968  linear_params_.Resize(output_dim, input_dim);
1969  OnlineNaturalGradient temp;
1970  preconditioner_in_ = temp;
1971  preconditioner_out_ = temp;
1972  SetNaturalGradientConfigs();
1973 }
1974 
1975 
1976 void NaturalGradientAffineComponent::Read(std::istream &is, bool binary) {
1977  ReadUpdatableCommon(is, binary); // Read the opening tag and learning rate
1978  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<LinearParams>");
1979  linear_params_.Read(is, binary);
1980  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<BiasParams>");
1981  bias_params_.Read(is, binary);
1982  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<RankIn>");
1983  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &rank_in_);
1984  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<RankOut>");
1985  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &rank_out_);
1986  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<UpdatePeriod>");
1987  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &update_period_);
1988  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<NumSamplesHistory>");
1989  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &num_samples_history_);
1990  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<Alpha>");
1991  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &alpha_);
1992  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<MaxChangePerSample>");
1993  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &max_change_per_sample_);
1994  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<IsGradient>");
1995  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &is_gradient_);
1996  std::string token;
1997  ReadToken(is, binary, &token);
1998  if (token == "<UpdateCount>") {
1999  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &update_count_);
2000  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<ActiveScalingCount>");
2001  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &active_scaling_count_);
2002  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<MaxChangeScaleStats>");
2003  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &max_change_scale_stats_);
2004  ReadToken(is, binary, &token);
2005  }
