2006  if (token != "<NaturalGradientAffineComponent>" &&
2007  token != "</NaturalGradientAffineComponent>")
2008  KALDI_ERR << "Expected <NaturalGradientAffineComponent> or "
2009  << "</NaturalGradientAffineComponent>, got " << token;
2010  SetNaturalGradientConfigs();
2011 }
2012 
2013 void NaturalGradientAffineComponent::InitFromConfig(ConfigLine *cfl) {
2014  bool ok = true;
2015  std::string matrix_filename;
2016  BaseFloat num_samples_history = 2000.0, alpha = 4.0,
2017  max_change_per_sample = 0.0;
2018  int32 input_dim = -1, output_dim = -1, rank_in = 20, rank_out = 80,
2019  update_period = 4;
2020  InitLearningRatesFromConfig(cfl);
2021  cfl->GetValue("num-samples-history", &num_samples_history);
2022  cfl->GetValue("alpha", &alpha);
2023  cfl->GetValue("max-change-per-sample", &max_change_per_sample);
2024  cfl->GetValue("rank-in", &rank_in);
2025  cfl->GetValue("rank-out", &rank_out);
2026  cfl->GetValue("update-period", &update_period);
2027 
2028  if (cfl->GetValue("matrix", &matrix_filename)) {
2029  Init(rank_in, rank_out, update_period,
2030  num_samples_history, alpha, max_change_per_sample,
2031  matrix_filename);
2032  if (cfl->GetValue("input-dim", &input_dim))
2033  KALDI_ASSERT(input_dim == InputDim() &&
2034  "input-dim mismatch vs. matrix.");
2035  if (cfl->GetValue("output-dim", &output_dim))
2036  KALDI_ASSERT(output_dim == OutputDim() &&
2037  "output-dim mismatch vs. matrix.");
2038  } else {
2039  ok = ok && cfl->GetValue("input-dim", &input_dim);
2040  ok = ok && cfl->GetValue("output-dim", &output_dim);
2041  BaseFloat param_stddev = 1.0 / std::sqrt(input_dim),
2042  bias_stddev = 1.0, bias_mean = 0.0;
2043  cfl->GetValue("param-stddev", &param_stddev);
2044  cfl->GetValue("bias-stddev", &bias_stddev);
2045  cfl->GetValue("bias-mean", &bias_mean);
2046  Init(input_dim, output_dim, param_stddev,
2047  bias_stddev, bias_mean, rank_in, rank_out, update_period,
2048  num_samples_history, alpha, max_change_per_sample);
2049  }
2050  if (cfl->HasUnusedValues())
2051  KALDI_ERR << "Could not process these elements in initializer: "
2052  << cfl->UnusedValues();
2053  if (!ok)
2054  KALDI_ERR << "Bad initializer " << cfl->WholeLine();
2055 }
2056 
2057 void NaturalGradientAffineComponent::SetNaturalGradientConfigs() {
2058  preconditioner_in_.SetRank(rank_in_);
2059  preconditioner_in_.SetNumSamplesHistory(num_samples_history_);
2060  preconditioner_in_.SetAlpha(alpha_);
2061  preconditioner_in_.SetUpdatePeriod(update_period_);
2062  preconditioner_out_.SetRank(rank_out_);
2063  preconditioner_out_.SetNumSamplesHistory(num_samples_history_);
2064  preconditioner_out_.SetAlpha(alpha_);
2065  preconditioner_out_.SetUpdatePeriod(update_period_);
2066 }
2067 
2068 void NaturalGradientAffineComponent::Init(
2069  int32 rank_in, int32 rank_out,
2070  int32 update_period, BaseFloat num_samples_history, BaseFloat alpha,
2071  BaseFloat max_change_per_sample,
2072  std::string matrix_filename) {
2073  rank_in_ = rank_in;
2074  rank_out_ = rank_out;
2075  update_period_ = update_period;
2076  num_samples_history_ = num_samples_history;
2077  alpha_ = alpha;
2078  SetNaturalGradientConfigs();
2079  KALDI_ASSERT(max_change_per_sample >= 0.0);
2080  max_change_per_sample_ = max_change_per_sample;
2081  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> mat;
2082  ReadKaldiObject(matrix_filename, &mat); // will abort on failure.
2083  KALDI_ASSERT(mat.NumCols() >= 2);
2084  int32 input_dim = mat.NumCols() - 1, output_dim = mat.NumRows();
2085  linear_params_.Resize(output_dim, input_dim);
2086  bias_params_.Resize(output_dim);
2087  linear_params_.CopyFromMat(mat.Range(0, output_dim, 0, input_dim));
2088  bias_params_.CopyColFromMat(mat, input_dim);
2089  is_gradient_ = false; // not configurable; there's no reason you'd want this
2090  update_count_ = 0.0;
2091  active_scaling_count_ = 0.0;
2092  max_change_scale_stats_ = 0.0;
2093 }
2094 
2095 void NaturalGradientAffineComponent::Init(
2096  int32 input_dim, int32 output_dim,
2097  BaseFloat param_stddev, BaseFloat bias_stddev, BaseFloat bias_mean,
2098  int32 rank_in, int32 rank_out, int32 update_period,
2099  BaseFloat num_samples_history, BaseFloat alpha,
2100  BaseFloat max_change_per_sample) {
2101  linear_params_.Resize(output_dim, input_dim);
2102  bias_params_.Resize(output_dim);
2103  KALDI_ASSERT(output_dim > 0 && input_dim > 0 && param_stddev >= 0.0 &&
2104  bias_stddev >= 0.0);
2105  linear_params_.SetRandn(); // sets to random normally distributed noise.
2106  linear_params_.Scale(param_stddev);
2107  bias_params_.SetRandn();
2108  bias_params_.Scale(bias_stddev);
2109  bias_params_.Add(bias_mean);
2110  rank_in_ = rank_in;
2111  rank_out_ = rank_out;
2112  update_period_ = update_period;
2113  num_samples_history_ = num_samples_history;
2114  alpha_ = alpha;
2115  SetNaturalGradientConfigs();
2116  if (max_change_per_sample > 0.0)
2117  KALDI_WARN << "You are setting a positive max_change_per_sample for "
2118  << "NaturalGradientAffineComponent. But the per-component "
2119  << "gradient clipping mechansim has been removed. Instead it's currently "
2120  << "done at the whole model level.";
2121  max_change_per_sample_ = max_change_per_sample;
2122  is_gradient_ = false; // not configurable; there's no reason you'd want this
2123  update_count_ = 0.0;
2124  active_scaling_count_ = 0.0;
2125  max_change_scale_stats_ = 0.0;
2126 }
2127 
2128 void NaturalGradientAffineComponent::Write(std::ostream &os,
2129  bool binary) const {
2130  WriteUpdatableCommon(os, binary); // Write the opening tag and learning rate
2131  WriteToken(os, binary, "<LinearParams>");
2132  linear_params_.Write(os, binary);
2133  WriteToken(os, binary, "<BiasParams>");
2134  bias_params_.Write(os, binary);
2135  WriteToken(os, binary, "<RankIn>");
2136  WriteBasicType(os, binary, rank_in_);
2137  WriteToken(os, binary, "<RankOut>");
2138  WriteBasicType(os, binary, rank_out_);
2139  WriteToken(os, binary, "<UpdatePeriod>");
2140  WriteBasicType(os, binary, update_period_);
2141  WriteToken(os, binary, "<NumSamplesHistory>");
2142  WriteBasicType(os, binary, num_samples_history_);
2143  WriteToken(os, binary, "<Alpha>");
2144  WriteBasicType(os, binary, alpha_);
2145  WriteToken(os, binary, "<MaxChangePerSample>");
2146  WriteBasicType(os, binary, max_change_per_sample_);
2147  WriteToken(os, binary, "<IsGradient>");
2148  WriteBasicType(os, binary, is_gradient_);
2149  WriteToken(os, binary, "<UpdateCount>");
2150  WriteBasicType(os, binary, update_count_);
2151  WriteToken(os, binary, "<ActiveScalingCount>");
2152  WriteBasicType(os, binary, active_scaling_count_);
2153  WriteToken(os, binary, "<MaxChangeScaleStats>");
2154  WriteBasicType(os, binary, max_change_scale_stats_);
2155  WriteToken(os, binary, "</NaturalGradientAffineComponent>");
2156 }
2157 
2158 std::string NaturalGradientAffineComponent::Info() const {
2159  std::ostringstream stream;
2160  stream << UpdatableComponent::Info();
2161  PrintParameterStats(stream, "linear-params", linear_params_);
2162  PrintParameterStats(stream, "bias", bias_params_, true);
2163  stream << ", rank-in=" << rank_in_
2164  << ", rank-out=" << rank_out_
2165  << ", num_samples_history=" << num_samples_history_
2166  << ", update_period=" << update_period_
2167  << ", alpha=" << alpha_
2168  << ", max-change-per-sample=" << max_change_per_sample_;
2169  if (update_count_ > 0.0 && max_change_per_sample_ > 0.0) {
2170  stream << ", avg-scaling-factor=" << max_change_scale_stats_ / update_count_
2171  << ", active-scaling-portion="
2172  << active_scaling_count_ / update_count_;
2173  }
2174  return stream.str();
2175 }
2176 
2177 Component* NaturalGradientAffineComponent::Copy() const {
2178  return new NaturalGradientAffineComponent(*this);
2179 }
2180 
2181 NaturalGradientAffineComponent::NaturalGradientAffineComponent(
2182  const NaturalGradientAffineComponent &other):
2183  AffineComponent(other),
2184  rank_in_(other.rank_in_),
2185  rank_out_(other.rank_out_),
2186  update_period_(other.update_period_),
2187  num_samples_history_(other.num_samples_history_),
2188  alpha_(other.alpha_),
2189  preconditioner_in_(other.preconditioner_in_),
2190  preconditioner_out_(other.preconditioner_out_),
2191  max_change_per_sample_(other.max_change_per_sample_),
2192  update_count_(other.update_count_),
2193  active_scaling_count_(other.active_scaling_count_),
2194  max_change_scale_stats_(other.max_change_scale_stats_) {
2195  SetNaturalGradientConfigs();
2196 }
2197 
2198 void NaturalGradientAffineComponent::Update(
2199  const std::string &debug_info,
2200  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in_value,
2201  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv) {
2202  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> in_value_temp;
2203 
2204  in_value_temp.Resize(in_value.NumRows(),
2205  in_value.NumCols() + 1, kUndefined);
2206  in_value_temp.Range(0, in_value.NumRows(),
2207  0, in_value.NumCols()).CopyFromMat(in_value);
2208 
2209  // Add the 1.0 at the end of each row "in_value_temp"
2210  in_value_temp.Range(0, in_value.NumRows(),
2211  in_value.NumCols(), 1).Set(1.0);
2212 
2213  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> out_deriv_temp(out_deriv);
2214 
2215  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> row_products(2,
2216  in_value.NumRows());
2217  CuSubVector<BaseFloat> in_row_products(row_products, 0),
2218  out_row_products(row_products, 1);
2219 
2220  // These "scale" values get will get multiplied into the learning rate (faster
2221  // than having the matrices scaled inside the preconditioning code).
2222  BaseFloat in_scale, out_scale;
2223 
2224  preconditioner_in_.PreconditionDirections(&in_value_temp, &in_row_products,
2225  &in_scale);
2226  preconditioner_out_.PreconditionDirections(&out_deriv_temp, &out_row_products,
2227  &out_scale);
2228 
2229  // "scale" is a scaling factor coming from the PreconditionDirections calls
2230  // (it's faster to have them output a scaling factor than to have them scale
2231  // their outputs).
2232  BaseFloat scale = in_scale * out_scale;
2233 
2234  CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> in_value_precon_part(in_value_temp,
2235  0, in_value_temp.NumRows(),
2236  0, in_value_temp.NumCols() - 1);
2237  // this "precon_ones" is what happens to the vector of 1's representing
2238  // offsets, after multiplication by the preconditioner.
2239  CuVector<BaseFloat> precon_ones(in_value_temp.NumRows());
2240 
2241  precon_ones.CopyColFromMat(in_value_temp, in_value_temp.NumCols() - 1);
2242 
2243  BaseFloat local_lrate = scale * learning_rate_;
2244  update_count_ += 1.0;
2245  bias_params_.AddMatVec(local_lrate, out_deriv_temp, kTrans,
2246  precon_ones, 1.0);
2247  linear_params_.AddMatMat(local_lrate, out_deriv_temp, kTrans,
2248  in_value_precon_part, kNoTrans, 1.0);
2249 }
2250 
2251 void NaturalGradientAffineComponent::ZeroStats() {
2252  update_count_ = 0.0;
2253  max_change_scale_stats_ = 0.0;
2254  active_scaling_count_ = 0.0;
2255 }
2256 
2257 void NaturalGradientAffineComponent::Scale(BaseFloat scale) {
2258  update_count_ *= scale;
2259  max_change_scale_stats_ *= scale;
2260  active_scaling_count_ *= scale;
2261  linear_params_.Scale(scale);
2262  bias_params_.Scale(scale);
2263 }
2264 
2265 void NaturalGradientAffineComponent::Add(BaseFloat alpha, const Component &other_in) {
2266  const NaturalGradientAffineComponent *other =
2267  dynamic_cast<const NaturalGradientAffineComponent*>(&other_in);
2268  KALDI_ASSERT(other != NULL);
2269  update_count_ += alpha * other->update_count_;
2270  max_change_scale_stats_ += alpha * other->max_change_scale_stats_;
2271  active_scaling_count_ += alpha * other->active_scaling_count_;
2272  linear_params_.AddMat(alpha, other->linear_params_);
2273  bias_params_.AddVec(alpha, other->bias_params_);
2274 }
2275 
2276 std::string FixedAffineComponent::Info() const {
2277  std::ostringstream stream;
2278  stream << Component::Info();
2279  PrintParameterStats(stream, "linear-params", linear_params_);
2280  PrintParameterStats(stream, "bias", bias_params_, true);
2281  return stream.str();
2282 }
2283 
2284 void FixedAffineComponent::Init(const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &mat) {
2285  KALDI_ASSERT(mat.NumCols() > 1);
2286  linear_params_ = mat.Range(0, mat.NumRows(), 0, mat.NumCols() - 1);
2287  bias_params_.Resize(mat.NumRows());
2288  bias_params_.CopyColFromMat(mat, mat.NumCols() - 1);
2289 }
2290 
2291 void FixedAffineComponent::InitFromConfig(ConfigLine *cfl) {
2292  std::string filename;
2293  // Two forms allowed: "matrix=<rxfilename>", or "input-dim=x output-dim=y"
2294  // (for testing purposes only).
2295  if (cfl->GetValue("matrix", &filename)) {
2296  if (cfl->HasUnusedValues())
2297  KALDI_ERR << "Invalid initializer for layer of type "
2298  << Type() << ": \"" << cfl->WholeLine() << "\"";
2299 
2300  bool binary;
2301  Input ki(filename, &binary);
2302  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> mat;
2303  mat.Read(ki.Stream(), binary);
2304  KALDI_ASSERT(mat.NumRows() != 0);
2305  Init(mat);
2306  } else {
2307  int32 input_dim = -1, output_dim = -1;
2308  if (!cfl->GetValue("input-dim", &input_dim) ||
2309  !cfl->GetValue("output-dim", &output_dim) || cfl->HasUnusedValues()) {
2310  KALDI_ERR << "Invalid initializer for layer of type "
2311  << Type() << ": \"" << cfl->WholeLine() << "\"";
2312  }
2313  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> mat(output_dim, input_dim + 1);
2314  mat.SetRandn();
2315  Init(mat);
2316  }
2317 }
2318 
2319 
2320 void FixedAffineComponent::Propagate(const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
2321  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in,
2322  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *out) const {
2323  out->CopyRowsFromVec(bias_params_); // Adds the bias term first.
2324  out->AddMatMat(1.0, in, kNoTrans, linear_params_, kTrans, 1.0);
2325 }
2326 
2327 void FixedAffineComponent::Backprop(const std::string &debug_info,
2328  const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
2329  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &, //in_value
2330  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &, //out_value
2331  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv,
2332  Component *, //to_update
2333  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *in_deriv) const {
2334  // kBackpropAdds is true. It's the user's responsibility to zero out
2335  // <in_deriv> if they need it to be so.
2336  if (in_deriv)
2337  in_deriv->AddMatMat(1.0, out_deriv, kNoTrans,
2338  linear_params_, kNoTrans, 1.0);
2339 }
2340 
2341 Component* FixedAffineComponent::Copy() const {
2342  FixedAffineComponent *ans = new FixedAffineComponent();
2343  ans->linear_params_ = linear_params_;
2344  ans->bias_params_ = bias_params_;
2345  return ans;
2346 }
2347 
2348 void FixedAffineComponent::Write(std::ostream &os, bool binary) const {
2349  WriteToken(os, binary, "<FixedAffineComponent>");
2350  WriteToken(os, binary, "<LinearParams>");
2351  linear_params_.Write(os, binary);
2352  WriteToken(os, binary, "<BiasParams>");
2353  bias_params_.Write(os, binary);
2354  WriteToken(os, binary, "</FixedAffineComponent>");
2355 }
2356 
2357 void FixedAffineComponent::Read(std::istream &is, bool binary) {
2358  ExpectOneOrTwoTokens(is, binary, "<FixedAffineComponent>", "<LinearParams>");
2359  linear_params_.Read(is, binary);
2360  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<BiasParams>");
2361  bias_params_.Read(is, binary);
2362  ExpectToken(is, binary, "</FixedAffineComponent>");
2363 }
2364 
2365 void SumGroupComponent::Init(const std::vector<int32> &sizes) {
2366  KALDI_ASSERT(!sizes.empty());
2367  std::vector<Int32Pair> cpu_vec(sizes.size());
2368  std::vector<int32> reverse_cpu_vec;
2369  int32 cur_index = 0;
2370  for (size_t i = 0; i < sizes.size(); i++) {
2371  KALDI_ASSERT(sizes[i] > 0);
2372  cpu_vec[i].first = cur_index;
2373  cpu_vec[i].second = cur_index + sizes[i];
2374  cur_index += sizes[i];
2375  for (int32 j = cpu_vec[i].first; j < cpu_vec[i].second; j++)
2376  reverse_cpu_vec.push_back(i);
2377  }
2378  this->indexes_ = cpu_vec;
2379  this->reverse_indexes_ = reverse_cpu_vec;
2380  this->input_dim_ = cur_index;
2381  this->output_dim_ = sizes.size();
2382 }
2383 
2384 void SumGroupComponent::Init(int32 input_dim, int32 output_dim) {
2385  const int32 num_groups = output_dim;
2386  KALDI_ASSERT(input_dim % num_groups == 0);
2387  const int32 group_size = input_dim / num_groups;
2388 
2389  std::vector<Int32Pair> cpu_vec(num_groups);
2390  std::vector<int32> reverse_cpu_vec;
2391  int32 cur_index = 0;
2392  for (size_t i = 0; i < num_groups; i++) {
2393  cpu_vec[i].first = cur_index;
2394  cpu_vec[i].second = cur_index + group_size;
2395  cur_index += group_size;
2396  for (int32 j = cpu_vec[i].first; j < cpu_vec[i].second; j++)
2397  reverse_cpu_vec.push_back(i);
2398  }
2399  this->indexes_ = cpu_vec;
2400  this->reverse_indexes_ = reverse_cpu_vec;
2401  this->input_dim_ = input_dim;
2402  this->output_dim_ = num_groups;
2403 }
2404 
2405 void SumGroupComponent::InitFromConfig(ConfigLine *cfl) {
2406  std::vector<int32> sizes;
2407  bool has_sizes = cfl->GetValue("sizes", &sizes);
2408  if (has_sizes) {
2409  if (cfl->HasUnusedValues() || sizes.empty())
2410  KALDI_ERR << "Invalid initializer for layer of type "
2411  << Type() << ": \"" << cfl->WholeLine() << "\"";
2412  this->Init(sizes);
2413  } else { // each group has the same size
2414  int32 input_dim = -1, output_dim = -1;
2415  if (!cfl->GetValue("input-dim", &input_dim) ||
2416  !cfl->GetValue("output-dim", &output_dim) || cfl->HasUnusedValues()) {
2417  KALDI_ERR << "Invalid initializer for layer of type "
2418  << Type() << ": \"" << cfl->WholeLine() << "\"";
2419  }
2420  Init(input_dim, output_dim);
2421  }
2422 }
2423 
2424 Component* SumGroupComponent::Copy() const {
2425  SumGroupComponent *ans = new SumGroupComponent();
2426  ans->indexes_ = indexes_;
2427  ans->reverse_indexes_ = reverse_indexes_;
2428  ans->input_dim_ = input_dim_;
2429  ans->output_dim_ = output_dim_;
2430  return ans;
2431 }
2432 
2433 void SumGroupComponent::Read(std::istream &is, bool binary) {
2434  ExpectOneOrTwoTokens(is, binary, "<SumGroupComponent>", "<Sizes>");
2435  std::vector<int32> sizes;
2436  ReadIntegerVector(is, binary, &sizes);
2437 
2438  std::string token;
2439  ReadToken(is, binary, &token);
2440  if (!(token == "<SumGroupComponent>" ||
2441  token == "</SumGroupComponent>")) {
2442  KALDI_ERR << "Expected </SumGroupComponent>, got " << token;
2443  }
2444  this->Init(sizes);
2445 }
2446 
2447 void SumGroupComponent::GetSizes(std::vector<int32> *sizes) const {
2448  std::vector<Int32Pair> indexes;
2449  indexes_.CopyToVec(&indexes);
2450  sizes->resize(indexes.size());
2451  for (size_t i = 0; i < indexes.size(); i++) {
2452  (*sizes)[i] = indexes[i].second - indexes[i].first;
2453  if (i == 0) { KALDI_ASSERT(indexes[i].first == 0); }
2454  else { KALDI_ASSERT(indexes[i].first == indexes[i-1].second); }
2455  KALDI_ASSERT(indexes[i].second > indexes[i].first);
2456  (*sizes)[i] = indexes[i].second - indexes[i].first;
2457  }
2458 }
2459 
2460 void SumGroupComponent::Write(std::ostream &os, bool binary) const {
2461  WriteToken(os, binary, "<SumGroupComponent>");
2462  WriteToken(os, binary, "<Sizes>");
2463  std::vector<int32> sizes;
2464  this->GetSizes(&sizes);
2465  WriteIntegerVector(os, binary, sizes);
2466  WriteToken(os, binary, "</SumGroupComponent>");
2467 }
2468 
2469 void SumGroupComponent::Propagate(const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
2470  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in,
2471  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *out) const {
2472  out->SumColumnRanges(in, indexes_);
2473 }
2474 
2475 void SumGroupComponent::Backprop(const std::string &debug_info,
2476  const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
2477  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &, // in_value,
2478  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &, // out_value
2479  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv,
2480  Component *to_update_in,
2481  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *in_deriv) const {
2482  in_deriv->CopyCols(out_deriv, reverse_indexes_);
2483 }
2484 
2485 void SoftmaxComponent::Propagate(const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
2486  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in,
2487  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *out) const {
2488  // Apply softmax function to each row of the output...
2489  // for that row, we do
2490  // x_i = exp(x_i) / sum_j exp(x_j).
2491  out->ApplySoftMaxPerRow(in);
2492 
2493  // This floor on the output helps us deal with
2494  // almost-zeros in a way that doesn't lead to overflow.
2495  out->ApplyFloor(1.0e-20);
2496 }
2497 
2498 void SoftmaxComponent::Backprop(const std::string &debug_info,
2499  const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
2500  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &, // in_value,
2501  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_value,
2502  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv,
2503  Component *to_update_in,
2504  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *in_deriv) const {
2505  if (in_deriv == NULL)
2506  return;
2507  /*
2508  Note on the derivative of the softmax function: let it be
2509  p_i = exp(x_i) / sum_i exp_i
2510  The [matrix-valued] Jacobian of this function is
2511  diag(p) - p p^T
2512  Let the derivative vector at the output be e, and at the input be
2513  d. We have
2514  d = diag(p) e - p (p^T e).
2515  d_i = p_i e_i - p_i (p^T e).
2516  */
2517  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &P(out_value), &E(out_deriv);
2518  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &D (*in_deriv);
2519 
2520  D.CopyFromMat(P);
2521  D.MulElements(E);
2522  // At this point, D = P .* E (in matlab notation)
2523  CuVector<BaseFloat> pe_vec(D.NumRows()); // For each row i, the dot product (p_t . e_t).
2524  pe_vec.AddDiagMatMat(1.0, P, kNoTrans, E, kTrans, 0.0);
2525 
2526  D.AddDiagVecMat(-1.0, pe_vec, P, kNoTrans, 1.0); // does D -= diag(pe_vec) * P.
2527 }
2528 
2529 void SoftmaxComponent::StoreStats(const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_value) {
2530  // We don't store derivative stats for this component type, just activation
2531  // stats.
2532  StoreStatsInternal(out_value, NULL);
2533 }
2534 
2535 
2536 void LogSoftmaxComponent::Propagate(const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
2537  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in,
2538  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *out) const {
2539  // Applies log softmax function to each row of the output. For each row, we do
2540  // x_i = x_i - log(sum_j exp(x_j))
2541  out->ApplyLogSoftMaxPerRow(in);
2542 }
2543 
2544 void LogSoftmaxComponent::Backprop(const std::string &debug_info,
2545  const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
2546  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &, // in_value
2547  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_value,
2548  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv,
2549  Component *, // to_update
2550  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *in_deriv) const {
2551  if (in_deriv == NULL)
2552  return;
2553 
2554  /*
2555  Let the output be y, then
2556  y_i = x_i - log(sum_i exp(x_i))
2557  where x_i is the input to the component. The Jacobian matrix of this
2558  function is
2559  J = I - 1 exp(y^T)
2560  where 1 is a vector of ones. Let the derivative vector at the output be e,
2561  and at the input be d, then we have
2562  d = e - exp(y) Sum(e)
2563  d_i = e_i - exp(y_i) Sum(e)
2564  */
2565  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &Y(out_value), &E(out_deriv);
2566  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &D (*in_deriv);
2567 
2568  D.CopyFromMat(Y);
2569  D.ApplyExp(); // exp(y)
2570  CuVector<BaseFloat> E_sum(D.NumRows()); // Initializes to zero
2571  E_sum.AddColSumMat(1.0, E); // Sum(e)
2572  D.MulRowsVec(E_sum); // exp(y) Sum(e)
2573  D.Scale(-1.0); // - exp(y) Sum(e)
2574  D.AddMat(1.0, E, kNoTrans); // e - exp(y_i) Sum(e)
2575 }
2576 
2577 
2578 void FixedScaleComponent::Init(const CuVectorBase<BaseFloat> &scales) {
2579  KALDI_ASSERT(scales.Dim() != 0);
2580  scales_ = scales;
2581 }
2582 
2583 
2584 void FixedScaleComponent::InitFromConfig(ConfigLine *cfl) {
2585  std::string filename;
2586  // Accepts "scales" config (for filename) or "dim" -> random init, for testing.
2587  if (cfl->GetValue("scales", &filename)) {
2588  if (cfl->HasUnusedValues())
2589  KALDI_ERR << "Invalid initializer for layer of type "
2590  << Type() << ": \"" << cfl->WholeLine() << "\"";
2591  CuVector<BaseFloat> vec;
2592  ReadKaldiObject(filename, &vec);
2593  Init(vec);
2594  } else {
2595  int32 dim;
2596  if (!cfl->GetValue("dim", &dim) || cfl->HasUnusedValues())
2597  KALDI_ERR << "Invalid initializer for layer of type "
2598  << Type() << ": \"" << cfl->WholeLine() << "\"";
2599  KALDI_ASSERT(dim > 0);
2600  CuVector<BaseFloat> vec(dim);
2601  vec.SetRandn();
2602  Init(vec);
2603  }
2604 }
2605 
2606 
2607 std::string FixedScaleComponent::Info() const {
2608  std::ostringstream stream;
2609  stream << Component::Info();
2610  PrintParameterStats(stream, "scales", scales_, true);
2611  return stream.str();
2612 }
2613 
2614 void FixedScaleComponent::Propagate(const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
2615  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in,
2616  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *out) const {
2617  out->CopyFromMat(in); // does nothing if same matrix.
2618  out->MulColsVec(scales_);
2619 }
2620 
2621 void FixedScaleComponent::Backprop(const std::string &debug_info,
2622  const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
2623  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &, // in_value
2624  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &, // out_value
2625  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv,
2626  Component *, // to_update
2627  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *in_deriv) const {
2628  in_deriv->CopyFromMat(out_deriv); // does nothing if same memory.
2629  in_deriv->MulColsVec(scales_);
2630 }
2631 
2632 Component* FixedScaleComponent::Copy() const {
2633  FixedScaleComponent *ans = new FixedScaleComponent();
2634  ans->scales_ = scales_;
2635  return ans;
2636 }
2637 
2638 
2639 void FixedScaleComponent::Write(std::ostream &os, bool binary) const {
2640  WriteToken(os, binary, "<FixedScaleComponent>");
2641  WriteToken(os, binary, "<Scales>");
2642  scales_.Write(os, binary);
2643  WriteToken(os, binary, "</FixedScaleComponent>");
2644 }
2645 
2646 void FixedScaleComponent::Read(std::istream &is, bool binary) {
2647  ExpectOneOrTwoTokens(is, binary, "<FixedScaleComponent>", "<Scales>");
2648  scales_.Read(is, binary);
2649  ExpectToken(is, binary, "</FixedScaleComponent>");
2650 }
2651 
2652 void FixedBiasComponent::Init(const CuVectorBase<BaseFloat> &bias) {
2653  KALDI_ASSERT(bias.Dim() != 0);
2654  bias_ = bias;
2655 }
2656 
2657 void FixedBiasComponent::InitFromConfig(ConfigLine *cfl) {
2658  std::string filename;
2659  // Accepts "bias" config (for filename) or "dim" -> random init, for testing.
2660  if (cfl->GetValue("bias", &filename)) {
2661  if (cfl->HasUnusedValues())
2662  KALDI_ERR << "Invalid initializer for layer of type "
2663  << Type() << ": \"" << cfl->WholeLine() << "\"";
2664  CuVector<BaseFloat> vec;
2665  ReadKaldiObject(filename, &vec);
2666  Init(vec);
2667  } else {
2668  int32 dim;
2669  if (!cfl->GetValue("dim", &dim) || cfl->HasUnusedValues())
2670  KALDI_ERR << "Invalid initializer for layer of type "
2671  << Type() << ": \"" << cfl->WholeLine() << "\"";
2672  KALDI_ASSERT(dim > 0);
2673  CuVector<BaseFloat> vec(dim);
2674  vec.SetRandn();
2675  Init(vec);
2676  }
2677 }
2678 
2679 std::string FixedBiasComponent::Info() const {
2680  std::ostringstream stream;
2681  stream << Component::Info();
2682  PrintParameterStats(stream, "bias", bias_, true);
2683  return stream.str();
2684 }
2685 
2686 void FixedBiasComponent::Propagate(const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
2687  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in,
2688  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *out) const {
2689  out->CopyFromMat(in); // will do nothing if in and out have same memory.
2690  out->AddVecToRows(1.0, bias_, 1.0);
2691 }
2692 
2693 void FixedBiasComponent::Backprop(const std::string &debug_info,
2694  const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
2695  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &, // in_value
2696  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &, // out_value
2697  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv,
2698  Component *, // to_update
2699  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *in_deriv) const {
2700  // the following statement will do nothing if in_deriv and out_deriv have same
2701  // memory.
2702  in_deriv->CopyFromMat(out_deriv);
2703 }
2704 
2705 Component* FixedBiasComponent::Copy() const {
2706  FixedBiasComponent *ans = new FixedBiasComponent();
2707  ans->bias_ = bias_;
2708  return ans;
2709 }
2710 
2711 
2712 void FixedBiasComponent::Write(std::ostream &os, bool binary) const {
2713  WriteToken(os, binary, "<FixedBiasComponent>");
2714  WriteToken(os, binary, "<Bias>");
2715  bias_.Write(os, binary);
2716  WriteToken(os, binary, "</FixedBiasComponent>");
2717 }
2718 
2719 void FixedBiasComponent::Read(std::istream &is, bool binary) {
2720  ExpectOneOrTwoTokens(is, binary, "<FixedBiasComponent>", "<Bias>");
2721  bias_.Read(is, binary);
2722  ExpectToken(is, binary, "</FixedBiasComponent>");
2723 }
2724 
2725 
2726 void NaturalGradientPerElementScaleComponent::Read(
2727  std::istream &is, bool binary) {
2728  ReadUpdatableCommon(is, binary); // Read the opening tag and learning rate
2729  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<Params>");
2730  scales_.Read(is, binary);
2731  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<IsGradient>");
2732  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &is_gradient_);
2733  int32 rank, update_period;
2734  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<Rank>");
2735  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &rank);
2736  preconditioner_.SetRank(rank);
2737  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<UpdatePeriod>");
2738  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &update_period);
2739  preconditioner_.SetUpdatePeriod(update_period);
2740  BaseFloat num_samples_history, alpha;
2741  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<NumSamplesHistory>");
2742  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &num_samples_history);
2743  preconditioner_.SetNumSamplesHistory(num_samples_history);
2744  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<Alpha>");
2745  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &alpha);
2746  preconditioner_.SetAlpha(alpha);
2747  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<MaxChangePerMinibatch>");
2748  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &max_change_per_minibatch_);
2749  ExpectToken(is, binary, "</NaturalGradientPerElementScaleComponent>");
2750 }
2751 
2752 void NaturalGradientPerElementScaleComponent::Write(std::ostream &os,
2753  bool binary) const {
2754  WriteUpdatableCommon(os, binary); // Write the opening tag and learning rate
2755  WriteToken(os, binary, "<Params>");
2756  scales_.Write(os, binary);
2757  WriteToken(os, binary, "<IsGradient>");
2758  WriteBasicType(os, binary, is_gradient_);
2759  WriteToken(os, binary, "<Rank>");
2760  WriteBasicType(os, binary, preconditioner_.GetRank());
2761  WriteToken(os, binary, "<UpdatePeriod>");
2762  WriteBasicType(os, binary, preconditioner_.GetUpdatePeriod());
2763  WriteToken(os, binary, "<NumSamplesHistory>");
2764  WriteBasicType(os, binary, preconditioner_.GetNumSamplesHistory());
2765  WriteToken(os, binary, "<Alpha>");
2766  WriteBasicType(os, binary, preconditioner_.GetAlpha());
2767  WriteToken(os, binary, "<MaxChangePerMinibatch>");
2768  WriteBasicType(os, binary, max_change_per_minibatch_);
2769  WriteToken(os, binary, "</NaturalGradientPerElementScaleComponent>");
2770 }
2771 
2772 std::string NaturalGradientPerElementScaleComponent::Info() const {
2773  std::ostringstream stream;
2774  stream << PerElementScaleComponent::Info()
2775  << ", rank=" << preconditioner_.GetRank()
2776  << ", update-period=" << preconditioner_.GetUpdatePeriod()
2777  << ", num-samples-history=" << preconditioner_.GetNumSamplesHistory()
2778  << ", alpha=" << preconditioner_.GetAlpha()
2779  << ", max-change-per-minibatch=" << max_change_per_minibatch_;
2780  return stream.str();
2781 }
2782 
2783 void NaturalGradientPerElementScaleComponent::InitFromConfig(ConfigLine *cfl) {
2784  // First set various configuration values that have defaults.
2785  int32 rank = 8, // Use a small rank because in this case the amount of memory
2786  // for the preconditioner actually exceeds the memory for the
2787  // parameters (by "rank").
2788  update_period = 10;
2789  // the max_change_per_minibatch is the maximum amount of parameter-change, in 2-norm,
2790  // that we allow per minibatch; if change is greater than that, we scale down
2791  // the parameter-change. It has the same purpose as the max-change-per-sample in
2792  // the NaturalGradientAffineComponent.
2793  BaseFloat num_samples_history = 2000.0, alpha = 4.0,
2794  max_change_per_minibatch = 0.0;
2795  cfl->GetValue("rank", &rank);
2796  cfl->GetValue("update-period", &update_period);
2797  cfl->GetValue("num-samples-history", &num_samples_history);
2798  cfl->GetValue("alpha", &alpha);
2799  cfl->GetValue("max-change-per-minibatch", &max_change_per_minibatch);
2800  InitLearningRatesFromConfig(cfl);
2801  std::string filename;
2802  // Accepts "scales" config (for filename) or "dim" -> random init, for testing.
2803  if (cfl->GetValue("scales", &filename)) {
2804  if (cfl->HasUnusedValues())
2805  KALDI_ERR << "Invalid initializer for layer of type "
2806  << Type() << ": \"" << cfl->WholeLine() << "\"";
2807  Init(filename, rank, update_period, num_samples_history,
2808  alpha, max_change_per_minibatch);
2809  } else {
2810  BaseFloat param_mean = 1.0, param_stddev = 0.0;
2811  cfl->GetValue("param-mean", &param_mean);
2812  cfl->GetValue("param-stddev", &param_stddev);
2813 
2814  int32 dim;
2815  if (!cfl->GetValue("dim", &dim) || cfl->HasUnusedValues())
2816  KALDI_ERR << "Invalid initializer for layer of type "
2817  << Type() << ": \"" << cfl->WholeLine() << "\"";
2818  KALDI_ASSERT(dim > 0);
2819 
2820  Init(dim, param_mean, param_stddev, rank, update_period,
2821  num_samples_history, alpha, max_change_per_minibatch);
2822  }
2823 }
2824 
2825 void NaturalGradientPerElementScaleComponent::Init(
2826  int32 dim, BaseFloat param_mean,
2827  BaseFloat param_stddev, int32 rank, int32 update_period,
2828  BaseFloat num_samples_history, BaseFloat alpha,
2829  BaseFloat max_change_per_minibatch) {
2830  PerElementScaleComponent::Init(dim, param_mean,
2831  param_stddev);
2832  preconditioner_.SetRank(rank);
2833  preconditioner_.SetUpdatePeriod(update_period);
2834  preconditioner_.SetNumSamplesHistory(num_samples_history);
2835  preconditioner_.SetAlpha(alpha);
2836  max_change_per_minibatch_ = max_change_per_minibatch;
2837  if (max_change_per_minibatch > 0.0)
2838  KALDI_WARN << "You are setting a positive max_change_per_minibatch for "
2839  << "NaturalGradientPerElementScaleComponent. But the per-component "
2840  << "gradient clipping mechansim has been removed. Instead it's currently "
2841  << "done at the whole model level.";
2842 }
2843 
2844 void NaturalGradientPerElementScaleComponent::Init(
2845  std::string vector_filename,
2846  int32 rank, int32 update_period, BaseFloat num_samples_history,
2847  BaseFloat alpha, BaseFloat max_change_per_minibatch) {
2848  PerElementScaleComponent::Init(vector_filename);
2849  preconditioner_.SetRank(rank);
2850  preconditioner_.SetUpdatePeriod(update_period);
2851  preconditioner_.SetNumSamplesHistory(num_samples_history);
2852  preconditioner_.SetAlpha(alpha);
2853  max_change_per_minibatch_ = max_change_per_minibatch;
2854 }
2855 
2856 
2857 NaturalGradientPerElementScaleComponent::NaturalGradientPerElementScaleComponent(
2858  const NaturalGradientPerElementScaleComponent &other):
2859  PerElementScaleComponent(other),
2860  max_change_per_minibatch_(other.max_change_per_minibatch_),
2861  preconditioner_(other.preconditioner_) { }
2862 
2863 
2864 
2865 
2866 Component* NaturalGradientPerElementScaleComponent::Copy() const {
2867  return new NaturalGradientPerElementScaleComponent(*this);
2868 }
2869 
2870 void NaturalGradientPerElementScaleComponent::Update(
2871  const std::string &debug_info,
2872  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in_value,
2873  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv) {
2874 
2875  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> derivs_per_frame(in_value);
2876  derivs_per_frame.MulElements(out_deriv);
2877  // the non-natural-gradient update would just do
2878  // scales_.AddRowSumMat(learning_rate_, derivs_per_frame).
2879 
2880  BaseFloat scale;
2881  preconditioner_.PreconditionDirections(&derivs_per_frame, NULL, &scale);
2882 
2883  CuVector<BaseFloat> delta_scales(scales_.Dim());
2884  delta_scales.AddRowSumMat(scale * learning_rate_, derivs_per_frame);
2885  scales_.AddVec(1.0, delta_scales);
2886 }
2887 
2888 // Constructors for the convolution component
2889 ConvolutionComponent::ConvolutionComponent():
2890  UpdatableComponent(),
2891  input_x_dim_(0), input_y_dim_(0), input_z_dim_(0),
2892  filt_x_dim_(0), filt_y_dim_(0),
2893  filt_x_step_(0), filt_y_step_(0),
2894  input_vectorization_(kZyx),
2895  is_gradient_(false) {}
2896 
2897 ConvolutionComponent::ConvolutionComponent(
2898  const ConvolutionComponent &component):
2899  UpdatableComponent(component),
2900  input_x_dim_(component.input_x_dim_),
2901  input_y_dim_(component.input_y_dim_),
2902  input_z_dim_(component.input_z_dim_),
2903  filt_x_dim_(component.filt_x_dim_),
2904  filt_y_dim_(component.filt_y_dim_),
2905  filt_x_step_(component.filt_x_step_),
2906  filt_y_step_(component.filt_y_step_),
2907  input_vectorization_(component.input_vectorization_),
2908  filter_params_(component.filter_params_),
2909  bias_params_(component.bias_params_),
2910  is_gradient_(component.is_gradient_) {}
2911 
2912 ConvolutionComponent::ConvolutionComponent(
2913  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &filter_params,
2914  const CuVectorBase<BaseFloat> &bias_params,
2915  int32 input_x_dim, int32 input_y_dim, int32 input_z_dim,
2916  int32 filt_x_dim, int32 filt_y_dim,
2917  int32 filt_x_step, int32 filt_y_step,
2918  TensorVectorizationType input_vectorization,
2919  BaseFloat learning_rate):
2920  input_x_dim_(input_x_dim),
2921  input_y_dim_(input_y_dim),
2922  input_z_dim_(input_z_dim),
2923  filt_x_dim_(filt_x_dim),
2924  filt_y_dim_(filt_y_dim),
2925  filt_x_step_(filt_x_step),
2926  filt_y_step_(filt_y_step),
2927  input_vectorization_(input_vectorization),
2928  filter_params_(filter_params),
2929  bias_params_(bias_params){
2930  KALDI_ASSERT(filter_params.NumRows() == bias_params.Dim() &&
2931  bias_params.Dim() != 0);
2932  KALDI_ASSERT(filter_params.NumCols() == filt_x_dim * filt_y_dim * input_z_dim);
2933  SetLearningRate(learning_rate);
2934  is_gradient_ = false;
2935 }
2936 
2937 // aquire input dim
2938 int32 ConvolutionComponent::InputDim() const {
2939  return input_x_dim_ * input_y_dim_ * input_z_dim_;
2940 }
2941 
2942 // aquire output dim
2943 int32 ConvolutionComponent::OutputDim() const {
2944  int32 num_x_steps = (1 + (input_x_dim_ - filt_x_dim_) / filt_x_step_);
2945  int32 num_y_steps = (1 + (input_y_dim_ - filt_y_dim_) / filt_y_step_);
2946  int32 num_filters = filter_params_.NumRows();
2947  return num_x_steps * num_y_steps * num_filters;
2948 }
2949 
2950 // initialize the component using hyperparameters
2951 void ConvolutionComponent::Init(
2952  int32 input_x_dim, int32 input_y_dim, int32 input_z_dim,
2953  int32 filt_x_dim, int32 filt_y_dim,
2954  int32 filt_x_step, int32 filt_y_step, int32 num_filters,
2955  TensorVectorizationType input_vectorization,
2956  BaseFloat param_stddev, BaseFloat bias_stddev) {
2957  input_x_dim_ = input_x_dim;
2958  input_y_dim_ = input_y_dim;
2959  input_z_dim_ = input_z_dim;
2960  filt_x_dim_ = filt_x_dim;
2961  filt_y_dim_ = filt_y_dim;
2962  filt_x_step_ = filt_x_step;
2963  filt_y_step_ = filt_y_step;
2964  input_vectorization_ = input_vectorization;
2965  KALDI_ASSERT((input_x_dim_ - filt_x_dim_) % filt_x_step_ == 0);
2966  KALDI_ASSERT((input_y_dim_ - filt_y_dim_) % filt_y_step_ == 0);
2967  int32 filter_dim = filt_x_dim_ * filt_y_dim_ * input_z_dim_;
2968  filter_params_.Resize(num_filters, filter_dim);
2969  bias_params_.Resize(num_filters);
2970  KALDI_ASSERT(param_stddev >= 0.0 && bias_stddev >= 0.0);
2971  filter_params_.SetRandn();
2972  filter_params_.Scale(param_stddev);
2973  bias_params_.SetRandn();
2974  bias_params_.Scale(bias_stddev);
2975 }
2976 
2977 // initialize the component using predefined matrix file
2978 void ConvolutionComponent::Init(
2979  int32 input_x_dim, int32 input_y_dim, int32 input_z_dim,
2980  int32 filt_x_dim, int32 filt_y_dim,
2981  int32 filt_x_step, int32 filt_y_step,
2982  TensorVectorizationType input_vectorization,
2983  std::string matrix_filename) {
2984  input_x_dim_ = input_x_dim;
2985  input_y_dim_ = input_y_dim;
2986  input_z_dim_ = input_z_dim;
2987  filt_x_dim_ = filt_x_dim;
2988  filt_y_dim_ = filt_y_dim;
2989  filt_x_step_ = filt_x_step;
2990  filt_y_step_ = filt_y_step;
2991  input_vectorization_ = input_vectorization;
2992  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> mat;
2993  ReadKaldiObject(matrix_filename, &mat);
2994  int32 filter_dim = (filt_x_dim_ * filt_y_dim_ * input_z_dim_);
2995  int32 num_filters = mat.NumRows();
2996  KALDI_ASSERT(mat.NumCols() == (filter_dim + 1));
2997  filter_params_.Resize(num_filters, filter_dim);
2998  bias_params_.Resize(num_filters);
2999  filter_params_.CopyFromMat(mat.Range(0, num_filters, 0, filter_dim));
3000  bias_params_.CopyColFromMat(mat, filter_dim);
3001 }
3002 
3003 // display information about component
3004 std::string ConvolutionComponent::Info() const {
3005  std::ostringstream stream;
3006  stream << UpdatableComponent::Info()
3007  << ", input-x-dim=" << input_x_dim_
3008  << ", input-y-dim=" << input_y_dim_
3009  << ", input-z-dim=" << input_z_dim_
3010  << ", filt-x-dim=" << filt_x_dim_
3011  << ", filt-y-dim=" << filt_y_dim_
3012  << ", filt-x-step=" << filt_x_step_
3013  << ", filt-y-step=" << filt_y_step_
3014  << ", input-vectorization=" << input_vectorization_
3015  << ", num-filters=" << filter_params_.NumRows();
3016  PrintParameterStats(stream, "filter-params", filter_params_);
3017  PrintParameterStats(stream, "bias-params", bias_params_, true);
3018  return stream.str();
3019 }
3020 
3021 // initialize the component using configuration file
3022 void ConvolutionComponent::InitFromConfig(ConfigLine *cfl) {
3023  bool ok = true;
3024  std::string matrix_filename;
3025  int32 input_x_dim = -1, input_y_dim = -1, input_z_dim = -1,
3026  filt_x_dim = -1, filt_y_dim = -1,
3027  filt_x_step = -1, filt_y_step = -1,
3028  num_filters = -1;
3029  std::string input_vectorization_order = "zyx";
3030  InitLearningRatesFromConfig(cfl);
3031  ok = ok && cfl->GetValue("input-x-dim", &input_x_dim);
3032  ok = ok && cfl->GetValue("input-y-dim", &input_y_dim);
3033  ok = ok && cfl->GetValue("input-z-dim", &input_z_dim);
3034  ok = ok && cfl->GetValue("filt-x-dim", &filt_x_dim);
3035  ok = ok && cfl->GetValue("filt-y-dim", &filt_y_dim);
3036  ok = ok && cfl->GetValue("filt-x-step", &filt_x_step);
3037  ok = ok && cfl->GetValue("filt-y-step", &filt_y_step);
3038 
3039  if (!ok)
3040  KALDI_ERR << "Bad initializer " << cfl->WholeLine();
3041  // optional argument
3042  TensorVectorizationType input_vectorization;
3043  cfl->GetValue("input-vectorization-order", &input_vectorization_order);
3044  if (input_vectorization_order.compare("zyx") == 0) {
3045  input_vectorization = kZyx;
3046  } else if (input_vectorization_order.compare("yzx") == 0) {
3047  input_vectorization = kYzx;
3048  } else {
3049  KALDI_ERR << "Unknown or unsupported input vectorization order "
3050  << input_vectorization_order
3051  << " accepted candidates are 'yzx' and 'zyx'";
3052  }
3053 
3054  if (cfl->GetValue("matrix", &matrix_filename)) {
3055  // initialize from prefined parameter matrix
3056  Init(input_x_dim, input_y_dim, input_z_dim,
3057  filt_x_dim, filt_y_dim,
3058  filt_x_step, filt_y_step,
3059  input_vectorization,
3060  matrix_filename);
3061  } else {
3062  ok = ok && cfl->GetValue("num-filters", &num_filters);
3063  if (!ok)
3064  KALDI_ERR << "Bad initializer " << cfl->WholeLine();
3065  // initialize from configuration
3066  int32 filter_input_dim = filt_x_dim * filt_y_dim * input_z_dim;
3067  BaseFloat param_stddev = 1.0 / std::sqrt(filter_input_dim), bias_stddev = 1.0;
3068  cfl->GetValue("param-stddev", &param_stddev);
3069  cfl->GetValue("bias-stddev", &bias_stddev);
3070  Init(input_x_dim, input_y_dim, input_z_dim,
3071  filt_x_dim, filt_y_dim, filt_x_step, filt_y_step, num_filters,
3072  input_vectorization, param_stddev, bias_stddev);
3073  }
3074  if (cfl->HasUnusedValues())
3075  KALDI_ERR << "Could not process these elements in initializer: "
3076  << cfl->UnusedValues();
3077  if (!ok)
3078  KALDI_ERR << "Bad initializer " << cfl->WholeLine();
3079 }
3080 
3081 // Inline methods to convert from tensor index i.e., (x,y,z) index
3082 // to index in yzx or zyx vectorized tensors
3083 inline int32 YzxVectorIndex(int32 x, int32 y, int32 z,
3084  int32 input_x_dim,
3085  int32 input_y_dim,
3086  int32 input_z_dim) {
3087  KALDI_PARANOID_ASSERT(x < input_x_dim && y < input_y_dim && z < input_z_dim);
3088  return (input_y_dim * input_z_dim) * x + (input_y_dim) * z + y;
3089 }
3090 
3091 inline int32 ZyxVectorIndex(int32 x, int32 y, int32 z,
3092  int32 input_x_dim,
3093  int32 input_y_dim,
3094  int32 input_z_dim) {
3095  KALDI_PARANOID_ASSERT(x < input_x_dim && y < input_y_dim && z < input_z_dim);
3096  return (input_y_dim * input_z_dim) * x + (input_z_dim) * y + z;
3097 }
3098 
3099 // Method to convert from a matrix representing a minibatch of vectorized
3100 // 3D tensors to patches for convolution, each patch corresponds to
3101 // one dot product in the convolution
3102 void ConvolutionComponent::InputToInputPatches(
3103  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat>& in,
3104  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> *patches) const{
3105  int32 num_x_steps = (1 + (input_x_dim_ - filt_x_dim_) / filt_x_step_);
3106  int32 num_y_steps = (1 + (input_y_dim_ - filt_y_dim_) / filt_y_step_);
3107  const int32 filt_x_step = filt_x_step_,
3108  filt_y_step = filt_y_step_,
3109  filt_x_dim = filt_x_dim_,
3110  filt_y_dim = filt_y_dim_,
3111  input_x_dim = input_x_dim_,
3112  input_y_dim = input_y_dim_,
3113  input_z_dim = input_z_dim_,
3114  filter_dim = filter_params_.NumCols();
3115 
3116  std::vector<int32> column_map(patches->NumCols());
3117  int32 column_map_size = column_map.size();
3118  for (int32 x_step = 0; x_step < num_x_steps; x_step++) {
3119  for (int32 y_step = 0; y_step < num_y_steps; y_step++) {
3120  int32 patch_number = x_step * num_y_steps + y_step;
3121  int32 patch_start_index = patch_number * filter_dim;
3122  for (int32 x = 0, index = patch_start_index; x < filt_x_dim; x++) {
3123  for (int32 y = 0; y < filt_y_dim; y++) {
3124  for (int32 z = 0; z < input_z_dim; z++, index++) {
3125  KALDI_ASSERT(index < column_map_size);
3126  if (input_vectorization_ == kZyx) {
3127  column_map[index] = ZyxVectorIndex(x_step * filt_x_step + x,
3128  y_step * filt_y_step + y, z,
3129  input_x_dim, input_y_dim,
3130  input_z_dim);
3131  } else if (input_vectorization_ == kYzx) {
3132  column_map[index] = YzxVectorIndex(x_step * filt_x_step + x,
3133  y_step * filt_y_step + y, z,
3134  input_x_dim, input_y_dim,
3135  input_z_dim);
3136  }
3137  }
3138  }
3139  }
3140  }
3141  }
3142  CuArray<int32> cu_cols(column_map);
3143  patches->CopyCols(in, cu_cols);
3144 }
3145 
3146 
3147 // propagation function
3148 // see function declaration in nnet-simple-component.h for details
3149 void ConvolutionComponent::Propagate(const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
3150  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in,
3151  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *out) const {
3152  const int32 num_x_steps = (1 + (input_x_dim_ - filt_x_dim_) / filt_x_step_),
3153  num_y_steps = (1 + (input_y_dim_ - filt_y_dim_) / filt_y_step_),
3154  num_filters = filter_params_.NumRows(),
3155  num_frames = in.NumRows(),
3156  filter_dim = filter_params_.NumCols();
3157  KALDI_ASSERT((*out).NumRows() == num_frames &&
3158  (*out).NumCols() == (num_filters * num_x_steps * num_y_steps));
3159 
3160  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> patches(num_frames,
3161  num_x_steps * num_y_steps * filter_dim,
3162  kUndefined);
3163  InputToInputPatches(in, &patches);
3164  CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>* filter_params_elem = new CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>(
3165  filter_params_, 0, filter_params_.NumRows(), 0,
3166  filter_params_.NumCols());
3167  std::vector<CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>* > tgt_batch, patch_batch,
3168  filter_params_batch;
3169 
3170  for (int32 x_step = 0; x_step < num_x_steps; x_step++) {
3171  for (int32 y_step = 0; y_step < num_y_steps; y_step++) {
3172  int32 patch_number = x_step * num_y_steps + y_step;
3173  tgt_batch.push_back(new CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>(
3174  out->ColRange(patch_number * num_filters, num_filters)));
3175  patch_batch.push_back(new CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>(
3176  patches.ColRange(patch_number * filter_dim, filter_dim)));
3177  filter_params_batch.push_back(filter_params_elem);
3178  tgt_batch[patch_number]->AddVecToRows(1.0, bias_params_, 1.0); // add bias
3179  }
3180  }
3181  // apply all filters
3182  AddMatMatBatched<BaseFloat>(1.0, tgt_batch, patch_batch,
3183  kNoTrans, filter_params_batch,
3184  kTrans, 1.0);
3185  // release memory
3186  delete filter_params_elem;
3187  for (int32 p = 0; p < tgt_batch.size(); p++) {
3188  delete tgt_batch[p];
3189  delete patch_batch[p];
3190  }
3191 }
3192 
3193 // scale the parameters
3194 void ConvolutionComponent::Scale(BaseFloat scale) {
3195  filter_params_.Scale(scale);
3196  bias_params_.Scale(scale);
3197 }
3198 
3199 // add another convolution component
3200 void ConvolutionComponent::Add(BaseFloat alpha, const Component &other_in) {
3201  const ConvolutionComponent *other =
3202  dynamic_cast<const ConvolutionComponent*>(&other_in);
3203  KALDI_ASSERT(other != NULL);
3204  filter_params_.AddMat(alpha, other->filter_params_);
3205  bias_params_.AddVec(alpha, other->bias_params_);
3206 }
3207 
3208 /*
3209  This function transforms a vector of lists into a list of vectors,
3210  padded with -1.
3211  @param[in] The input vector of lists. Let in.size() be D, and let
3212  the longest list length (i.e. the max of in[i].size()) be L.
3213  @param[out] The output list of vectors. The length of the list will
3214  be L, each vector-dimension will be D (i.e. out[i].size() == D),
3215  and if in[i] == j, then for some k we will have that
3216  out[k][j] = i. The output vectors are padded with -1
3217  where necessary if not all the input lists have the same side.
3218 */
3219 void RearrangeIndexes(const std::vector<std::vector<int32> > &in,
3220  std::vector<std::vector<int32> > *out) {
3221  int32 D = in.size();
3222  int32 L = 0;
3223  for (int32 i = 0; i < D; i++)
3224  if (in[i].size() > L)
3225  L = in[i].size();
3226  out->resize(L);
3227  for (int32 i = 0; i < L; i++)
3228  (*out)[i].resize(D, -1);
3229  for (int32 i = 0; i < D; i++) {
3230  for (int32 j = 0; j < in[i].size(); j++) {
3231  (*out)[j][i] = in[i][j];
3232  }
3233  }
3234 }
3235 
3236 // Method to compute the input derivative matrix from the input derivatives
3237 // for patches, where each patch corresponds to one dot product
3238 // in the convolution
3239 void ConvolutionComponent::InderivPatchesToInderiv(
3240  const CuMatrix<BaseFloat>& in_deriv_patches,
3241  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *in_deriv) const {
3242 
3243  const int32 num_x_steps = (1 + (input_x_dim_ - filt_x_dim_) / filt_x_step_),
3244  num_y_steps = (1 + (input_y_dim_ - filt_y_dim_) / filt_y_step_),
3245  filt_x_step = filt_x_step_,
3246  filt_y_step = filt_y_step_,
3247  filt_x_dim = filt_x_dim_,
3248  filt_y_dim = filt_y_dim_,
3249  input_x_dim = input_x_dim_,
3250  input_y_dim = input_y_dim_,
3251  input_z_dim = input_z_dim_,
3252  filter_dim = filter_params_.NumCols();
3253 
3254  // Compute the reverse column_map from the matrix with input
3255  // derivative patches to input derivative matrix
3256  std::vector<std::vector<int32> > reverse_column_map(in_deriv->NumCols());
3257  int32 rev_col_map_size = reverse_column_map.size();
3258  for (int32 x_step = 0; x_step < num_x_steps; x_step++) {
3259  for (int32 y_step = 0; y_step < num_y_steps; y_step++) {
3260  int32 patch_number = x_step * num_y_steps + y_step;
3261  int32 patch_start_index = patch_number * filter_dim;
3262  for (int32 x = 0, index = patch_start_index; x < filt_x_dim; x++) {
3263  for (int32 y = 0; y < filt_y_dim; y++) {
3264  for (int32 z = 0; z < input_z_dim; z++, index++) {
3265  int32 vector_index;
3266  if (input_vectorization_ == kZyx) {
3267  vector_index = ZyxVectorIndex(x_step * filt_x_step + x,
3268  y_step * filt_y_step + y, z,
3269  input_x_dim, input_y_dim,
3270  input_z_dim);
3271  } else {
3272  KALDI_ASSERT(input_vectorization_ == kYzx);
3273  vector_index = YzxVectorIndex(x_step * filt_x_step + x,
3274  y_step * filt_y_step + y, z,
3275  input_x_dim, input_y_dim,
3276  input_z_dim);
3277  }
3278  KALDI_ASSERT(vector_index < rev_col_map_size);
3279  reverse_column_map[vector_index].push_back(index);
3280  }
3281  }
3282  }
3283  }
3284  }
3285  std::vector<std::vector<int32> > rearranged_column_map;
3286  RearrangeIndexes(reverse_column_map, &rearranged_column_map);
3287  for (int32 p = 0; p < rearranged_column_map.size(); p++) {
3288  CuArray<int32> cu_cols(rearranged_column_map[p]);
3289  in_deriv->AddCols(in_deriv_patches, cu_cols);
3290  }
3291 }
3292 
3293 // back propagation function
3294 // see function declaration in nnet-simple-component.h for details
3295 void ConvolutionComponent::Backprop(const std::string &debug_info,
3296  const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
3297  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in_value,
3298  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &, // out_value,
3299  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv,
3300  Component *to_update_in,
3301  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *in_deriv) const {
3302  ConvolutionComponent *to_update =
3303  dynamic_cast<ConvolutionComponent*>(to_update_in);
3304  const int32 num_x_steps = (1 + (input_x_dim_ - filt_x_dim_) / filt_x_step_),
3305  num_y_steps = (1 + (input_y_dim_ - filt_y_dim_) / filt_y_step_),
3306  num_filters = filter_params_.NumRows(),
3307  num_frames = out_deriv.NumRows(),
3308  filter_dim = filter_params_.NumCols();
3309 
3310  KALDI_ASSERT(out_deriv.NumRows() == num_frames &&
3311  out_deriv.NumCols() ==
3312  (num_filters * num_x_steps * num_y_steps));
3313 
3314  // Compute inderiv patches
3315  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> in_deriv_patches(num_frames,
3316  num_x_steps * num_y_steps * filter_dim,
3317  kSetZero);
3318 
3319  std::vector<CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>* > patch_deriv_batch, out_deriv_batch,
3320  filter_params_batch;
3321  CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>* filter_params_elem = new CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>(
3322  filter_params_, 0, filter_params_.NumRows(), 0,
3323  filter_params_.NumCols());
3324 
3325  for (int32 x_step = 0; x_step < num_x_steps; x_step++) {
3326  for (int32 y_step = 0; y_step < num_y_steps; y_step++) {
3327  int32 patch_number = x_step * num_y_steps + y_step;
3328 
3329  patch_deriv_batch.push_back(new CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>(
3330  in_deriv_patches.ColRange(
3331  patch_number * filter_dim, filter_dim)));
3332  out_deriv_batch.push_back(new CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>(out_deriv.ColRange(
3333  patch_number * num_filters, num_filters)));
3334  filter_params_batch.push_back(filter_params_elem);
3335  }
3336  }
3337  AddMatMatBatched<BaseFloat>(1.0, patch_deriv_batch,
3338  out_deriv_batch, kNoTrans,
3339  filter_params_batch, kNoTrans, 0.0);
3340 
3341  if (in_deriv) {
3342  // combine the derivatives from the individual input deriv patches
3343  // to compute input deriv matrix
3344  InderivPatchesToInderiv(in_deriv_patches, in_deriv);
3345  }
3346 
3347  if (to_update != NULL) {
3348  to_update->Update(debug_info, in_value, out_deriv, out_deriv_batch);
3349  }
3350 
3351  // release memory
3352  delete filter_params_elem;
3353  for (int32 p = 0; p < patch_deriv_batch.size(); p++) {
3354  delete patch_deriv_batch[p];
3355  delete out_deriv_batch[p];
3356  }
3357 }
3358 
3359 
3360 // update parameters
3361 // see function declaration in nnet-simple-component.h for details
3362 void ConvolutionComponent::Update(const std::string &debug_info,
3363  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in_value,
3364  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv,
3365  const std::vector<CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> *>& out_deriv_batch) {
3366  // useful dims
3367  const int32 num_x_steps = (1 + (input_x_dim_ - filt_x_dim_) / filt_x_step_),
3368  num_y_steps = (1 + (input_y_dim_ - filt_y_dim_) / filt_y_step_),
3369  num_filters = filter_params_.NumRows(),
3370  num_frames = out_deriv.NumRows(),
3371  filter_dim = filter_params_.NumCols();
3372  KALDI_ASSERT(out_deriv.NumRows() == num_frames &&
3373  out_deriv.NumCols() ==
3374  (num_filters * num_x_steps * num_y_steps));
3375 
3376 
3377  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> filters_grad;
3378  CuVector<BaseFloat> bias_grad;
3379 
3380  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> input_patches(num_frames,
3381  filter_dim * num_x_steps * num_y_steps,
3382  kUndefined);
3383  InputToInputPatches(in_value, &input_patches);
3384 
3385  filters_grad.Resize(num_filters, filter_dim, kSetZero); // reset
3386  bias_grad.Resize(num_filters, kSetZero); // reset
3387 
3388  // create a single large matrix holding the smaller matrices
3389  // from the vector container filters_grad_batch along the rows
3390  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> filters_grad_blocks_batch(
3391  num_x_steps * num_y_steps * filters_grad.NumRows(),
3392  filters_grad.NumCols());
3393 
3394  std::vector<CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>* > filters_grad_batch, input_patch_batch;
3395 
3396  for (int32 x_step = 0; x_step < num_x_steps; x_step++) {
3397  for (int32 y_step = 0; y_step < num_y_steps; y_step++) {
3398  int32 patch_number = x_step * num_y_steps + y_step;
3399  filters_grad_batch.push_back(new CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>(
3400  filters_grad_blocks_batch.RowRange(
3401  patch_number * filters_grad.NumRows(),
3402  filters_grad.NumRows())));
3403 
3404  input_patch_batch.push_back(new CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>(
3405  input_patches.ColRange(patch_number * filter_dim, filter_dim)));
3406  }
3407  }
3408 
3409  AddMatMatBatched<BaseFloat>(1.0, filters_grad_batch, out_deriv_batch, kTrans,
3410  input_patch_batch, kNoTrans, 1.0);
3411 
3412  // add the row blocks together to filters_grad
3413  filters_grad.AddMatBlocks(1.0, filters_grad_blocks_batch);
3414 
3415  // create a matrix holding the col blocks sum of out_deriv
3416  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> out_deriv_col_blocks_sum(out_deriv.NumRows(),
3417  num_filters);
3418 
3419  // add the col blocks together to out_deriv_col_blocks_sum
3420  out_deriv_col_blocks_sum.AddMatBlocks(1.0, out_deriv);
3421 
3422  bias_grad.AddRowSumMat(1.0, out_deriv_col_blocks_sum, 1.0);
3423 
3424  // release memory
3425  for (int32 p = 0; p < input_patch_batch.size(); p++) {
3426  delete filters_grad_batch[p];
3427  delete input_patch_batch[p];
3428  }
3429 
3430  //
3431  // update
3432  //
3433  filter_params_.AddMat(learning_rate_, filters_grad);
3434  bias_params_.AddVec(learning_rate_, bias_grad);
3435 }
3436 
3437 void ConvolutionComponent::SetZero(bool treat_as_gradient) {
3438  if (treat_as_gradient) {
3439  learning_rate_ = 1.0; // don't call SetLearningRate, that would apply the
3440  // learning rate factor.
3441  is_gradient_ = true;
3442  }
3443  filter_params_.SetZero();
3444  bias_params_.SetZero();
3445 }
3446 
3447 void ConvolutionComponent::Read(std::istream &is, bool binary) {
3448  ReadUpdatableCommon(is, binary); // Read opening tag and learning rate.
3449  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<InputXDim>");
3450  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &input_x_dim_);
3451  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<InputYDim>");
3452  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &input_y_dim_);
3453  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<InputZDim>");
3454  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &input_z_dim_);
3455  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<FiltXDim>");
3456  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &filt_x_dim_);
3457  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<FiltYDim>");
3458  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &filt_y_dim_);
3459  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<FiltXStep>");
3460  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &filt_x_step_);
3461  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<FiltYStep>");
3462  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &filt_y_step_);
3463  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<InputVectorization>");
3464  int32 input_vectorization;
3465  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &input_vectorization);
3466  input_vectorization_ = static_cast<TensorVectorizationType>(input_vectorization);
3467  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<FilterParams>");
3468  filter_params_.Read(is, binary);
3469  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<BiasParams>");
3470  bias_params_.Read(is, binary);
3471  std::string tok;
3472  ReadToken(is, binary, &tok);
3473  if (tok == "<IsGradient>") {
3474  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &is_gradient_);
3475  ExpectToken(is, binary, "</ConvolutionComponent>");
3476  } else {
3477  is_gradient_ = false;
3478  KALDI_ASSERT(tok == "</ConvolutionComponent>");
3479  }
3480 }
3481 
3482 void ConvolutionComponent::Write(std::ostream &os, bool binary) const {
3483  WriteUpdatableCommon(os, binary); // write opening tag and learning rate.
3484  WriteToken(os, binary, "<InputXDim>");
3485  WriteBasicType(os, binary, input_x_dim_);
3486  WriteToken(os, binary, "<InputYDim>");
3487  WriteBasicType(os, binary, input_y_dim_);
3488  WriteToken(os, binary, "<InputZDim>");
3489  WriteBasicType(os, binary, input_z_dim_);
3490  WriteToken(os, binary, "<FiltXDim>");
3491  WriteBasicType(os, binary, filt_x_dim_);
3492  WriteToken(os, binary, "<FiltYDim>");
3493  WriteBasicType(os, binary, filt_y_dim_);
3494  WriteToken(os, binary, "<FiltXStep>");
3495  WriteBasicType(os, binary, filt_x_step_);
3496  WriteToken(os, binary, "<FiltYStep>");
3497  WriteBasicType(os, binary, filt_y_step_);
3498  WriteToken(os, binary, "<InputVectorization>");
3499  WriteBasicType(os, binary, static_cast<int32>(input_vectorization_));
3500  WriteToken(os, binary, "<FilterParams>");
3501  filter_params_.Write(os, binary);
3502  WriteToken(os, binary, "<BiasParams>");
3503  bias_params_.Write(os, binary);
3504  WriteToken(os, binary, "<IsGradient>");
3505  WriteBasicType(os, binary, is_gradient_);
3506  WriteToken(os, binary, "</ConvolutionComponent>");
3507 }
3508 
3509 BaseFloat ConvolutionComponent::DotProduct(const UpdatableComponent &other_in) const {
3510  const ConvolutionComponent *other =
3511  dynamic_cast<const ConvolutionComponent*>(&other_in);
3512  return TraceMatMat(filter_params_, other->filter_params_, kTrans)
3513  + VecVec(bias_params_, other->bias_params_);
3514 }
3515 
3516 Component* ConvolutionComponent::Copy() const {
3517  ConvolutionComponent *ans = new ConvolutionComponent(*this);
3518  return ans;
3519 }
3520 
3521 void ConvolutionComponent::PerturbParams(BaseFloat stddev) {
3522  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> temp_filter_params(filter_params_);
3523  temp_filter_params.SetRandn();
3524  filter_params_.AddMat(stddev, temp_filter_params);
3525 
3526  CuVector<BaseFloat> temp_bias_params(bias_params_);
3527  temp_bias_params.SetRandn();
3528  bias_params_.AddVec(stddev, temp_bias_params);
3529 }
3530 
3531 void ConvolutionComponent::SetParams(const VectorBase<BaseFloat> &bias,
3532  const MatrixBase<BaseFloat> &filter) {
3533  bias_params_ = bias;
3534  filter_params_ = filter;
3535  KALDI_ASSERT(bias_params_.Dim() == filter_params_.NumRows());
3536 }
3537 
3538 int32 ConvolutionComponent::NumParameters() const {
3539  return (filter_params_.NumCols() + 1) * filter_params_.NumRows();
3540 }
3541 
3542 void ConvolutionComponent::Vectorize(VectorBase<BaseFloat> *params) const {
3543  KALDI_ASSERT(params->Dim() == this->NumParameters());
3544  int32 num_filter_params = filter_params_.NumCols() * filter_params_.NumRows();
3545  params->Range(0, num_filter_params).CopyRowsFromMat(filter_params_);
3546  params->Range(num_filter_params, bias_params_.Dim()).CopyFromVec(bias_params_);
3547 }
3548 void ConvolutionComponent::UnVectorize(const VectorBase<BaseFloat> &params) {
3549  KALDI_ASSERT(params.Dim() == this->NumParameters());
3550  int32 num_filter_params = filter_params_.NumCols() * filter_params_.NumRows();
3551  filter_params_.CopyRowsFromVec(params.Range(0, num_filter_params));
3552  bias_params_.CopyFromVec(params.Range(num_filter_params, bias_params_.Dim()));
3553 }
3554 
3555 Convolutional1dComponent::Convolutional1dComponent():
3556  UpdatableComponent(),
3557  patch_dim_(0), patch_step_(0), patch_stride_(0), is_gradient_(false) {}
3558 
3559 Convolutional1dComponent::Convolutional1dComponent(const Convolutional1dComponent &component):
3560  UpdatableComponent(component),
3561  filter_params_(component.filter_params_),
3562  bias_params_(component.bias_params_),
3563  is_gradient_(component.is_gradient_) {}
3564 
3565 Convolutional1dComponent::Convolutional1dComponent(const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &filter_params,
3566  const CuVectorBase<BaseFloat> &bias_params,
3567  BaseFloat learning_rate):
3568  filter_params_(filter_params),
3569  bias_params_(bias_params) {
3570  SetLearningRate(learning_rate);
3571  KALDI_ASSERT(filter_params.NumRows() == bias_params.Dim() &&
3572  bias_params.Dim() != 0);
3573  is_gradient_ = false;
3574 }
3575 
3576 // aquire input dim
3577 int32 Convolutional1dComponent::InputDim() const {
3578  int32 filter_dim = filter_params_.NumCols();
3579  int32 num_splice = filter_dim / patch_dim_;
3580  return patch_stride_ * num_splice;
3581 }
3582 
3583 // aquire output dim
3584 int32 Convolutional1dComponent::OutputDim() const {
3585  int32 num_filters = filter_params_.NumRows();
3586  int32 num_patches = 1 + (patch_stride_ - patch_dim_) / patch_step_;
3587  return num_patches * num_filters;
3588 }
3589 
3590 // initialize the component using hyperparameters
3591 void Convolutional1dComponent::Init(int32 input_dim, int32 output_dim,
3592  int32 patch_dim, int32 patch_step, int32 patch_stride,
3593  BaseFloat param_stddev, BaseFloat bias_stddev) {
3594  patch_dim_ = patch_dim;
3595  patch_step_ = patch_step;
3596  patch_stride_ = patch_stride;
3597  int32 num_splice = input_dim / patch_stride;
3598  int32 filter_dim = num_splice * patch_dim;
3599  int32 num_patches = 1 + (patch_stride - patch_dim) / patch_step;
3600  int32 num_filters = output_dim / num_patches;
3601  KALDI_ASSERT(input_dim % patch_stride == 0);
3602  KALDI_ASSERT((patch_stride - patch_dim) % patch_step == 0);
3603  KALDI_ASSERT(output_dim % num_patches == 0);
3604 
3605  filter_params_.Resize(num_filters, filter_dim);
3606  bias_params_.Resize(num_filters);
3607  KALDI_ASSERT(param_stddev >= 0.0 && bias_stddev >= 0.0);
3608  filter_params_.SetRandn();
3609  filter_params_.Scale(param_stddev);
3610  bias_params_.SetRandn();
3611  bias_params_.Scale(bias_stddev);
3612 }
3613 
3614 // initialize the component using predefined matrix file
3615 void Convolutional1dComponent::Init(int32 patch_dim, int32 patch_step, int32 patch_stride,
3616  std::string matrix_filename) {
3617  patch_dim_ = patch_dim;
3618  patch_step_ = patch_step;
3619  patch_stride_ = patch_stride;
3620  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> mat;
3621  ReadKaldiObject(matrix_filename, &mat);
3622  KALDI_ASSERT(mat.NumCols() >= 2);
3623  int32 filter_dim = mat.NumCols() - 1, num_filters = mat.NumRows();
3624  filter_params_.Resize(num_filters, filter_dim);
3625  bias_params_.Resize(num_filters);
3626  filter_params_.CopyFromMat(mat.Range(0, num_filters, 0, filter_dim));
3627  bias_params_.CopyColFromMat(mat, filter_dim);
3628 }
3629 
3630 // resize the component, setting the parameters to zero, while
3631 // leaving any other configuration values the same
3632 void Convolutional1dComponent::Resize(int32 input_dim, int32 output_dim) {
3633  KALDI_ASSERT(input_dim > 0 && output_dim > 0);
3634  int32 num_splice = input_dim / patch_stride_;
3635  int32 filter_dim = num_splice * patch_dim_;
3636  int32 num_patches = 1 + (patch_stride_ - patch_dim_) / patch_step_;
3637  int32 num_filters = output_dim / num_patches;
3638  KALDI_ASSERT(input_dim % patch_stride_ == 0);
3639  KALDI_ASSERT((patch_stride_ - patch_dim_) % patch_step_ == 0);
3640  KALDI_ASSERT(output_dim % num_patches == 0);
3641  filter_params_.Resize(num_filters, filter_dim);
3642  bias_params_.Resize(num_filters);
3643 }
3644 
3645 // display information about component
3646 std::string Convolutional1dComponent::Info() const {
3647  std::ostringstream stream;
3648  int32 num_splice = InputDim() / patch_stride_;
3649  int32 filter_dim = num_splice * patch_dim_;
3650  int32 num_patches = 1 + (patch_stride_ - patch_dim_) / patch_step_;
3651  int32 num_filters = OutputDim() / num_patches;
3652 
3653  stream << UpdatableComponent::Info()
3654  << ", num-splice=" << num_splice
3655  << ", num-patches=" << num_patches
3656  << ", num-filters=" << num_filters
3657  << ", filter-dim=" << filter_dim;
3658  PrintParameterStats(stream, "filter-params", filter_params_);
3659  PrintParameterStats(stream, "bias-params", bias_params_, true);
3660  return stream.str();
3661 }
3662 
3663 // initialize the component using configuration file
3664 void Convolutional1dComponent::InitFromConfig(ConfigLine *cfl) {
3665  KALDI_WARN << "Convolutional1dComponent has been deprecated."
3666  << " Please use ConvolutionComponent.";
3667  bool ok = true;
3668  std::string matrix_filename;
3669  int32 input_dim = -1, output_dim = -1;
3670  int32 patch_dim = -1, patch_step = -1, patch_stride = -1;
3671  InitLearningRatesFromConfig(cfl);
3672  ok = ok && cfl->GetValue("patch-dim", &patch_dim);
3673  ok = ok && cfl->GetValue("patch-step", &patch_step);
3674  ok = ok && cfl->GetValue("patch-stride", &patch_stride);
3675  if (cfl->GetValue("matrix", &matrix_filename)) {
3676  // initialize from prefined parameter matrix
3677  Init(patch_dim, patch_step, patch_stride, matrix_filename);
3678  if (cfl->GetValue("input-dim", &input_dim))
3679  KALDI_ASSERT(input_dim == InputDim() &&
3680  "input-dim mismatch vs. matrix.");
3681  if (cfl->GetValue("output-dim", &output_dim))
3682  KALDI_ASSERT(output_dim == OutputDim() &&
3683  "output-dim mismatch vs. matrix.");
3684  } else {
3685  ok = ok && cfl->GetValue("input-dim", &input_dim);
3686  ok = ok && cfl->GetValue("output-dim", &output_dim);
3687  // initialize from configuration
3688  BaseFloat param_stddev = 1.0 / std::sqrt(input_dim), bias_stddev = 1.0;
3689  cfl->GetValue("param-stddev", &param_stddev);
3690  cfl->GetValue("bias-stddev", &bias_stddev);
3691  Init(input_dim, output_dim, patch_dim, patch_step, patch_stride,
3692  param_stddev, bias_stddev);
3693  }
3694  if (cfl->HasUnusedValues())
3695  KALDI_ERR << "Could not process these elements in initializer: "
3696  << cfl->UnusedValues();
3697  if (!ok)
3698  KALDI_ERR << "Bad initializer " << cfl->WholeLine();
3699 }
3700 
3701 // propagation function
3702 
3703 /* Convolutional propagation is explained:
3704  - Recall the AffineComponent, input X is defined #frames x $input-dim,
3705  linear matrix A is defined $output-dim x $input-dim, and bias
3706  vector B is defined by length $output-dim. The propagation is
3707  Y = X * A' + B (1)
3708  where "*" is row-by-row processing of X, executing vector-matrix
3709  multiplication
3710  Y(t) = X(t) * A' + B (2)
3711  which converts each row of input of dim $input-dim to a row of output of
3712  dim $output-dim by A' (' defines transpose).
3713  - In Convolution1dComponent, A is redefined $num-filters x $filter-dim,
3714  and bias vector B is redefined by length $num-filters. The propatation is
3715  Y = X o A' + B (3)
3716  where "o" is also row-by-row processing of X, but executing vector-matrix
3717  convolution, which consists of a group of vector-vector convolutions.
3718  For instance, the convolution of X(t) and the i-th filter A(i) is
3719  Y(t,i) = X(t) o A'(i) + B(i) (4)
3720  The convolution used here is valid convolution. Meaning that the
3721  output of M o N is of dim |M| - |N| + 1, assuming M is not shorter then N.
3722 
3723  Note that in all the equations, B is extended to proper dimensions
3724  for legal addition.
3725 */
3726 void Convolutional1dComponent::Propagate(const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
3727  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in,
3728  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *out) const {
3729  // dims
3730  int32 num_splice = InputDim() / patch_stride_;
3731  int32 num_patches = 1 + (patch_stride_ - patch_dim_) / patch_step_;
3732  int32 num_filters = filter_params_.NumRows();
3733  int32 num_frames = in.NumRows();
3734  int32 filter_dim = filter_params_.NumCols();
3735 
3740  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> patches(num_frames, filter_dim * num_patches, kUndefined);
3741  // column_map is indexed by the column-index of "patches",
3742  // and the value is the corresponding column-index of "in".
3743  std::vector<int32> column_map(filter_dim * num_patches);
3744 
3745  // build-up a column selection map
3746  for (int32 p = 0, index = 0; p < num_patches; p++) {
3747  for (int32 s = 0; s < num_splice; s++) {
3748  for (int32 d = 0; d < patch_dim_; d++, index++) {
3749  column_map[index] = p * patch_step_ + s * patch_stride_ + d;
3750  }
3751  }
3752  }
3753  CuArray<int32> cu_cols(column_map);
3754  patches.CopyCols(in, cu_cols);
3755 
3756  //
3757  // compute filter activations
3758  //
3759 
3760  std::vector<CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>* > tgt_batch, patch_batch, filter_params_batch;
3761 
3762  CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>* filter_params_elem = new CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>(
3763  filter_params_, 0, filter_params_.NumRows(), 0,
3764  filter_params_.NumCols());
3765 
3766  // form batch in vector container
3767  for (int32 p = 0; p < num_patches; p++) {
3768  // form batch in vector container. for filter_params_batch, all elements
3769  // point to the same copy filter_params_elem
3770  tgt_batch.push_back(new CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>(out->ColRange(p * num_filters,
3771  num_filters)));
3772  patch_batch.push_back(new CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>(patches.ColRange(p * filter_dim,
3773  filter_dim)));
3774  filter_params_batch.push_back(filter_params_elem);
3775 
3776  tgt_batch[p]->AddVecToRows(1.0, bias_params_, 1.0); // add bias
3777  }
3778 
3779  // apply all filters
3780  AddMatMatBatched<BaseFloat>(1.0, tgt_batch, patch_batch, kNoTrans,
3781  filter_params_batch, kTrans, 1.0);
3782 
3783  // release memory
3784  delete filter_params_elem;
3785  for (int32 p = 0; p < num_patches; p++) {
3786  delete tgt_batch[p];
3787  delete patch_batch[p];
3788  }
3789 }
3790 
3791 // scale the parameters
3792 void Convolutional1dComponent::Scale(BaseFloat scale) {
3793  filter_params_.Scale(scale);
3794  bias_params_.Scale(scale);
3795 }
3796 
3797 // add another convolution component
3798 void Convolutional1dComponent::Add(BaseFloat alpha, const Component &other_in) {
3799  const Convolutional1dComponent *other =
3800  dynamic_cast<const Convolutional1dComponent*>(&other_in);
3801  KALDI_ASSERT(other != NULL);
3802  filter_params_.AddMat(alpha, other->filter_params_);
3803  bias_params_.AddVec(alpha, other->bias_params_);
3804 }
3805 
3806 /*
3807  This function does an operation similar to reversing a map,
3808  except it handles maps that are not one-to-one by outputting
3809  the reversed map as a vector of lists.
3810  @param[in] forward_indexes is a vector of int32, each of whose
3811  elements is between 0 and input_dim - 1.
3812  @param[in] input_dim. See definitions of forward_indexes and
3813  backward_indexes.
3814  @param[out] backward_indexes is a vector of dimension input_dim
3815  of lists, The list at (backward_indexes[i]) is a list
3816  of all indexes j such that forward_indexes[j] = i.
3817 */
3818 void Convolutional1dComponent::ReverseIndexes(const std::vector<int32> &forward_indexes,
3819  int32 input_dim,
3820  std::vector<std::vector<int32> > *backward_indexes) {
3821  int32 i, size = forward_indexes.size();
3822  int32 reserve_size = 2 + size / input_dim;
3823  backward_indexes->resize(input_dim);
3824  std::vector<std::vector<int32> >::iterator iter = backward_indexes->begin(),
3825  end = backward_indexes->end();
3826  for (; iter != end; ++iter)
3827  iter->reserve(reserve_size);
3828  for (int32 j = 0; j < forward_indexes.size(); j++) {
3829  i = forward_indexes[j];
3830  KALDI_ASSERT(i < input_dim);
3831  (*backward_indexes)[i].push_back(j);
3832  }
3833 }
3834 
3835 /*
3836  This function transforms a vector of lists into a list of vectors,
3837  padded with -1.
3838  @param[in] The input vector of lists. Let in.size() be D, and let
3839  the longest list length (i.e. the max of in[i].size()) be L.
3840  @param[out] The output list of vectors. The length of the list will
3841  be L, each vector-dimension will be D (i.e. out[i].size() == D),
3842  and if in[i] == j, then for some k we will have that
3843  out[k][j] = i. The output vectors are padded with -1
3844  where necessary if not all the input lists have the same side.
3845 */
3846 void Convolutional1dComponent::RearrangeIndexes(const std::vector<std::vector<int32> > &in,
3847  std::vector<std::vector<int32> > *out) {
3848  int32 D = in.size();
3849  int32 L = 0;
3850  for (int32 i = 0; i < D; i++)
3851  if (in[i].size() > L)
3852  L = in[i].size();
3853  out->resize(L);
3854  for (int32 i = 0; i < L; i++)
3855  (*out)[i].resize(D, -1);
3856  for (int32 i = 0; i < D; i++) {
3857  for (int32 j = 0; j < in[i].size(); j++) {
3858  (*out)[j][i] = in[i][j];
3859  }
3860  }
3861 }
3862 
3863 
3864 // back propagation function
3865 void Convolutional1dComponent::Backprop(const std::string &debug_info,
3866  const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
3867  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in_value,
3868  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &, // out_value,
3869  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv,
3870  Component *to_update_in,
3871  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *in_deriv) const {
3872  Convolutional1dComponent *to_update = dynamic_cast<Convolutional1dComponent*>(to_update_in);
3873  int32 num_splice = InputDim() / patch_stride_;
3874  int32 num_patches = 1 + (patch_stride_ - patch_dim_) / patch_step_;
3875  int32 num_filters = filter_params_.NumRows();
3876  int32 num_frames = out_deriv.NumRows();
3877  int32 filter_dim = filter_params_.NumCols();
3878 
3884  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> patches_deriv(num_frames, filter_dim * num_patches, kSetZero);
3885 
3886  //
3887  // backpropagate to vector of matrices
3888  // (corresponding to position of a filter)
3889  //
3890  std::vector<CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>* > patch_deriv_batch, out_deriv_batch,
3891  filter_params_batch;
3892 
3893  CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>* filter_params_elem = new CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>(
3894  filter_params_, 0, filter_params_.NumRows(), 0,
3895  filter_params_.NumCols());
3896 
3897  // form batch in vector container
3898  for (int32 p = 0; p < num_patches; p++) {
3899  // form batch in vector container. for filter_params_batch, all elements
3900  // point to the same copy filter_params_elem
3901  patch_deriv_batch.push_back(new CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>(patches_deriv.ColRange(
3902  p * filter_dim, filter_dim)));
3903  out_deriv_batch.push_back(new CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>(out_deriv.ColRange(
3904  p * num_filters, num_filters)));
3905  filter_params_batch.push_back(filter_params_elem);
3906  }
3907  AddMatMatBatched<BaseFloat>(1.0, patch_deriv_batch, out_deriv_batch, kNoTrans,
3908  filter_params_batch, kNoTrans, 0.0);
3909 
3910  // release memory
3911  delete filter_params_elem;
3912  for (int32 p = 0; p < num_patches; p++) {
3913  delete patch_deriv_batch[p];
3914  delete out_deriv_batch[p];
3915  }
3916 
3917  // sum the derivatives into in_deriv
3918  std::vector<int32> column_map(filter_dim * num_patches);
3919  for (int32 p = 0, index = 0; p < num_patches; p++) {
3920  for (int32 s = 0; s < num_splice; s++) {
3921  for (int32 d = 0; d < patch_dim_; d++, index++) {
3922  column_map[index] = p * patch_step_ + s * patch_stride_ + d;
3923  }
3924  }
3925  }
3926 
3927  if (in_deriv) {
3928  std::vector<std::vector<int32> > reversed_column_map;
3929  ReverseIndexes(column_map, InputDim(), &reversed_column_map);
3930  std::vector<std::vector<int32> > rearranged_column_map;
3931  RearrangeIndexes(reversed_column_map, &rearranged_column_map);
3932  for (int32 p = 0; p < rearranged_column_map.size(); p++) {
3933  CuArray<int32> cu_cols(rearranged_column_map[p]);
3934  in_deriv->AddCols(patches_deriv, cu_cols);
3935  }
3936  }
3937 
3938  if (to_update != NULL) {
3939  // Next update the model (must do this 2nd so the derivatives we propagate
3940  // are accurate, in case this == to_update_in.)
3941  to_update->Update(debug_info, in_value, out_deriv);
3942  }
3943 }
3944 
3945 void Convolutional1dComponent::SetZero(bool treat_as_gradient) {
3946  if (treat_as_gradient) {
