3947  learning_rate_ = 1.0; // don't call SetLearningRate, that would apply the
3948  // learning rate factor.
3949  is_gradient_ = true;
3950  }
3951  filter_params_.SetZero();
3952  bias_params_.SetZero();
3953 }
3954 
3955 void Convolutional1dComponent::Read(std::istream &is, bool binary) {
3956  ReadUpdatableCommon(is, binary); // Read opening tag and learning rate.
3957  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<PatchDim>");
3958  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &patch_dim_);
3959  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<PatchStep>");
3960  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &patch_step_);
3961  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<PatchStride>");
3962  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &patch_stride_);
3963  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<FilterParams>");
3964  filter_params_.Read(is, binary);
3965  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<BiasParams>");
3966  bias_params_.Read(is, binary);
3967  std::string tok;
3968  ReadToken(is, binary, &tok);
3969  if (tok == "<IsGradient>") {
3970  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &is_gradient_);
3971  ExpectToken(is, binary, "</Convolutional1dComponent>");
3972  } else {
3973  is_gradient_ = false;
3974  KALDI_ASSERT(tok == "</Convolutional1dComponent>");
3975  }
3976 }
3977 
3978 void Convolutional1dComponent::Write(std::ostream &os, bool binary) const {
3979  WriteUpdatableCommon(os, binary); // Write opening tag and learning rate
3980  WriteToken(os, binary, "<PatchDim>");
3981  WriteBasicType(os, binary, patch_dim_);
3982  WriteToken(os, binary, "<PatchStep>");
3983  WriteBasicType(os, binary, patch_step_);
3984  WriteToken(os, binary, "<PatchStride>");
3985  WriteBasicType(os, binary, patch_stride_);
3986  WriteToken(os, binary, "<FilterParams>");
3987  filter_params_.Write(os, binary);
3988  WriteToken(os, binary, "<BiasParams>");
3989  bias_params_.Write(os, binary);
3990  WriteToken(os, binary, "<IsGradient>");
3991  WriteBasicType(os, binary, is_gradient_);
3992  WriteToken(os, binary, "</Convolutional1dComponent>");
3993 }
3994 
3995 BaseFloat Convolutional1dComponent::DotProduct(const UpdatableComponent &other_in) const {
3996  const Convolutional1dComponent *other =
3997  dynamic_cast<const Convolutional1dComponent*>(&other_in);
3998  return TraceMatMat(filter_params_, other->filter_params_, kTrans)
3999  + VecVec(bias_params_, other->bias_params_);
4000 }
4001 
4002 Component* Convolutional1dComponent::Copy() const {
4003  Convolutional1dComponent *ans = new Convolutional1dComponent();
4004  ans->learning_rate_ = learning_rate_;
4005  ans->patch_dim_ = patch_dim_;
4006  ans->patch_step_ = patch_step_;
4007  ans->patch_stride_ = patch_stride_;
4008  ans->filter_params_ = filter_params_;
4009  ans->bias_params_ = bias_params_;
4010  ans->is_gradient_ = is_gradient_;
4011  return ans;
4012 }
4013 
4014 void Convolutional1dComponent::PerturbParams(BaseFloat stddev) {
4015  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> temp_filter_params(filter_params_);
4016  temp_filter_params.SetRandn();
4017  filter_params_.AddMat(stddev, temp_filter_params);
4018 
4019  CuVector<BaseFloat> temp_bias_params(bias_params_);
4020  temp_bias_params.SetRandn();
4021  bias_params_.AddVec(stddev, temp_bias_params);
4022 }
4023 
4024 void Convolutional1dComponent::SetParams(const VectorBase<BaseFloat> &bias,
4025  const MatrixBase<BaseFloat> &filter) {
4026  bias_params_ = bias;
4027  filter_params_ = filter;
4028  KALDI_ASSERT(bias_params_.Dim() == filter_params_.NumRows());
4029 }
4030 
4031 int32 Convolutional1dComponent::NumParameters() const {
4032  return (filter_params_.NumCols() + 1) * filter_params_.NumRows();
4033 }
4034 
4035 // update parameters
4036 void Convolutional1dComponent::Update(const std::string &debug_info,
4037  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in_value,
4038  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv) {
4039  // useful dims
4040  int32 num_patches = 1 + (patch_stride_ - patch_dim_) / patch_step_;
4041  int32 num_filters = filter_params_.NumRows();
4042  int32 filter_dim = filter_params_.NumCols();
4043  int32 num_frames = in_value.NumRows();
4044  int32 num_splice = InputDim() / patch_stride_;
4045  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> filters_grad;
4046  CuVector<BaseFloat> bias_grad;
4047 
4052  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> patches(num_frames, filter_dim * num_patches, kUndefined);
4053  std::vector<int32> column_map(filter_dim * num_patches);
4054  for (int32 p = 0, index = 0; p < num_patches; p++) {
4055  for (int32 s = 0; s < num_splice; s++) {
4056  for (int32 d = 0; d < patch_dim_; d++, index++) {
4057  column_map[index] = p * patch_step_ + s * patch_stride_ + d;
4058  }
4059  }
4060  }
4061  CuArray<int32> cu_cols(column_map);
4062  patches.CopyCols(in_value, cu_cols);
4063 
4064  //
4065  // calculate the gradient
4066  //
4067  filters_grad.Resize(num_filters, filter_dim, kSetZero); // reset
4068  bias_grad.Resize(num_filters, kSetZero); // reset
4069 
4070  //
4071  // use all the patches
4072  //
4073 
4074  // create a single large matrix holding the smaller matrices
4075  // from the vector container filters_grad_batch along the rows
4076  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> filters_grad_blocks_batch(
4077  num_patches * filters_grad.NumRows(), filters_grad.NumCols());
4078 
4079  std::vector<CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>* > filters_grad_batch, diff_patch_batch,
4080  patch_batch;
4081  for (int32 p = 0; p < num_patches; p++) {
4082  // form batch in vector container
4083  filters_grad_batch.push_back(new CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>(
4084  filters_grad_blocks_batch.RowRange(
4085  p * filters_grad.NumRows(),
4086  filters_grad.NumRows())));
4087  diff_patch_batch.push_back(new CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>(out_deriv.ColRange(
4088  p * num_filters, num_filters)));
4089  patch_batch.push_back(new CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>(patches.ColRange(
4090  p * filter_dim, filter_dim)));
4091  }
4092 
4093  AddMatMatBatched<BaseFloat>(1.0, filters_grad_batch, diff_patch_batch, kTrans, patch_batch,
4094  kNoTrans, 1.0);
4095 
4096  // add the row blocks together to filters_grad
4097  filters_grad.AddMatBlocks(1.0, filters_grad_blocks_batch);
4098 
4099  // create a matrix holding the col blocks sum of out_deriv
4100  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> out_deriv_col_blocks_sum(out_deriv.NumRows(), num_filters);
4101 
4102  // add the col blocks together to out_deriv_col_blocks_sum
4103  out_deriv_col_blocks_sum.AddMatBlocks(1.0, out_deriv);
4104 
4105  bias_grad.AddRowSumMat(1.0, out_deriv_col_blocks_sum, 1.0);
4106 
4107  // release memory
4108  for (int32 p = 0; p < num_patches; p++) {
4109  delete filters_grad_batch[p];
4110  delete diff_patch_batch[p];
4111  delete patch_batch[p];
4112  }
4113 
4114  //
4115  // update
4116  //
4117  filter_params_.AddMat(learning_rate_, filters_grad);
4118  bias_params_.AddVec(learning_rate_, bias_grad);
4119 }
4120 
4121 void Convolutional1dComponent::Vectorize(VectorBase<BaseFloat> *params) const {
4122  KALDI_ASSERT(params->Dim() == this->NumParameters());
4123  int32 num_filter_params = filter_params_.NumCols() * filter_params_.NumRows();
4124  params->Range(0, num_filter_params).CopyRowsFromMat(filter_params_);
4125  params->Range(num_filter_params, bias_params_.Dim()).CopyFromVec(bias_params_);
4126 }
4127 void Convolutional1dComponent::UnVectorize(const VectorBase<BaseFloat> &params) {
4128  KALDI_ASSERT(params.Dim() == this->NumParameters());
4129  int32 num_filter_params = filter_params_.NumCols() * filter_params_.NumRows();
4130  filter_params_.CopyRowsFromVec(params.Range(0, num_filter_params));
4131  bias_params_.CopyFromVec(params.Range(num_filter_params, bias_params_.Dim()));
4132 }
4133 
4134 void MaxpoolingComponent::Init(int32 input_dim, int32 output_dim,
4135  int32 pool_size, int32 pool_stride) {
4136  input_dim_ = input_dim;
4137  output_dim_ = output_dim;
4138  pool_size_ = pool_size;
4139  pool_stride_ = pool_stride;
4140 
4141  // sanity check
4142  // number of patches
4143  KALDI_ASSERT(input_dim_ % pool_stride_ == 0);
4144  int32 num_patches = input_dim_ / pool_stride_;
4145  // number of pools
4146  KALDI_ASSERT(num_patches % pool_size_ == 0);
4147  int32 num_pools = num_patches / pool_size_;
4148  // check output dim
4149  KALDI_ASSERT(output_dim_ == num_pools * pool_stride_);
4150 }
4151 
4152 void MaxpoolingComponent::InitFromConfig(ConfigLine *cfl) {
4153  int32 input_dim = 0;
4154  int32 output_dim = 0;
4155  int32 pool_size = -1, pool_stride = -1;
4156  bool ok = true;
4157 
4158  ok = ok && cfl->GetValue("input-dim", &input_dim);
4159  ok = ok && cfl->GetValue("output-dim", &output_dim);
4160  ok = ok && cfl->GetValue("pool-size", &pool_size);
4161  ok = ok && cfl->GetValue("pool-stride", &pool_stride);
4162 
4163  KALDI_LOG << output_dim << " " << input_dim << " " << ok;
4164  KALDI_LOG << "Pool: " << pool_size << " "
4165  << pool_stride << " " << ok;
4166  if (cfl->HasUnusedValues())
4167  KALDI_ERR << "Could not process these elements in initializer: "
4168  << cfl->UnusedValues();
4169  if (!ok || output_dim <= 0)
4170  KALDI_ERR << "Invalid initializer for layer of type "
4171  << Type() << ": \"" << cfl->WholeLine() << "\"";
4172  Init(input_dim, output_dim, pool_size, pool_stride);
4173 }
4174 
4175 void MaxpoolingComponent::Propagate(const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
4176  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in,
4177  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *out) const {
4178  int32 num_patches = input_dim_ / pool_stride_;
4179  int32 num_pools = num_patches / pool_size_;
4180 
4181  // do the max-pooling
4182  for (int32 q = 0; q < num_pools; q++) {
4183  // get output buffer of the pool
4184  CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> pool(out->ColRange(q * pool_stride_, pool_stride_));
4185  pool.Set(-1e20); // reset a large negative value
4186  for (int32 r = 0; r < pool_size_; r++) {
4187  // col-by-col block comparison pool
4188  int32 p = r + q * pool_size_;
4189  pool.Max(in.ColRange(p * pool_stride_, pool_stride_));
4190  }
4191  }
4192 }
4193 
4194 void MaxpoolingComponent::Backprop(const std::string &debug_info,
4195  const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
4196  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in_value,
4197  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_value,
4198  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv,
4199  Component *, // to_update,
4200  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *in_deriv) const {
4201  int32 num_patches = input_dim_ / pool_stride_;
4202  int32 num_pools = num_patches / pool_size_;
4203  std::vector<int32> patch_summands(num_patches, 0);
4204 
4205  for(int32 q = 0; q < num_pools; q++) {
4206  for(int32 r = 0; r < pool_size_; r++) {
4207  int32 p = r + q * pool_size_;
4208  CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> in_p(in_value.ColRange(p * pool_stride_, pool_stride_));
4209  CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> out_q(out_value.ColRange(q * pool_stride_, pool_stride_));
4210  CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> tgt(in_deriv->ColRange(p * pool_stride_, pool_stride_));
4211  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> src(out_deriv.ColRange(q * pool_stride_, pool_stride_));
4212  // zero-out mask
4213  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> mask;
4214  in_p.EqualElementMask(out_q, &mask);
4215  src.MulElements(mask);
4216  tgt.AddMat(1.0, src);
4217  // summed deriv info
4218  patch_summands[p] += 1;
4219  }
4220  }
4221 
4222  // scale in_deriv of overlaped pools
4223  for(int32 p = 0; p < num_patches; p++) {
4224  CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> tgt(in_deriv->ColRange(p * pool_stride_, pool_stride_));
4225  KALDI_ASSERT(patch_summands[p] > 0);
4226  tgt.Scale(1.0 / patch_summands[p]);
4227  }
4228 }
4229 
4230 void MaxpoolingComponent::Read(std::istream &is, bool binary) {
4231  ExpectOneOrTwoTokens(is, binary, "<MaxpoolingComponent>", "<InputDim>");
4232  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &input_dim_);
4233  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<OutputDim>");
4234  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &output_dim_);
4235  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<PoolSize>");
4236  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &pool_size_);
4237  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<PoolStride>");
4238  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &pool_stride_);
4239  ExpectToken(is, binary, "</MaxpoolingComponent>");
4240 }
4241 
4242 void MaxpoolingComponent::Write(std::ostream &os, bool binary) const {
4243  WriteToken(os, binary, "<MaxpoolingComponent>");
4244  WriteToken(os, binary, "<InputDim>");
4245  WriteBasicType(os, binary, input_dim_);
4246  WriteToken(os, binary, "<OutputDim>");
4247  WriteBasicType(os, binary, output_dim_);
4248  WriteToken(os, binary, "<PoolSize>");
4249  WriteBasicType(os, binary, pool_size_);
4250  WriteToken(os, binary, "<PoolStride>");
4251  WriteBasicType(os, binary, pool_stride_);
4252  WriteToken(os, binary, "</MaxpoolingComponent>");
4253 }
4254 
4255 std::string MaxpoolingComponent::Info() const {
4256  std::ostringstream stream;
4257  stream << Type() << ", input-dim = " << input_dim_
4258  << ", output-dim = " << output_dim_
4259  << ", pool-size = " << pool_size_
4260  << ", pool-stride = " << pool_stride_;
4261  return stream.str();
4262 }
4263 
4264 void PermuteComponent::ComputeReverseColumnMap() {
4265  int32 dim = column_map_.Dim();
4266  KALDI_ASSERT(dim > 0);
4267  std::vector<int32> reverse_column_map_cpu(dim, -1),
4268  column_map_cpu(dim);
4269  column_map_.CopyToVec(&column_map_cpu);
4270  for (int32 i = 0; i < dim; i++) {
4271  int32 &dest = reverse_column_map_cpu[column_map_cpu[i]];
4272  if (dest != -1)
4273  KALDI_ERR << "Column map does not represent a permutation.";
4274  dest = i;
4275  }
4276  reverse_column_map_.Resize(dim);
4277  reverse_column_map_.CopyFromVec(reverse_column_map_cpu);
4278 }
4279 
4280 Component* PermuteComponent::Copy() const {
4281  PermuteComponent *ans = new PermuteComponent();
4282  ans->column_map_ = column_map_;
4283  ans->reverse_column_map_ = reverse_column_map_;
4284  return ans;
4285 }
4286 
4287 void PermuteComponent::Propagate(const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
4288  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in,
4289  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *out) const {
4290  out->CopyCols(in, column_map_);
4291 }
4292 void PermuteComponent::Backprop(const std::string &debug_info,
4293  const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
4294  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &, //in_value
4295  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &, // out_value,
4296  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv,
4297  Component *to_update,
4298  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *in_deriv) const {
4299  in_deriv->CopyCols(out_deriv, reverse_column_map_);
4300 }
4301 
4302 void PermuteComponent::InitFromConfig(ConfigLine *cfl) {
4303  bool ok = true;
4304  std::string column_map_str;
4305  ok = ok && cfl->GetValue("column-map", &column_map_str);
4306  std::vector<int32> column_map;
4307  if (!SplitStringToIntegers(column_map_str, ",", true, &column_map))
4308  KALDI_ERR << "Bad initializer in PermuteComponent: column-map="
4309  << column_map_str;
4310  if (cfl->HasUnusedValues())
4311  KALDI_ERR << "Could not process these elements in initializer: "
4312  << cfl->UnusedValues();
4313  if (!ok)
4314  KALDI_ERR << "Invalid initializer for layer of type "
4315  << Type() << ": \"" << cfl->WholeLine() << "\"";
4316  Init(column_map);
4317 }
4318 
4319 void PermuteComponent::Init(const std::vector<int32> &column_map) {
4320  KALDI_ASSERT(column_map.size() > 0);
4321  column_map_.CopyFromVec(column_map);
4322  ComputeReverseColumnMap();
4323 }
4324 
4325 void PermuteComponent::Read(std::istream &is, bool binary) {
4326  ExpectOneOrTwoTokens(is, binary, "<PermuteComponent>", "<ColumnMap>");
4327  std::vector<int32> column_map;
4328  if (binary && is.peek() == 'F') {
4329  // back-compatibility code [temporary]
4330  Vector<BaseFloat> float_map;
4331  float_map.Read(is, binary);
4332  column_map.resize(float_map.Dim());
4333  for (int32 i = 0; i < float_map.Dim(); i++) {
4334  // note: casting truncates toward zero: add 0.5 to approximate rounding.
4335  column_map[i] = static_cast<int32>(float_map(i) + 0.5);
4336  }
4337  // the next line is a workaround for a bug in the old
4338  // writing code, which now causes an assert failure. it's only
4339  // valid for the permutations we're currently using. anyway all this
4340  // code is only temporary.
4341  column_map.back() = float_map.Dim() - 1;
4342  } else {
4343  ReadIntegerVector(is, binary, &column_map);
4344  }
4345  column_map_.CopyFromVec(column_map);
4346  ExpectToken(is, binary, "</PermuteComponent>");
4347  ComputeReverseColumnMap();
4348 }
4349 
4350 void PermuteComponent::Write(std::ostream &os, bool binary) const {
4351  WriteToken(os, binary, "<PermuteComponent>");
4352  WriteToken(os, binary, "<ColumnMap>");
4353  std::ostringstream buffer;
4354  std::vector<int32> column_map;
4355  column_map_.CopyToVec(&column_map);
4356  WriteIntegerVector(os, binary, column_map);
4357  WriteToken(os, binary, "</PermuteComponent>");
4358 }
4359 
4360 std::string PermuteComponent::Info() const {
4361  std::ostringstream stream;
4362  stream << Type() << ", dim=" << column_map_.Dim();
4363  stream << " , column-map=[ ";
4364  std::vector<int32> column_map(column_map_.Dim());
4365  column_map_.CopyToVec(&column_map);
4366  int32 max_size = 5;
4367  for (size_t i = 0; i < column_map.size() && i < max_size; i++)
4368  stream << column_map[i] << ' ';
4369  if (static_cast<int32>(column_map.size()) > max_size)
4370  stream << "... ";
4371  stream << "]";
4372  return stream.str();
4373 }
4374 
4375 
4376 bool CompositeComponent::IsUpdatable() const {
4377  for (std::vector<Component*>::const_iterator iter = components_.begin(),
4378  end = components_.end(); iter != end; ++iter)
4379  if (((*iter)->Properties() & kUpdatableComponent) != 0)
4380  return true;
4381  return false;
4382 }
4383 
4384 // virtual
4385 int32 CompositeComponent::InputDim() const {
4386  KALDI_ASSERT(!components_.empty());
4387  return components_.front()->InputDim();
4388 };
4389 
4390 // virtual
4391 int32 CompositeComponent::OutputDim() const {
4392  KALDI_ASSERT(!components_.empty());
4393  return components_.back()->OutputDim();
4394 };
4395 
4396 // virtual
4397 int32 CompositeComponent::Properties() const {
4398  KALDI_ASSERT(!components_.empty());
4399  int32 last_component_properties = components_.back()->Properties(),
4400  first_component_properties = components_.front()->Properties();
4401  // We always assume backprop needs the input, as this would be necessary to
4402  // get the activations at intermediate layers, if these were not needed in
4403  // backprop, there would be no reason to use a CompositeComponent.
4404  int32 ans = kSimpleComponent | kBackpropNeedsInput |
4405  (last_component_properties & kPropagateAdds) |
4406  (last_component_properties & kBackpropNeedsOutput) |
4407  (first_component_properties & kBackpropAdds) |
4408  (IsUpdatable() ? kUpdatableComponent : 0);
4409  // we call StoreStats() on any sub-components as part of
4410  // the backprop phase.
4411  if (last_component_properties & kStoresStats)
4412  ans |= kBackpropNeedsOutput;
4413  return ans;
4414 };
4415 
4416 
4417 // virtual
4418 void CompositeComponent::Propagate(
4419  const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *, // indexes
4420  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in,
4421  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *out) const {
4422  KALDI_ASSERT(in.NumRows() == out->NumRows() && in.NumCols() == InputDim() &&
4423  out->NumCols() == OutputDim());
4424  int32 num_rows = in.NumRows(),
4425  num_components = components_.size();
4426  if (max_rows_process_ > 0 && num_rows > max_rows_process_) {
4427  // recurse and process smaller parts of the data, to save memory.
4428  for (int32 row_offset = 0; row_offset < num_rows;
4429  row_offset += max_rows_process_) {
4430  int32 this_num_rows = std::min<int32>(max_rows_process_,
4431  num_rows - row_offset);
4432  const CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> in_part(in, row_offset, this_num_rows,
4433  0, in.NumCols());
4434  CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> out_part(*out, row_offset, this_num_rows,
4435  0, out->NumCols());
4436  this->Propagate(NULL, in_part, &out_part);
4437  }
4438  return;
4439  }
4440  std::vector<CuMatrix<BaseFloat> > intermediate_outputs(num_components - 1);
4441  for (int32 i = 0; i < num_components; i++) {
4442  if (i + 1 < num_components) {
4443  intermediate_outputs[i].Resize(num_rows, components_[i]->OutputDim(),
4444  kUndefined);
4445  if (components_[i]->Properties() & kPropagateAdds)
4446  intermediate_outputs[i].SetZero();
4447  }
4448  components_[i]->Propagate(NULL, (i == 0 ? in : intermediate_outputs[i-1]),
4449  (i + 1 == num_components ? out : &(intermediate_outputs[i])));
4450  if (i > 0)
4451  intermediate_outputs[i-1].Resize(0, 0);
4452  }
4453 }
4454 
4455 
4456 void CompositeComponent::Init(const std::vector<Component*> &components,
4457  int32 max_rows_process) {
4458  DeletePointers(&components_); // clean up.
4459  components_ = components;
4460  KALDI_ASSERT(!components.empty());
4461  max_rows_process_ = max_rows_process;
4462 
4463  for (size_t i = 0; i < components_.size(); i++) {
4464  // make sure all constituent components are simple.
4465  KALDI_ASSERT(components_[i]->Properties() & kSimpleComponent);
4466  if (i > 0) {
4467  // make sure all the internal dimensions match up.
4468  KALDI_ASSERT(components_[i]->InputDim() ==
4469  components_[i-1]->OutputDim());
4470  }
4471  }
4472 }
4473 
4474 // virtual
4475 void CompositeComponent::Read(std::istream &is, bool binary) {
4476  // Because we didn't previously write out the learning rate,
4477  // we need some temporary code.
4478  int32 max_rows_process;
4479  if (false) {
4480  ReadUpdatableCommon(is, binary);
4481  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<MaxRowsProcess>");
4482  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &max_rows_process);
4483  } else { // temporary code.
4484  std::string token;
4485  ReadToken(is, binary, &token);
4486  if (token == "<CompositeComponent>") {
4487  // if the first token is the opening tag, then
4488  // ignore it and get the next tag.
4489  ReadToken(is, binary, &token);
4490  }
4491  if (token == "<LearningRateFactor>") {
4492  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &learning_rate_factor_);
4493  ReadToken(is, binary, &token);
4494  } else {
4495  learning_rate_factor_ = 1.0;
4496  }
4497  if (token == "<IsGradient>") {
4498  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &is_gradient_);
4499  ReadToken(is, binary, &token);
4500  } else {
4501  is_gradient_ = false;
4502  }
4503  if (token == "<LearningRate>") {
4504  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &learning_rate_);
4505  ReadToken(is, binary, &token);
4506  }
4507  if (token != "<MaxRowsProcess>") {
4508  KALDI_ERR << "Expected token <MaxRowsProcess>, got "
4509  << token;
4510  }
4511  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &max_rows_process);
4512  }
4513  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<NumComponents>");
4514  int32 num_components;
4515  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &num_components); // Read dimension.
4516  if (num_components < 0 || num_components > 100000)
4517  KALDI_ERR << "Bad num-components";
4518  std::vector<Component*> components(num_components);
4519  for (int32 i = 0; i < num_components; i++)
4520  components[i] = ReadNew(is, binary);
4521  Init(components, max_rows_process);
4522  ExpectToken(is, binary, "</CompositeComponent>");
4523 }
4524 
4525 // virtual
4526 void CompositeComponent::ZeroStats() {
4527  // we call ZeroStats() on all components without checking their flags; this
4528  // will do nothing if the component doesn't store stats. (components like
4529  // ReLU and sigmoid and tanh store stats on activations).
4530  for (size_t i = 0; i < components_.size(); i++)
4531  components_[i]->ZeroStats();
4532 }
4533 
4534 // virtual
4535 void CompositeComponent::Write(std::ostream &os, bool binary) const {
4536  WriteUpdatableCommon(os, binary); // Write opening tag and learning rate.
4537  WriteToken(os, binary, "<MaxRowsProcess>");
4538  WriteBasicType(os, binary, max_rows_process_);
4539  WriteToken(os, binary, "<NumComponents>");
4540  int32 num_components = components_.size();
4541  WriteBasicType(os, binary, num_components);
4542  for (int32 i = 0; i < num_components; i++)
4543  components_[i]->Write(os, binary);
4544  WriteToken(os, binary, "</CompositeComponent>");
4545 }
4546 
4547 
4548 // virtual
4549 void CompositeComponent::Backprop(const std::string &debug_info,
4550  const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
4551  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in_value,
4552  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_value,
4553  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv,
4554  Component *to_update,
4555  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *in_deriv) const {
4556  KALDI_ASSERT(in_value.NumRows() == out_deriv.NumRows() &&
4557  in_value.NumCols() == InputDim() &&
4558  out_deriv.NumCols() == OutputDim());
4559  int32 num_rows = in_value.NumRows(),
4560  num_components = components_.size();
4561  if (max_rows_process_ > 0 && num_rows > max_rows_process_) {
4562  KALDI_ASSERT(max_rows_process_ > 0);
4563  // recurse and process smaller parts of the data, to save memory.
4564  for (int32 row_offset = 0; row_offset < num_rows;
4565  row_offset += max_rows_process_) {
4566  bool have_output_value = (out_value.NumRows() != 0);
4567  int32 this_num_rows = std::min<int32>(max_rows_process_,
4568  num_rows - row_offset);
4569  // out_value_part will only be used if out_value is nonempty; otherwise we
4570  // make it a submatrix of 'out_deriv' to avoid errors in the constructor.
4571  const CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> out_value_part(have_output_value ? out_value : out_deriv,
4572  row_offset, this_num_rows,
4573  0, out_deriv.NumCols());
4574  // in_deriv_value_part will only be used if in_deriv != NULL; otherwise we
4575  // make it a submatrix of 'in_value' to avoid errors in the constructor.
4576  CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> in_deriv_part(in_deriv != NULL ? *in_deriv : in_value,
4577  row_offset, this_num_rows,
4578  0, in_value.NumCols());
4579  CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> in_value_part(in_value, row_offset, this_num_rows,
4580  0, in_value.NumCols());
4581  const CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> out_deriv_part(out_deriv,
4582  row_offset, this_num_rows,
4583  0, out_deriv.NumCols());
4584  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> empty_mat;
4585  this->Backprop(debug_info, NULL, in_value_part,
4586  (have_output_value ? static_cast<const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat>&>(out_value_part) :
4587  static_cast<const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat>&>(empty_mat)),
4588  out_deriv_part, to_update,
4589  in_deriv != NULL ? &in_deriv_part : NULL);
4590  }
4591  return;
4592  }
4593  // For now, assume all intermediate values and derivatives need to be
4594  // computed. in_value and out_deriv will always be supplied.
4595 
4596  // intermediate_outputs[i] contains the output of component i.
4597  std::vector<CuMatrix<BaseFloat> > intermediate_outputs(num_components - 1);
4598  // intermediate_derivs[i] contains the deriative at the output of component i.
4599  std::vector<CuMatrix<BaseFloat> > intermediate_derivs(num_components - 1);
4600 
4601  // Do the propagation again, for all but the last component in the sequence.
4602  // later on we can try being more careful about which ones we need to
4603  // propagate.
4604  for (int32 i = 0; i + 1 < num_components; i++) {
4605  // skip the last-but-one component's propagate if the last component's
4606  // backprop doesn't need the input and the one previous to that doesn't
4607  // need the output. [lowest hanging fruit for optimization]
4608  if (i + 2 == num_components &&
4609  !(components_[i+1]->Properties() & kBackpropNeedsInput) &&
4610  !(components_[i]->Properties() & kBackpropNeedsOutput))
4611  break;
4612  intermediate_outputs[i].Resize(num_rows, components_[i]->OutputDim(),
4613  kUndefined);
4614  if (components_[i]->Properties() & kPropagateAdds)
4615  intermediate_outputs[i].SetZero();
4616  components_[i]->Propagate(NULL,
4617  (i == 0 ? in_value : intermediate_outputs[i-1]),
4618  &(intermediate_outputs[i]));
4619  }
4620  for (int32 i = num_components - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
4621  Component *component_to_update =
4622  (to_update == NULL ? NULL :
4623  dynamic_cast<CompositeComponent*>(to_update)->components_[i]);
4624 
4625  if (components_[i]->Properties() & kStoresStats &&
4626  component_to_update != NULL)
4627  component_to_update->StoreStats(
4628  (i + 1 == num_components ? out_value : intermediate_outputs[i]));
4629 
4630  // skip the first component's backprop if it's not updatable and in_deriv is
4631  // not requested. Again, this is the lowest-hanging fruit to optimize.
4632  if (i == 0 && !(components_[0]->Properties() & kUpdatableComponent) &&
4633  in_deriv == NULL)
4634  break;
4635  if (i > 0) {
4636  intermediate_derivs[i-1].Resize(num_rows, components_[i]->InputDim());
4637  if (components_[i]->Properties() & kPropagateAdds)
4638  intermediate_derivs[i-1].SetZero();
4639  }
4640  components_[i]->Backprop(debug_info, NULL,
4641  (i == 0 ? in_value : intermediate_outputs[i-1]),
4642  (i + 1 == num_components ? out_value : intermediate_outputs[i]),
4643  (i + 1 == num_components ? out_deriv : intermediate_derivs[i]),
4644  component_to_update,
4645  (i == 0 ? in_deriv : &(intermediate_derivs[i-1])));
4646  }
4647 }
4648 
4649 
4650 // virtual
4651 std::string CompositeComponent::Info() const {
4652  std::ostringstream stream;
4653  stream << Type() << " ";
4654  for (size_t i = 0; i < components_.size(); i++) {
4655  if (i > 0) stream << ", ";
4656  stream << "sub-component" << (i+1) << " = { "
4657  << components_[i]->Info() << " }";
4658  }
4659  return stream.str();
4660 }
4661 
4662 // virtual
4663 void CompositeComponent::Scale(BaseFloat scale) {
4664  for (size_t i = 0; i < components_.size(); i++)
4665  components_[i]->Scale(scale);
4666 }
4667 
4668 // virtual
4669 void CompositeComponent::Add(BaseFloat alpha, const Component &other_in) {
4670  const CompositeComponent *other = dynamic_cast<const CompositeComponent*>(
4671  &other_in);
4672  KALDI_ASSERT(other != NULL && other->components_.size() ==
4673  components_.size() && "Mismatching nnet topologies");
4674  for (size_t i = 0; i < components_.size(); i++)
4675  components_[i]->Add(alpha, *(other->components_[i]));
4676 }
4677 
4678 // virtual
4679 void CompositeComponent::SetZero(bool treat_as_gradient) {
4680  KALDI_ASSERT(this->IsUpdatable()); // or should not be called.
4681  for (size_t i = 0; i < components_.size(); i++) {
4682  if (components_[i]->Properties() & kUpdatableComponent) {
4683  UpdatableComponent *uc =
4684  dynamic_cast<UpdatableComponent*>(components_[i]);
4685  uc->SetZero(treat_as_gradient);
4686  }
4687  }
4688 }
4689 
4690 // virtual
4691 void CompositeComponent::PerturbParams(BaseFloat stddev) {
4692  KALDI_ASSERT(this->IsUpdatable()); // or should not be called.
4693  for (size_t i = 0; i < components_.size(); i++) {
4694  if (components_[i]->Properties() & kUpdatableComponent) {
4695  UpdatableComponent *uc =
4696  dynamic_cast<UpdatableComponent*>(components_[i]);
4697  uc->PerturbParams(stddev);
4698  }
4699  }
4700 }
4701 
4702 // virtual
4703 void CompositeComponent::SetLearningRate(BaseFloat lrate) {
4704  KALDI_ASSERT(this->IsUpdatable()); // or should not be called.
4705  UpdatableComponent::SetLearningRate(lrate); // set learning_rate_-- this gets
4706  // returned from LearningRate().
4707  // apply any learning-rate-factor that's set at this level (ill-advised, but
4708  // we'll do it.)
4709  BaseFloat effective_lrate = LearningRate();
4710  for (size_t i = 0; i < components_.size(); i++) {
4711  if (components_[i]->Properties() & kUpdatableComponent) {
4712  UpdatableComponent *uc =
4713  dynamic_cast<UpdatableComponent*>(components_[i]);
4714  uc->SetLearningRate(effective_lrate);
4715  }
4716  }
4717 }
4718 
4719 // virtual
4720 int32 CompositeComponent::NumParameters() const {
4721  KALDI_ASSERT(this->IsUpdatable()); // or should not be called.
4722  int32 ans = 0;
4723  for (size_t i = 0; i < components_.size(); i++) {
4724  if (components_[i]->Properties() & kUpdatableComponent) {
4725  UpdatableComponent *uc =
4726  dynamic_cast<UpdatableComponent*>(components_[i]);
4727  ans += uc->NumParameters();
4728  }
4729  }
4730  return ans;
4731 }
4732 
4733 // virtual
4734 void CompositeComponent::Vectorize(VectorBase<BaseFloat> *params) const {
4735  int32 cur_offset = 0;
4736  KALDI_ASSERT(this->IsUpdatable()); // or should not be called.
4737  for (size_t i = 0; i < components_.size(); i++) {
4738  if (components_[i]->Properties() & kUpdatableComponent) {
4739  UpdatableComponent *uc =
4740  dynamic_cast<UpdatableComponent*>(components_[i]);
4741  int32 this_size = uc->NumParameters();
4742  SubVector<BaseFloat> params_range(*params, cur_offset, this_size);
4743  uc->Vectorize(&params_range);
4744  cur_offset += this_size;
4745  }
4746  }
4747  KALDI_ASSERT(cur_offset == params->Dim());
4748 }
4749 
4750 // virtual
4751 void CompositeComponent::UnVectorize(const VectorBase<BaseFloat> &params) {
4752  int32 cur_offset = 0;
4753  KALDI_ASSERT(this->IsUpdatable()); // or should not be called.
4754  for (size_t i = 0; i < components_.size(); i++) {
4755  if (components_[i]->Properties() & kUpdatableComponent) {
4756  UpdatableComponent *uc =
4757  dynamic_cast<UpdatableComponent*>(components_[i]);
4758  int32 this_size = uc->NumParameters();
4759  SubVector<BaseFloat> params_range(params, cur_offset, this_size);
4760  uc->UnVectorize(params_range);
4761  cur_offset += this_size;
4762  }
4763  }
4764  KALDI_ASSERT(cur_offset == params.Dim());
4765 }
4766 
4767 // virtual
4768 BaseFloat CompositeComponent::DotProduct(
4769  const UpdatableComponent &other_in) const {
4770  const CompositeComponent *other = dynamic_cast<const CompositeComponent*>(
4771  &other_in);
4772  KALDI_ASSERT(other != NULL && other->components_.size() ==
4773  components_.size() && "Mismatching nnet topologies");
4774  BaseFloat ans = 0.0;
4775  for (size_t i = 0.0; i < components_.size(); i++) {
4776  if (components_[i]->Properties() & kUpdatableComponent) {
4777  UpdatableComponent *uc =
4778  dynamic_cast<UpdatableComponent*>(components_[i]);
4779  const UpdatableComponent *uc_other =
4780  dynamic_cast<UpdatableComponent*>(other->components_[i]);
4781  KALDI_ASSERT(uc != NULL && uc_other != NULL);
4782  ans += uc->DotProduct(*uc_other);
4783  }
4784  }
4785  return ans;
4786 }
4787 
4788 // virtual
4789 Component* CompositeComponent::Copy() const {
4790  std::vector<Component*> components(components_.size());
4791  for (size_t i = 0; i < components_.size(); i++)
4792  components[i] = components_[i]->Copy();
4793  CompositeComponent *ans = new CompositeComponent();
4794  ans->Init(components, max_rows_process_);
4795  return ans;
4796 }
4797 
4798 
4799 // virtual
4800 void CompositeComponent::InitFromConfig(ConfigLine *cfl) {
4801  int32 max_rows_process = 4096, num_components = -1;
4802  cfl->GetValue("max-rows-process", &max_rows_process);
4803  if (!cfl->GetValue("num-components", &num_components) ||
4804  num_components < 1)
4805  KALDI_ERR << "Expected num-components to be defined in "
4806  << "CompositeComponent config line '" << cfl->WholeLine() << "'";
4807  std::vector<Component*> components;
4808  for (int32 i = 1; i <= num_components; i++) {
4809  std::ostringstream name_stream;
4810  name_stream << "component" << i;
4811  std::string component_config;
4812  if (!cfl->GetValue(name_stream.str(), &component_config)) {
4813  DeletePointers(&components);
4814  KALDI_ERR << "Expected '" << name_stream.str() << "' to be defined in "
4815  << "CompositeComponent config line '" << cfl->WholeLine() << "'";
4816  }
4817  ConfigLine nested_line;
4818  // note: the nested line may not contain comments.
4819  std::string component_type;
4820  Component *this_component = NULL;
4821  if (!nested_line.ParseLine(component_config) ||
4822  !nested_line.GetValue("type", &component_type) ||
4823  !(this_component = NewComponentOfType(component_type))) {
4824  DeletePointers(&components);
4825  KALDI_ERR << "Could not parse config line for '" << name_stream.str()
4826  << "(or undefined or bad component type [type=xxx]), in "
4827  << "CompositeComponent config line '" << cfl->WholeLine() << "'";
4828  }
4829  this_component->InitFromConfig(&nested_line);
4830  components.push_back(this_component);
4831  }
4832  if (cfl->HasUnusedValues())
4833  KALDI_ERR << "Could not process these elements in initializer: "
4834  << cfl->UnusedValues();
4835  this->Init(components, max_rows_process);
4836 }
4837 
4838 
4839 
4840 } // namespace nnet3
4841 } // namespace kaldi
